add_namespace = mizhmoria


country_event = { # Our Kingdom
	id = ukrpol.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.1" }
	title = ukrpol.1.t
	desc = ukrpol.1.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_mapa
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.1.a
		country_event = {
			id = ukrpol.2
			days = 1
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # King Opens the Soim
	id = ukrpol.5
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.5" }
	title = ukrpol.5.t
	desc = ukrpol.5.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_vasyl

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.5.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.7
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # Strike
	id = ukrpol.6
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.6" }
	title = ukrpol.6.t
	desc = ukrpol.6.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_strike

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.6.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_flag = UKR_hetman_path
			}
		}
		UKR_decrease_direktoria = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_minor_concessions
			days = 120
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_king_path }
			UKR_increase_king_strength = yes
		}
		else = {
			UKR_increase_hetman_strength = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.6.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
		}
		227 = {
			damage_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				damage = 1
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.07
		UKR_decrease_direktoria = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_strikes_1
			days = 60
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_workers_loves_dyrektoria
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_king_path }
			UKR_increase_king_strength = yes
			UKR_decrease_king = yes
		}
		else = {
			UKR_increase_hetman_strength = yes
			UKR_decrease_hetman = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.6.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
		}
		227 = {
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				damage = 1
			}
		}
		UKR_increase_direktoria = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_strikes_2
			days = 90
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_workers_loves_dyrektoria
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_king_path }
			UKR_decrease_king_strength = yes
			UKR_decrease_king = yes
		}
		else = {
			UKR_decrease_hetman_strength = yes
			UKR_decrease_hetman = yes
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # Derzhavna Varta Report
	id = ukrpol.7
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.7" }
	title = ukrpol.7.t
	desc = ukrpol.7.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.7.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.8
				days = 14
				random_days = 50
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # German Garrison leaves
	id = ukrpol.9
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.9" }
	title = ukrpol.9.t
	desc = ukrpol.9.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_german_garrison

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.9.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_GER_garrison_leaves
		unlock_national_focus = UKR_Our_Future
		set_country_flag = UKR_dyrektoria_uprising_active
		activate_mission = UKR_rivne_uprising
		GER = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = dont_defend_ally_borders
				id = UKR
				value = 200
			}
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = ignore
				id = UKR
				value = 200
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = ukrpol.10
			days = 2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.70
				days = 25
				random_days = 150
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.71
				days = 45
				random_days = 125
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.72
				days = 55
				random_days = 100
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.73
				days = 70
				random_days = 80
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.74
				days = 80
				random_days = 80
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # Dualism
	id = ukrpol.10
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.10" }
	title = ukrpol.10.t
	desc = ukrpol.10.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.10.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_HETMAN_DEM  }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_HETMAN_COSSACK  }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_HETMAN_AUT  }
				}
			}
		}			
		set_country_flag = UKR_king_path
		complete_national_focus = UKR_King_Path
		add_ideas = UKR_dualism
		set_variable = { political_power_ideology = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		map_party_popularity_PP_gain_to_ideology = yes
		set_power_balance = {
			id = UKR_dualism
			left_side = UKR_king_side 
			right_side = UKR_hetman_side
			set_value = 0.05
		}
		country_event = {
			id = ukrpol.12
			days = 5
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.10.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_SOCIALISM }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_MONSOC }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_CONSERVATIVE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_CONSERVATIVE_MONARCH }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN_DEMOCRACY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_HREKIV_JUNTA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_HREKIV_OTAMANOVSKYI }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UMP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_USKHD }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UVO_KON }
				}
			}
		}			
		set_country_flag = UKR_hetman_path
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Hetman_Path
		add_ideas = UKR_dualism
		set_power_balance = {
			id = UKR_dualism
			left_side = UKR_king_side 
			right_side = UKR_hetman_side
			set_value = 0.05
		}
		country_event = {
			id = ukrpol.26
			days = 5
		}		
	}
	
}
country_event = { # Dualism
	id = ukrpol.11
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.11" }
	title = ukrpol.11.t
	desc = ukrpol.11.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.11.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UVO_KON }
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Coalition_Of_Monarchists
		activate_mission = UKR_hetman_makes_his_move
		UKR_increase_king_strength = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.02
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.11.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_SOCIALISM }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_MONSOC }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_CONSERVATIVE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_CONSERVATIVE_MONARCH }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN_DEMOCRACY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_HREKIV_JUNTA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_HREKIV_OTAMANOVSKYI }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UMP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_USKHD }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UVO_MELNYK }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UVO_DONTSOV }
				}
			}
		}			
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Coalition_With_UVO
		activate_mission = UKR_hetman_makes_his_move
		UKR_increase_king_strength = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.02
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { # Melnyk Returns
	id = ukrpol.13
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.13" }
	title = ukrpol.13.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.13.d.king
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = UKR_King_Path }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.13.d.hetman
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_King_Path }
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_melnyk
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.13.a
		set_global_flag = WSU_totalist_uvo
		UPR = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 17905 }
				set_nationality = ROOT
				clr_unit_leader_flag = UVO_Galicia_leader
			}
		}
		UPR = {
			clr_country_flag = UPR_melnyk_on_our_side
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = national_populist
				popularity = -0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.03
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 17917 }
					promote_leader = yes
					custom_effect_tooltip = will_become_uvo_leader_galicia
					set_unit_leader_flag = UVO_Galicia_leader
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = leftist_uvo_becomes_dominant_galicia
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Mykola Stsiborskyi"
				desc = "POLITICS_MYKOLA_STSIBORSKYI_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Mykola_Stsiborskyi.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = red_tinted_autocracy_subtype
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 17917 }	
					set_unit_leader_flag = UVO_Galicia_leader
				}
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Mykola Stsiborskyi"
					desc = "POLITICS_MYKOLA_STSIBORSKYI_DESC"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Mykola_Stsiborskyi.png"
					expire = "1.1.1"
					ideology = right_syndicalism_subtype
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					name = UKR_totalist_party3
					long_name = UKR_totalist_party3_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = national_populist
					name = UKR_totalist_party3
					long_name = UKR_totalist_party3_long
				}
			}
		}
		GAL = { 
			country_event = { id = gal.38 days = 2 }
		}
	}		
}
country_event = { # Polish farms
	id = ukrpol.14
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.14" }
	title = ukrpol.14.t
	desc = ukrpol.14.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.14.a
		add_political_power = 5
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = { country_event = ukrpol.15 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { tag = POL }
				FROM = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrpol.15
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}		
}
country_event = { # Polish farms
	id = ukrpol.15
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.15" }
	title = ukrpol.15.t
	desc = ukrpol.15.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.15.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
		}
		UKR_decrease_king_strength = yes
		POL = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = UKR
				modifier = UKR_polish_concessions
			}
		}
		GAL = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = UKR
				modifier = UKR_polish_concessions
			}
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_paying_polish_concessions
			days = 180
		}
		POL = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = UKR_POL_polish_concessions
				days = 180
			}
		}
		GAL = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = UKR_POL_polish_concessions
				days = 180
			}
		}
	}	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.15.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = UKR_hetman_path
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_pol_gal_relations_forever_destroyed
		UKR_increase_king_strength = yes
		POL = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = UKR
				modifier = KR_outraged
			}
		}
		GAL = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = UKR
				modifier = KR_outraged
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			embargo_FROM = yes 
			GAL = { embargo_PREV = yes }
		}
	}		
}

	id = ukrpol.16
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.16" }

		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 202 }
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Sichovi Striltsi\" start_experience_factor = 0.3"
				owner = ROOT
				prioritize_location = 504
			}
		}
	}				
}
country_event = { # Peasant Discontent
	id = ukrpol.17
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.17" }
	title = ukrpol.17.t
	desc = ukrpol.17.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_farming

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.17.king
		trigger = {	has_completed_focus = UKR_King_Path }
		add_stability = -0.02
		UKR_decrease_hetman_strength = yes
		UKR_decrease_king = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_peasant_unrest
			days = 30
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.17.hetman
		trigger = {	NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_King_Path } }
		add_stability = 0.02
		UKR_decrease_king_strength = yes
		UKR_increase_hetman = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_negot_peasants
			days = 90
		}
	}				
}

		UKR_decrease_hetman = yes

country_event = { # Sich Streltsy disbanded!
	id = ukrpol.19
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.19" }
	title = ukrpol.19.t
	desc = ukrpol.19.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.19.king
		trigger = {	has_completed_focus = UKR_King_Path }
		UKR_increase_hetman_strength = yes
		delete_unit_template_and_units = {
			division_template = "Sichovi Striltsi"
			disband = yes #will refund equipment and manpower
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = -0.03
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.19.hetman
		trigger = {	NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_King_Path } }
		UKR_increase_hetman_strength = yes
		delete_unit_template_and_units = {
			division_template = "Sichovi Striltsi"
			disband = yes #will refund equipment and manpower
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist

country_event = { # End of the Hetmanate
	id = ukrpol.25
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.25" }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			GER = { 
				country_event = {
					id = ukrpol.47
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
	title = ukrpol.25.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.25.d.uvo
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Coalition_With_UVO }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.25.d
		trigger = { NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Coalition_With_UVO } }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_lypky
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = UKR
		has_government = paternal_autocrat
		power_balance_value = {
			id = UKR_dualism
			value < 0
		}		
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.25.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_hetman_path }
			clr_country_flag = UKR_hetman_path
			set_country_flag = UKR_king_path
		}
		default_party_popularity_PP_gain = yes
		UKR_decrease_hetman_strength = yes
		UKR_decrease_hetman = yes
		remove_power_balance = { id = UKR_dualism }
		effect_tooltip = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 17909 }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		remove_ideas = UKR_derzhavna_varta
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = UKR_Coalition_With_UVO
					has_completed_focus = UKR_Coalition_Wih_UDP
				}
			}
			add_ideas = {
				UKR_Vasyl_Vyshyvanyi_hog_ade
				UKR_Kazymyr_Huzhkovskyi_for_ade
				UKR_Yakiv_Moralevych_eco_npo
				UKR_Dmitri_Dontsov_sec_npo
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.34
				days = 3
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
				elections_allowed = yes
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				end_coalition = yes
				add_natpop_to_coalition = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = {
				UKR_Vyacheslav_Lypynskyi_hog_ade
				UKR_Serhiy_Shemet_for_ade
				UKR_Mykhailo_Savur_Tsypriianovych_eco_ade
				UKR_Yulian_Romanchuk_sec_ade
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.152
				days = 2
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.150
				days = 20
				random_days = 20
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.90
				days = 4
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
				elections_allowed = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = UPR_dyrektoria_become_exiled_in_WSU
					NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_dyrektoria_uprising_active }
				}
			}
			remove_ideas = UKR_dualism
			else = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = UKR_dualism
					add_idea = UKR_political_instability
				}
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = UKR_UMP_USKhD_Coalition
		set_variable = { UKR_uskhd_cons = 0 }
		set_variable = { UKR_uskhd_lib = 0 }
		recalculate_ukrainian_political_variables = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 17909 }
				set_unit_leader_flag = UKR_skoropadskyi
				set_nationality = XXA
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = ukrpol.76
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Pavlo_Skoropadskyi_dead
	}						
}

country_event = { # Boom
	id = ukrpol.32
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.32" }
	title = ukrpol.32.t
	desc = ukrpol.32.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = UKR
		has_government = paternal_autocrat
		power_balance_value = {
			id = UKR_dualism
			value > 0
		} 		
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.32.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_king_path }
			clr_country_flag = UKR_king_path
			set_country_flag = UKR_hetman_path
		}
		default_party_popularity_PP_gain = yes
		set_global_flag = UKR_dnieper_explosion
		add_stability = -0.1
		remove_power_balance = { id = UKR_dualism }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = UPR_dyrektoria_become_exiled_in_WSU
					NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_dyrektoria_uprising_active }
				}
			}
			remove_ideas = UKR_dualism
		}
		else = {
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = UKR_dualism
				add_idea = UKR_political_instability
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		UKR_remove_king = yes		
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Explosion_Dnieper
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Coalition_Wih_UDP }
				set_country_leader_portrait = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					portrait = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Pavlo_Skoropadsky_Civilian.png"
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_country_flag = UKR_upss_will_defect
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					popularity = -0.1
				}
				add_ideas = UKR_social_nationalist_resistance
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = UKR_deal_with_social_nationalist_resistance }
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = ukrpol.75
					days = 1
				}
			}
			AUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrpol_explosion.1
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { # Konovalets Counter-Coup
	id = ukrpol.35
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.35" }
	title = ukrpol.35.t
	desc = ukrpol.35.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_konovalets

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.35.a
		UKR_remove_king = yes
		set_global_flag = UKR_konovalets_counet_coup
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Nationalists_Seize_Power
		UKR_decrease_king_strength = yes
		UKR_decrease_king = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_unit_leader = 17907 }
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					is_field_marshal = no
					has_id = 17907
				}
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					is_field_marshal = no
					has_id = 17905
				}
				promote_leader = yes
			}		
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			division_template = {
				name = "Halytskyi korpus Sichovykh Striltsiv"
				division_names_group = UKR_ELI_02
				regiments = {

	desc = ukrpol.37.d

		name = ukrpol.37.a
		set_global_flag = UPR_dyrektoria_become_exiled_in_WSU
		clr_country_flag = UKR_dyrektoria_uprising_active
		remove_ideas = UKR_political_instability
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" }
				if = {
					limit = { country_exists = WSU }
					UPR = { become_exiled_in = { target = WSU legitimacy = 0.35 } }
				}
			}
			else = {
				UPR = {
					every_unit_leader = {
						set_unit_leader_flag = original_unr_leader
						set_nationality = WSU
					}
				}
				clear_variable = UKR_Direktoriia_Strength
				clear_global_event_target = UKR_dyrektoria_headquarters			
				WSU = {
					save_global_event_target_as = UKR_dyrektoria_headquarters
					set_cosmetic_tag = UKR_dyrektoria
					country_event = wsu.33
				}	
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_idea = UKR_martial_law
				UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = no
			}
			remove_ideas = UKR_martial_law
		}
	}	
}

			damage_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				damage = 2
			}
		}
	}		
}

country_event = { # Victory of Kingdom
	id = ukrpol.61
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.61" }	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = UPR decision = UKR_Counter_Attack }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 202 decision = UKR_Secure_Kyiv_Suburbs }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 202 decision = UKR_Defend_Kyiv }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 192 decision = UKR_Secure_South }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 192 decision = UKR_Recapture_South }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 221 decision = UKR_Secure_The_Rear }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 221 decision = UKR_Recapture_Donbas }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 221 decision = UKR_Recapture_Donbas2 }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = UKR_Impose_Martial_Law }			
		}
	}	
	title = ukrpol.61.t
	desc = ukrpol.61.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.61.a
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_rebel_state }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_core_of = UPR }
				remove_core_of = UPR
				remove_claim_by = ROOT
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			ROOT = {
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = PREV decision = UKR_pacification_generic }
			}
		}
		clr_global_flag = UPR_dyrektoria_uprising_UPR
		set_global_flag = UPR_dyrektoria_become_exiled_in_WSU
		set_global_flag = UPR_ukrainian_civil_war_ended
		clr_country_flag = UKR_dyrektoria_uprising_active
		clear_variable = UKR_Direktoriia_Strength
		clear_global_event_target = UKR_dyrektoria_headquarters
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes	
		remove_ideas = UKR_political_instability
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" }
				if = {
					limit = { country_exists = WSU }
					UPR = { become_exiled_in = { target = WSU legitimacy = 0.35 } }
				}
				else = {
					UPR = { become_exiled_in = { target = GAL legitimacy = 0.35 } }
				}
			}
			UPR = {
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 17918 }
					retire = yes
				}
				every_unit_leader = {
					set_nationality = WSU
				}
			}
			clear_variable = UKR_Direktoriia_Strength
			clear_global_event_target = UKR_dyrektoria_headquarters
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = UKR_transfered_our_fleet_to_CRM 
					has_country_flag = UKR_transfered_our_fleet_to_GER
				}
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = UKR_demand_our_fleet }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { country_exists = CRM }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = CRM decision = UKR_reclaim_crimea }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Victory of Dyrektoria
	id = ukrpol.64
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.64" }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = UKR.UKR_starting_states_array
				
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
					}
					add_core_of = ROOT
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
					remove_core_of = UPR
				}
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				if = {
					limit = { is_demilitarized_zone = yes }
					set_demilitarized_zone = no
				}				
				if = {
					limit = { has_resistance = yes }
					cancel_resistance = yes
					force_disable_resistance = { clear = yes }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_rebel_state } }
					remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_rebel_state }
				}
				ROOT = {
					remove_targeted_decision = { target = PREV decision = UKR_pacification_generic }
				}
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = UPR decision = UKR_Counter_Attack }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 202 decision = UKR_Secure_Kyiv_Suburbs }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 202 decision = UKR_Defend_Kyiv }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 192 decision = UKR_Secure_South }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 192 decision = UKR_Recapture_South }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 221 decision = UKR_Secure_The_Rear }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 221 decision = UKR_Recapture_Donbas }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = 221 decision = UKR_Recapture_Donbas2 }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = UKR_Impose_Martial_Law }		
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 17929 }
				clr_unit_leader_flag = UKR_hetman_loyalist
			}
			# if failing for some reason, automatically triggers no matter what after 3 months
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.1
				days = 90
			}
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = ukrpol.64.t
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_konovalets_counet_coup }
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = ukrpol.64.t2
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = UKR_konovalets_counet_coup
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.64.d
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_konovalets_counet_coup }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.64.d2
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = UKR_konovalets_counet_coup
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.64.a		
		hidden_effect = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_hetman_loyalist
						has_id = 17901
					}
				}
				set_nationality = XXA
			}			
			if = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						has_government = national_populist 
						has_country_flag = UKR_compromises_with_nationalists 
					}
				}
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_trait = UKR_uvo_officer }
					set_nationality = XXA
				}
			}
			UPR = { 
				every_unit_leader = { set_nationality = ROOT } 
			}
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = UPR		
		UKR_setup_dyrektoria_popularities = yes
		UKR_setup_dyrektoria_divisions = yes
		UKR_setup_dyrektoria_government = yes
		UKR_setup_dyrektoria_flags = yes
		UKR_setup_dyrektoria_international = yes
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_hetman_loyalist
						has_id = 17901
					}
				}
				retire = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						has_government = national_populist 
						has_country_flag = UKR_compromises_with_nationalists 
					}
				}
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_trait = UKR_uvo_officer }
					retire = yes
				}
			}
			UPR = {
				every_unit_leader = { set_nationality = UKR }
			}
		}
		GAL = { 
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.39
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
		complete_national_focus = UKR_UPSS_In_Power
		UKR_decrease_king_strength = yes
		UKR_decrease_direktoria = yes
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party
			long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				name = UKR_social_conservative_party
				long_name = UKR_social_conservative_party_long
			}
			end_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = { uskhd_pop = party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat }
			set_temp_variable = { upss_pop = party_popularity@social_conservative }
			multiply_temp_variable = { uskhd_pop = 100 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { upss_pop = 100 }
			set_country_flag = ukr_switched_uskhd_upss
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				popularity = var:uskhd_pop
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = var:upss_pop
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			UKR_Oleksander_Shapoval_hog_ade
			UKR_Valentyn_Otamanovskyi_for_ade
			UKR_Yevhen_Arkhypenko_eco_ade
			UKR_Opanas_Andrievskyi_sec_ade
		}
		set_country_leader_ideology = social_nationalism_subtype
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.90.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_SOCIALISM }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_MONSOC }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_CONSERVATIVE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_CONSERVATIVE_MONARCH }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN_DEMOCRACY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_HREKIV_JUNTA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_HREKIV_OTAMANOVSKYI }
				}
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = UKR_hetmanate_is_over
		set_country_flag = UKR_upss_will_defect
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		add_ideas = UKR_social_nationalist_resistance
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = UKR_deal_with_social_nationalist_resistance }
	}	
}

country_event = { # Kyiv Trials
	id = ukrpol.100
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.100" }
	title = ukrpol.100.t
	desc = ukrpol.100.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_skoropadsky

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.100.a
		country_event = {
			id = ukrpol.101
			days = 2
		}
		set_variable = { UKR_shd_con = 0 }
		set_variable = { UKR_shd_lib = 0 }
	}	
}

	id = ukrpol.101
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.101" }

			days = 2
		}

		add_to_variable = { UKR_kyiv_trials_prod = -0.05 }
		set_country_flag = UKR_kyiv_trials_trade_unions_bad
		country_event = {
			id = ukrpol.105
			days = 2
		}
	}

country_event = { # Kyiv Trials
	id = ukrpol.104
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.104" }
	title = ukrpol.104.t
	desc = ukrpol.104.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_skoropadsky

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.104.a
		if = {
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { UKR_shd_con > UKR_shd_lib }
				has_elections = yes 
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { UKR_shd_pop_bonus = UKR_shd_lib }
		subtract_from_temp_variable = { UKR_shd_pop_bonus = UKR_shd_con }
		multiply_temp_variable = { UKR_shd_pop_bonus = 0.03 }
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = UKR_shd_pop_bonus
		}
		add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_kyiv_trials }
		set_country_flag = UKR_kyiv_trials_end
	}
}

	desc = {

	}

			set_temp_variable = { UKR_resistance_change = -6 }

		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_resistance_change = 5 }
			UKR_land_reform_borotbysts_weaken = yes			
		}
		country_event = {
			id = ukrpol.102
			days = 2
		}
	}

			}

	}

		name = ukrpol.115.c

			base = 15 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_HETMAN_COSSACK }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_HETMAN_DEM }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = { has_elections = no }
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = UKR_Vasyl_Kochubei_hog_pau
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Hetman_In_His_Own_Right

	}
	option = {

		ai_chance = { 
			base = 55 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_HETMAN_COSSACK }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
				}
			}
		}

		complete_national_focus = UKR_Hetman_In_His_Own_Right
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 15
		UKR_decrease_mikhnovskyi_idea = yes 
	}

country_event = { # Vilne Kozatstvo
	id = ukrpol.116
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.116" }
	title = ukrpol.116.t
	desc = ukrpol.116.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_cossacks2
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.116.a
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 0.08 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_political_power = 15
		UKR_improve_ukrainisation = yes
		add_ideas = UKR_khmel_host
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_unit_leader = 17913 }
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 17981 }
				promote_leader = yes
			}			
		}
		else = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 17913 }
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_tech = cossack_corps_tech }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = cossack_corps_tech_effect
			hidden_effect = { set_technology = { cossack_corps_tech  = 1 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_template = "Kozatska Dyviziia" }
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "Kozatska Dyviziia"
				division_names_group = UKR_CAV_02
				regiments = {
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
				}
				support = {
					recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
				owner = ROOT
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.4"
				owner = ROOT
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
				owner = ROOT
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
				owner = ROOT
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		UKR_increase_ivan_po_idea = yes	
		UKR_decrease_mikhnovskyi_idea = yes	
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = UKR_cossack_militia_kiev target = 202 }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = UKR_cossack_militia_chernigov target = 193 }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = UKR_cossack_militia_poltava target = 259 }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = UKR_cossack_militia_starodub target = 1230 }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = UKR_cossack_militia_kharkov target = 221 }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = UKR_cossack_militia_sumy target = 225 }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_cossack_militias_tt
	}	
}

	title = ukrpol.117.t
	desc = ukrpol.117.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

country_event = { #
	id = ukrpol.119
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.119" }
	title = ukrpol.119.t
	desc = ukrpol.119.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_miknovskyi
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.119.a
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		end_coalition = yes
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		set_country_flag = Pavlo_Skoropadskyi_dead
		set_country_flag = UKR_russophile_plot_has_been_exposed
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Exposure_Of_The_Russophile_Plot
		effect_tooltip = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 17909 }
				retire = yes
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_hetman_loyalist }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 17909 }
				set_unit_leader_flag = UKR_skoropadskyi
				set_nationality = XXA
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_hetman_loyalist }
				set_nationality = XXA
			}
			XXA = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = original_unr_leader }
					set_nationality = UKR
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			set_politics = { ruling_party = paternal_autocrat elections_allowed = no }
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mykola Mikhnovskyi"
			desc = "POLITICS_MYKOLA_MIKHHNOVSKY_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Mykola_Mikhnovsky.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = pataut_ukrainian_conservatism_subtype
			traits = { UKR_apostle_of_ukrainian_statehood }
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = UKR_Mykola_Mikhnovsky_hog_pau		
		add_ideas = UKR_Valentyn_Otamanovskyi_for_ade		
		add_ideas = UKR_Yuri_Kollard_eco_pau		
		add_ideas = UKR_Opanas_Andrievskyi_sec_ade	
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				name = UKR_social_conservative_party
				long_name = UKR_social_conservative_party_long
			}
			end_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = { uskhd_pop = party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat }
			set_temp_variable = { upss_pop = party_popularity@social_conservative }
			multiply_temp_variable = { uskhd_pop = 100 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { upss_pop = 100 }
			set_country_flag = ukr_switched_uskhd_upss
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				popularity = var:uskhd_pop
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = var:upss_pop
			}
		}
		add_authdem_to_coalition = yes
		add_natpop_to_coalition = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.119.b
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		end_coalition = yes
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		set_country_flag = Pavlo_Skoropadskyi_dead
		set_country_flag = UKR_russophile_plot_has_been_exposed
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Exposure_Of_The_Russophile_Plot
		effect_tooltip = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 17909 }
				retire = yes
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_hetman_loyalist }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 17909 }
				set_unit_leader_flag = UKR_skoropadskyi
				set_nationality = XXA
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_hetman_loyalist }
				set_nationality = XXA
			}
			XXA = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = original_unr_leader }
					set_nationality = UKR
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			set_politics = { ruling_party = paternal_autocrat elections_allowed = no }
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mykola Mikhnovskyi"
			desc = "POLITICS_MYKOLA_MIKHHNOVSKY_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Mykola_Mikhnovsky_hetman.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = pataut_ukrainian_conservatism_subtype
			traits = { UKR_apostle_of_ukrainian_statehood UKR_hetman_title }
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = UKR_Mykola_Mikhnovsky_hog_pau		
		add_ideas = UKR_Valentyn_Otamanovskyi_for_ade		
		add_ideas = UKR_Yuri_Kollard_eco_pau		
		add_ideas = UKR_Opanas_Andrievskyi_sec_ade	
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				name = UKR_social_conservative_party
				long_name = UKR_social_conservative_party_long
			}
			end_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = { uskhd_pop = party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat }
			set_temp_variable = { upss_pop = party_popularity@social_conservative }
			multiply_temp_variable = { uskhd_pop = 100 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { upss_pop = 100 }
			set_country_flag = ukr_switched_uskhd_upss
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				popularity = var:uskhd_pop
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = var:upss_pop
			}
		}	
		add_authdem_to_coalition = yes
		add_natpop_to_coalition = yes
	}

country_event = { # Regency Council
	id = ukrpol.122
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.122" }
	title = ukrpol.122.t
	desc = ukrpol.122.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_regent
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.122.a
		add_ideas = UKR_austrian_regent
		add_stability = -0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_idea = UKR_austrian_trade }
				country_exists = AUS
			}
			add_ideas = UKR_austrian_trade
		}
		get_current_government_type = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = AUS
				AUS = { is_subject = no }
				has_war = no
			}
			AUS = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = ROOT
					autonomous_state = botde_satellite
				}
			}
		}
		restore_previous_government_type = yes
	}
}

country_event = { # SHD
	id = ukrpol.125
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.125" }
	title = ukrpol.125.t
	desc = ukrpol.125.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_skoropadsky_lypynskyi
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.125.a
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = UKR_Vyacheslav_Lypynskyi_hog_ade		
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_integrate_organisations_full
		hidden_effect = {
			set_politics = { ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat }
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party_long
				name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party
			}			
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_authdem = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat}
			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_authdem = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat  }

			set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@totalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_authdem }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@national_populist }

			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_authdem = sum } #avoid rounding errors

			set_popularities = {
				totalist = party_popularity_100@totalist
				syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
				radical_socialist = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist
				social_democrat = party_popularity_100@social_democrat
				social_liberal = party_popularity_100@social_liberal
				market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
				social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
				authoritarian_democrat = UKR_new_authdem
				paternal_autocrat = 0
				national_populist = party_popularity_100@national_populist
			}
			
			if = {
				limit = { UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = no }
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Pavlo Skoropadskyi"
					desc = "POLITICS_PAVLO_SKOROPADSKYI_HETMAN_DESC"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Pavlo_Skoropadskyi_Hetman.png"
					expire = "1.1.1"
					ideology = ukrainian_conservatism_subtype
					traits = { UKR_hetman_title }
				}
			}
		}
		UKR_decrease_ivan_po_idea = yes
	}
}

	id = ukrpol.130
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: ukrpol.130" }
	title = ukrpol.130.t
	desc = ukrpol.130.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_news_event_UKR_crimean_separatism
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.130.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
			add_stability = 0.01
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				137 = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
			}
			137 = { remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				1220 = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
			}
			1220 = { remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				1221 = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
			}
			1221 = { remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
		}
	}

	trigger = { 
		UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = yes 
		country_exists = CAN
		CAN = { has_war = no }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.133.a
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		add_political_power = 25
		CAN = { country_event = ukrpol.132 }
	}
}
country_event = { #Question of USKhD and UDKhP
	id = ukrpol.134
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: ukrpol.134" }
	title = ukrpol.134.t
	desc = ukrpol.134.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_uskhd_symbol

	option = { #Fully integrate
		name = ukrpol.134.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0 
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_HETMAN_COSSACK }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.10
		set_country_flag = UKR_bribed_uskhd_join			
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_integrate_organisations_half
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_authdem = UKR.party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat }
			divide_temp_variable = { UKR_new_authdem = 2 }

			set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_pataut = UKR.party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat }
			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_pataut = UKR_new_authdem }

			set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@totalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_authdem }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_pataut }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@national_populist }

			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_pataut = sum } #avoid rounding errors

			set_popularities = {
				totalist = party_popularity_100@totalist
				syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
				radical_socialist = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist
				social_democrat = party_popularity_100@social_democrat
				social_liberal = party_popularity_100@social_liberal
				market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
				social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
				authoritarian_democrat = UKR_new_authdem
				paternal_autocrat = UKR_new_pataut
				national_populist = party_popularity_100@national_populist
			}
			country_event = { id = ukrpol.135 days = 35 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Somewhat integrate
		name = ukrpol.134.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0 
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_HETMAN_COSSACK }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = UKR_Pardon_Monarchists }
		set_country_flag = UKR_encouraged_uskhd_join			
	}
	option = { #Don't integrate
		name = ukrpol.134.c
		add_stability = 0.06
	}
}

country_event = { #Strength & Unity
	id = ukrpol.137
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: ukrpol.137" }
	title = ukrpol.137.t
	desc = ukrpol.137.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_skoropadsky_army
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.137.a
		add_political_power = 10
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			long_name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party_long
			name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_HETMAN_COSSACK }
					}
					AND = {
						paternal_autocrat > 0.4
						has_country_flag = UKR_kyiv_trials_conspiracy_good
						has_country_flag = UKR_kyiv_trials_frontier_good
						has_country_flag = UKR_kyiv_trials_trade_unions_good
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							is_ai = yes
							has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_HETMAN_COSSACK }
						}
						AND = {
							has_completed_focus = UKR_Restore_Vilne_Kozatstvo
							check_variable = { UKR_poltavets_ostrianytsia_influence > 3 }
							NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_encouraged_uskhd_join }
							NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_bribed_uskhd_join }
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = ukrpol.138
					days = 5
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_country_flag = UKR_skoro_success
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_ideas = UKR_ivan_po_influence_idea_1
					remove_ideas = UKR_ivan_po_influence_idea_2
					remove_ideas = UKR_ivan_po_influence_idea_3
					remove_ideas = UKR_ivan_po_influence_idea_4
					remove_ideas = UKR_ivan_po_influence_idea_5
					remove_ideas = UKR_ivan_po_influence_idea_6
					remove_ideas = UKR_ivan_po_influence_idea_7
					remove_ideas = UKR_ivan_po_influence_idea_8
					remove_ideas = UKR_ivan_po_influence_idea_9
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.139
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # 
	id = ukrpol.146
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.146" }
	title = ukrpol.146.t
	desc = ukrpol.146.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_skoro_doroshenko
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.146.a
		remove_soclib_from_coalition = yes
		remove_authdem_from_coalition = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_integrate_organisations_half2
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5
			long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5_long
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_elections = no 
				NOT = { has_government = market_liberal }
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
				elections_allowed = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				name = UKR_social_liberal_party2
				long_name = UKR_social_liberal_party2_long
			}
			
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_authdem = UKR.party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat }
			divide_temp_variable = { UKR_new_authdem = 2 }

			set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_pataut = UKR.party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat }
			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_pataut = UKR_new_authdem }

			set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@totalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_authdem }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_pataut }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@national_populist }

			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_pataut = sum } #avoid rounding errors

			set_popularities = {
				totalist = party_popularity_100@totalist
				syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
				radical_socialist = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist
				social_democrat = party_popularity_100@social_democrat
				social_liberal = party_popularity_100@social_liberal
				market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
				social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
				authoritarian_democrat = UKR_new_authdem
				paternal_autocrat = UKR_new_pataut
				national_populist = party_popularity_100@national_populist
			}
			
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_soclib = UKR.party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
			divide_temp_variable = { UKR_new_soclib = 2 }

			set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_pataut = UKR.party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat }
			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_pataut = UKR_new_soclib }

			set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@totalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_soclib }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_pataut }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@national_populist }

			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_pataut = sum } #avoid rounding errors

			set_popularities = {
				totalist = party_popularity_100@totalist
				syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
				radical_socialist = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist
				social_democrat = party_popularity_100@social_democrat
				social_liberal = UKR_new_soclib
				market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
				social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
				authoritarian_democrat = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat
				paternal_autocrat = UKR_new_pataut
				national_populist = party_popularity_100@national_populist
			}
			
			country_event = { id = ukrpol.135 days = 35 }
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = UKR_Serhiy_Shemet_hog_ade
	}	
}
country_event = { # 
	id = ukrpol.147
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.147" }
	title = {
		text = ukrpol.147.t
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_skoro_success }
	}
	title = {
		text = ukrpol.147.t2
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Reconcile_With_Lypynskyi }
	}
	title = {
		text = ukrpol.147.t3
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Chair_To_Doroshenko }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.147.d
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_skoro_success }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.147.d2
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Reconcile_With_Lypynskyi }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.147.d3
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Chair_To_Doroshenko }
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_skoro_doroshenko
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.147.a
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_completed_focus = UKR_Chair_To_Doroshenko 
				NOT = { has_government = market_liberal }
			}
			set_country_flag = UKR_shd_is_authdem_udkhp
			set_country_flag = UKR_udkhp_restored
			add_ideas = UKR_hetman_constitution_udkhp
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5
				long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5_long
			}
			set_politics = { ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat elections_allowed = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_convert_into_authdem_and_give_5_pop
			hidden_effect = {		
				increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
				set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_authdem = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat}
				add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_authdem = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat  }

				set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@totalist }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_authdem }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@national_populist }

				add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_authdem = sum } #avoid rounding errors

				set_popularities = {
					totalist = party_popularity_100@totalist
					syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
					radical_socialist = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist
					social_democrat = party_popularity_100@social_democrat
					social_liberal = party_popularity_100@social_liberal
					market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
					social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
					authoritarian_democrat = UKR_new_authdem
					paternal_autocrat = 0
					national_populist = party_popularity_100@national_populist
				}
				
				if = {
					limit = { UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = no }
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Pavlo Skoropadskyi"
						desc = "POLITICS_PAVLO_SKOROPADSKYI_HETMAN_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Pavlo_Skoropadskyi_Hetman.png"
						expire = "1.1.1"
						ideology = ukrainian_conservatism_subtype
						traits = { UKR_hetman_title }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = UKR_Reconcile_With_Lypynskyi 
				NOT = { has_government = market_liberal }
			}
			add_ideas = UKR_hetman_constitution_uskhd
			increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 150
			add_ideas = UKR_hetman_constitution_shd
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { #Cossack militias rise up as war with Russia happens
	id = ukrpol.148
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: ukrpol.148" }
	title = ukrpol.148.t
	desc = ukrpol.148.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_cossacks2

	trigger = {
		has_government = paternal_autocrat
		has_war_with = RUS
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = UKR_cossack_militia_kiev
			has_country_flag = UKR_cossack_militia_chernigov
			has_country_flag = UKR_cossack_militia_poltava
			has_country_flag = UKR_cossack_militia_starodub
			has_country_flag = UKR_cossack_militia_kharkov
			has_country_flag = UKR_cossack_militia_sumy
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.148.a
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_tech = cossack_corps_tech }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = cossack_corps_tech_effect
			hidden_effect = { set_technology = { cossack_corps_tech  = 1 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_template = "Kozatska Dyviziia" }
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "Kozatska Dyviziia"
				division_names_group = UKR_CAV_02
				regiments = {
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
				}
				support = {
					recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = UKR_cossack_militia_kiev
			}
			202 = {
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.35 start_equipment_factor = 1"
					owner = UKR
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = UKR_cossack_militia_chernigov
			}
			193 = {
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 1 start_equipment_factor = 1"
					owner = UKR
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = UKR_cossack_militia_poltava
			}
			259 = {
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 1 start_equipment_factor = 1"
					owner = UKR
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = UKR_cossack_militia_starodub
			}
			791 = {
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 1 start_equipment_factor = 1"
					owner = UKR
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = UKR_cossack_militia_kharkov
			}
			221 = {
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.35 start_equipment_factor = 1"
					owner = UKR
				}
			}
		}
		if = {

				has_country_flag = UKR_cossack_militia_sumy
			}
			225 = {

					division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.35 start_equipment_factor = 1"

country_event = { #
	id = ukrpol.654
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: ukrpol.654" }
	title = ukrpol.654.t
	desc = ukrpol.654.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_IRE_fire
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.654.a
		UKR_decrease_mikhnovskyi_idea = yes
		UKR_improve_ukrainisation = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_security_crackdown_completed }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = UKR_ethnic_unrest
				days = 300
			}
			add_stability = -0.05
			set_temp_variable_to_random = {
				var = UKR_manpower_lost
				min = 5000
				max = 15000
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 192
						is_polish_claim_in_ukraine = yes
						is_russian_majority_in_ukraine = yes
					}
				}
				set_temp_variable = { ROOT.UKR_first_state = THIS }
				damage_building = {
					type = infrastructure
					damage = 0.25
				}
				if = {
					limit = { industrial_complex > 0 }
					damage_building = {
						type = industrial_complex
						damage = 0.25
					}	
				}
				if = {
					limit = { arms_factory > 0 }
					damage_building = {
						type = arms_factory
						damage = 0.25
					}	
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { state = var:UKR_first_state }
					OR = {
						state = 192
						is_polish_claim_in_ukraine = yes
						is_russian_majority_in_ukraine = yes
					}
				}
				set_temp_variable = { ROOT.UKR_second_state = THIS }
				damage_building = {
					type = infrastructure
					damage = 0.25
				}
				if = {
					limit = { industrial_complex > 0 }
					damage_building = {
						type = industrial_complex
						damage = 0.25
					}	
				}
				if = {
					limit = { arms_factory > 0 }
					damage_building = {
						type = arms_factory
						damage = 0.25
					}	
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = UKR_ethnic_unrest
				days = 500
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
			set_temp_variable_to_random = {
				var = UKR_manpower_lost
				min = 12000
				max = 25000
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 192
						is_polish_claim_in_ukraine = yes
						is_russian_majority_in_ukraine = yes
					}
				}
				set_temp_variable = { ROOT.UKR_first_state = THIS }
				damage_building = {
					type = infrastructure
					damage = 0.75
				}
				if = {
					limit = { industrial_complex > 0 }
					damage_building = {
						type = industrial_complex
						damage = 0.75
					}	
				}
				if = {
					limit = { arms_factory > 0 }
					damage_building = {
						type = arms_factory
						damage = 0.75
					}	
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { state = var:UKR_first_state }
					OR = {
						state = 192
						is_polish_claim_in_ukraine = yes
						is_russian_majority_in_ukraine = yes
					}
				}
				set_temp_variable = { ROOT.UKR_second_state = THIS }
				damage_building = {
					type = infrastructure
					damage = 0.75
				}
				if = {
					limit = { industrial_complex > 0 }
					damage_building = {
						type = industrial_complex
						damage = 0.75
					}	
				}
				if = {
					limit = { arms_factory > 0 }
					damage_building = {
						type = arms_factory
						damage = 0.75
					}	
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { state = var:UKR_first_state }
					NOT = { state = var:UKR_second_state }
					OR = {
						state = 192
						is_polish_claim_in_ukraine = yes
						is_russian_majority_in_ukraine = yes
					}
				}
				damage_building = {
					type = infrastructure
					damage = 0.75
				}
				if = {
					limit = { industrial_complex > 0 }
					damage_building = {
						type = industrial_complex
						damage = 0.75
					}	
				}
				if = {
					limit = { arms_factory > 0 }
					damage_building = {
						type = arms_factory
						damage = 0.75
					}	
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = ukrpol.657
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: ukrpol.657" }
	title = ukrpol.657.t
	desc = ukrpol.657.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_borys_butenko
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_protofis_dismissed }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.657.a		
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10 
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				set_temp_variable = { coalition_target = token:social_liberal }
				has_coalition_with_target = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { shd_coalition_upsf = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				set_temp_variable = { coalition_target = token:authoritarian_democrat }
				has_coalition_with_target = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { shd_coalition_uskhd = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				set_temp_variable = { coalition_target = token:social_conservative }
				has_coalition_with_target = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { shd_coalition_uskhd_con = 1 }
		}
		UKR_decrease_mikhnovskyi_idea = yes
		UKR_decrease_ivan_po_idea = yes	
		UKR_skoropadsky_increase_russophiles = yes
		add_stability = -0.1
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		add_political_power = -25		
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_Mykola_Mikhnovsky_hog_pau }
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.119
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_politics = { ruling_party = market_liberal }
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { shd_coalition_uskhd_con = 1 } }
				add_soccon_to_coalition = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { shd_coalition_uskhd = 1 } }
				add_authdem_to_coalition = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { shd_coalition_upsf = 1 } }
				add_soclib_to_coalition = yes
			}
			add_pataut_to_coalition = yes
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = UKR_Borys_Butenko_hog_mli
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.657.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_HETMAN_DEM }
				}
			}
		}
		UKR_skoropadsky_increase_germanophiles = yes
		hidden_effect = { UKR_skoropadsky_increase_germanophiles = yes }
		UKR_increase_mikhnovskyi_idea = yes
		UKR_increase_ivan_po_idea = yes
		add_stability = 0.07		
	}
}

			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government

		}

	desc = ukrpol.661.d

		name = ukrpol.661.a

			limit = {
				NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = UKR_RUS_empire }
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = UKR_RUS_empire
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.661.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = UKR_RUS_empire2 }
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = UKR_RUS_empire2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.661.c
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = UKR_RUS_empire3 }
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = UKR_RUS_empire3
		}
	}
}

news_event = { # Skoropadskyi Tsar
	id = ukrpol.662
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.662" }
	title = ukrpol.662.t
	desc = ukrpol.662.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_UKR_skoropadskyi_tsar

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			regional_asia_news = yes
			regional_middle_east_news = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.662.a
	}
}
		
### UMP-USKHD
country_event = { # An Heir to King Vasily?
	id = ukrpol.150
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.150" }
	title = ukrpol.150.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.150.d
		trigger = { UKR_upss_in_power = no }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.150.d.upss
		trigger = { UKR_upss_in_power = yes }
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.150.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_SOCIALISM }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_CONSERVATIVE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_HREKIV_JUNTA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_HREKIV_OTAMANOVSKYI }
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.03
		set_country_flag = UKR_LEO
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = GER
			modifier = UKR_GER_stefan_hab
		} # -20
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = AUS
			modifier = UKR_AUS_stefan_hab
		} # 30
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_upss_in_power = yes }
			UKR_triumvirs_increase_bolbochan = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.150.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				UKR_upss_in_power = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_SOCIALISM }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_CONSERVATIVE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_HREKIV_JUNTA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_HREKIV_OTAMANOVSKYI }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN_DEMOCRACY }
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
		set_country_flag = UKR_DAN
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = GER
			modifier = UKR_GER_daniil_sko
		} # 20
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = AUS
			modifier = UKR_AUS_daniil_sko
		} # -30
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_upss_in_power = yes }
			UKR_triumvirs_increase_shapoval = yes
			UKR_triumvirs_decrease_bolbochan = yes
			UKR_triumvirs_decrease_hrekiv = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.150.c
		trigger = {
			UKR_upss_in_power = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN_DEMOCRACY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_MONSOC }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_CONSERVATIVE_MONARCH }
				}
			}
		
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_upss_in_power = yes }
			UKR_triumvirs_increase_hrekiv = yes
			UKR_triumvirs_decrease_bolbochan = yes
			UKR_triumvirs_decrease_shapoval = yes
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { # New Head of Government?
	id = ukrpol.151
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.151" }
	title = ukrpol.151.t
	desc = ukrpol.151.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		UKR_upss_in_power = no
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.151.a
		add_ideas = UKR_impending_failure
		activate_mission = UKR_impending_failure_mission
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Reform_Derzhavnyi_Soim }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Form_National_Rada }
				}
				complete_national_focus = UKR_Reform_Derzhavnyi_Soim
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_State_Guided_Enlightenment }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Legalize_Prosvita }
				}
				complete_national_focus = UKR_State_Guided_Enlightenment
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Cripple_Radicalism }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Worker_Concessions }
				}
				complete_national_focus = UKR_Cripple_Radicalism
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Disband_The_Protofis }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Necessary_Compromise }
				}
				complete_national_focus = UKR_Disband_The_Protofis
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_End_Alliance_With_VSZV }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Enlist_Support_Of_Landowners }
				}
				complete_national_focus = UKR_End_Alliance_With_VSZV
			}
		}
	}	
}

			limit = { has_elections = no }

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { # UMP-UNDO Coalition
	id = ukrpol.155
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.155" }
	title = ukrpol.155.t
	desc = ukrpol.155.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.155.a
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party
			long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
		}
		set_politics = { ruling_party = social_conservative }
		add_authdem_to_coalition = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value = party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat }
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value_reverse = 0 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { var = UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value_reverse value = party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat }
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value_reverse }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value }
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.171
				days = 15
			}
		}
	}	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.155.b
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party
			long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
		}
		set_politics = { ruling_party = social_conservative }
		add_authdem_to_coalition = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value = party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat }
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value_reverse = 0 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { var = UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value_reverse value = party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat }
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value_reverse }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value }
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { # Trade Agreements
	id = ukrpol.156
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.156" }
	title = ukrpol.156.t
	desc = ukrpol.156.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_vasyl
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.156.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = { has_country_flag = UKR_DAN }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = { has_country_flag = UKR_germany_condemned_lypky }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.157
				days = 2
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = "If we agree:"
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = { add_ideas = UKR_austrian_trade_ump }
			AUS = { add_ideas = AUS_ukrainian_trade_ump }
		}
	}	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.156.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				FROM = { has_country_flag = UKR_DAN }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.158
				days = 2
			}
		}			
	}	
}
country_event = { # Trade Agreements
	id = ukrpol.157
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.157" }
	title = ukrpol.157.t
	desc = ukrpol.157.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.157.a
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_trade_agreement
		}
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_trade_agreement
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea
				add_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_GER
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS
				add_idea = UKR_austrian_trade_ump
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = UKR_austrian_trade_ump
		}
		add_ideas = UKR_austrian_trade_ump

				OR = {
					state = 91

					state = 1126
					state = 713
				}

			}

					target = AUS

				}
			}

				OR = {

				target = AUS
				modifier = KR_outraged
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = UKR
				modifier = KR_outraged
			}
		}

		hidden_effect = {
			UKR = {
				set_country_flag = UKR_joined_DA
				UKR_update_military = yes
			}
		}
	}

				NOT = { has_unit_leader = 17913 }
			}

			}			
		}

			limit = {
				NOT = { has_template = "Kozatska Dyviziia" }

				name = "Kozatska Dyviziia"

				regiments = {
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }

					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
				}
				support = {
					recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
				owner = ROOT
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.4"
				owner = ROOT
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
				owner = ROOT
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
				owner = ROOT
			}
		}
		#event_target:UKR_Ivan_Poltavets = { promote_leader = yes }
	}	
}
