country_event = { # 
	id = ukrpol.175
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.175" }
	title = ukrpol.175.t
	desc = ukrpol.175.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_lypynskyi
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.175.a
		add_ideas = UKR_impending_failure
		activate_mission = UKR_impending_failure_mission
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = UKR_unite_hetmanist_forces }
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = UKR_Volodymyr_Zalozetskyi_Sas_hog_sco
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party
			long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_conservative
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Form_National_Rada }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Reform_Derzhavnyi_Soim }
				}
				complete_national_focus = UKR_Form_National_Rada
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Legalize_Prosvita }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_State_Guided_Enlightenment }
				}
				complete_national_focus = UKR_Legalize_Prosvita
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Worker_Concessions }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Cripple_Radicalism }
				}
				complete_national_focus = UKR_Worker_Concessions
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Necessary_Compromise }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Disband_The_Protofis }
				}
				complete_national_focus = UKR_Necessary_Compromise
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Enlist_Support_Of_Landowners }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_End_Alliance_With_VSZV }
				}
				complete_national_focus = UKR_Enlist_Support_Of_Landowners
			}
		}
		
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				name = UKR_social_conservative_party
				long_name = UKR_social_conservative_party_long
			}
			end_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = { uskhd_pop = party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat }
			set_temp_variable = { upss_pop = party_popularity@social_conservative }
			multiply_temp_variable = { uskhd_pop = 100 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { upss_pop = 100 }
			set_country_flag = ukr_switched_uskhd_upss
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				popularity = var:uskhd_pop
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = var:upss_pop
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.171
				days = 60
				random_days = 90
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.175.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_has_purged_shd }
			has_idea = UKR_Serhiy_Shemet_for_ade
		}
		add_ideas = UKR_impending_failure
		activate_mission = UKR_impending_failure_mission
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = UKR_unite_hetmanist_forces }
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = UKR_Serhiy_Shemet_hog_ade
		remove_ideas = UKR_Serhiy_Shemet_for_ade
		add_ideas = UKR_Kazymyr_Huzhkovskyi_for_ade
	}
}
country_event = { # 
	id = ukrpol.176
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.176" }
	title = ukrpol.176.t
	desc = ukrpol.176.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_dontsov
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.176.a
		set_country_flag = UKR_banned_unpr
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = -0.1
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { # 
	id = ukrpol.177
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.177" }
	title = ukrpol.177.t
	desc = ukrpol.177.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_skoropadsky_svita_2
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.177.a
		ai_chance = { base = 65 }
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		add_political_power = -15
		add_to_variable = { UKR_uskhd_lib = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.177.b
		ai_chance = { base = 35 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						has_id = 17913 
						has_id = 17981 
					}
				}
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { UKR_uskhd_cons = 1 }
		add_political_power = 35
		set_country_flag = UKR_has_purged_shd
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = -1
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party2
			long_name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party2_long
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = UPR_dyrektoria_become_exiled_in_WSU } }
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = UPR.party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat 
			}
			else = {
				set_temp_variable = { UKR_natpop_half_pop = party_popularity@national_populist }
				multiply_temp_variable = { UKR_natpop_half_pop = 50 }
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = national_populist
					popularity = UKR_natpop_half_pop
				}				
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					popularity = UKR_natpop_half_pop
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { 
					has_completed_focus = UKR_Legalize_Prosvita
					has_completed_focus = UKR_Worker_Concessions
					has_completed_focus = UKR_Form_National_Rada
					has_completed_focus = UKR_Necessary_Compromise
					has_completed_focus = UKR_Enlist_Support_Of_Landowners
				}
				country_event = ukrpol.630
			}
			else = {
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 17913  }
					set_nationality = XXA
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.181
				days = 15
			}
		}
	}
}	
country_event = { # 
	id = ukrpol.178
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.178" }
	title = ukrpol.178.t
	desc = ukrpol.178.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.178.a
		activate_mission = UKR_change_the_constitution
	}
}

country_event = { # 
	id = ukrpol.180
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.180" }
	title = ukrpol.180.t
	desc = ukrpol.180.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.180.a
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Legalize_Prosvita }
		add_soclib_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.02
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.180.a
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Legalize_Prosvita }
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
	}	
}

	id = ukrpol.181
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.181" }
	title = ukrpol.181.t
	desc = ukrpol.181.d

	fire_only_once = yes

		name = ukrpol.181.a
		ai_chance = { base = 65 }
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_2 = yes

		name = ukrpol.181.b
		ai_chance = { base = 35 }
		remove_ideas = UKR_Serhiy_Shemet_for_ade 
		add_ideas = UKR_Kazymyr_Huzhkovskyi_for_ade
		add_political_power = -25
	}	
}
country_event = { # 
	id = ukrpol.182
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.182" }
	title = ukrpol.182.t
	desc = ukrpol.182.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.182.a
		ai_chance = { base = 65 }
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.182.b
		trigger = { has_idea = UKR_Serhiy_Shemet_hog_ade }
		ai_chance = { base = 35 }
		add_political_power = -50
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		set_country_flag = UKR_udkhp_restored
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_conservative }
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5
				long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5_long
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5
				long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5_long
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_we_unlock_2nd_term_tree
	}	
}
country_event = { # 
	id = ukrpol.183
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.183" }
	title = ukrpol.183.t
	desc = ukrpol.183.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.183.a
		UKR_remove_impending_failure = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { coalition_target = token:social_liberal }
				has_coalition_with_target = no
			}
			add_soclib_to_coalition = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			add_authdem_to_coalition = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
			}
			add_soccon_to_coalition = yes
		}
		add_pataut_to_coalition = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_udkhp_restored }
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5
					long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5
					long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5
					long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5
					long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party5_long
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party
					long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party
					long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party
					long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party
					long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { #Professional Orgs Contact USKhD
	id = ukrpol.187
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.187" }
	title = ukrpol.187.t
	desc = ukrpol.187.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_SRI_happy_crowds
	trigger = { UKR_ump_uskhd_in_power = yes }

	option = { #No
		name = ukrpol.187.a
		add_stability = -0.02
	}
	option = { #Advisory role
		name = ukrpol.187.b
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = ukr_switched_uskhd_upss }
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				popularity = 0.01
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = 0.01
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
	}
	option = { #Sure
		name = ukrpol.187.c
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = ukr_switched_uskhd_upss }
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				popularity = 0.02
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = 0.02
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
}

	option = {
		name = ukrpol.188.a
		add_political_power = -30

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.188.b
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ukrpol.190 days = 60 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Lypynskyi's death
	id = ukrpol.192
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.192" }
	immediate = { set_country_flag = Viacheslav_Lypynskyi_dead }
	title = ukrpol.192.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.192.d
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_idea = UKR_Vyacheslav_Lypynskyi_hog_ade }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.192.d2
		trigger = { has_idea = UKR_Vyacheslav_Lypynskyi_hog_ade }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	trigger = { 
		has_socialist_government = no
		has_left_democratic_government = no
	}

	option = { #No
		name = ukrpol.192.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_Vyacheslav_Lypynskyi_hog_ade }
			remove_ideas = UKR_Vyacheslav_Lypynskyi_hog_ade
			add_ideas = UKR_Serhiy_Shemet_hog_ade
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = UKR_Serhiy_Shemet_for_ade }
				remove_ideas = UKR_Serhiy_Shemet_for_ade
				add_ideas = UKR_Kazymyr_Huzhkovskyi_for_ade
			}
			add_stability = -0.03
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.03
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = ukr_switched_uskhd_upss }
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					popularity = 0.01
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					popularity = 0.01
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = ukrpol.203
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.203" }
	title = ukrpol.203.t
	desc = ukrpol.203.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { 
		name = ukrpol.203.a

			name = "Serhiy Yefremov"
			desc = "POLITICS_SERHIY_YEFREMOV_DESC"

country_event = { # UPSF/PULD(s-f)
	id = ukrpol.205
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.205" }
	title = ukrpol.205.t
	desc = ukrpol.205.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.205.a		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.206
				days = 20
				random_days = 12
			}
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSF/PULD(s-f)
	id = ukrpol.206
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.206" }
	title = ukrpol.206.t
	desc = ukrpol.206.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.206.a		
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		add_ideas = UKR_bund_cooperation	
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSF/PULD(s-f)
	id = ukrpol.207
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.207" }
	title = ukrpol.207.t
	desc = ukrpol.207.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.207.a	
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_completed_focus = UKR_National_Personal_Autonomy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_completed_focus = UKR_Cooperate_With_Bund
			}		
		}
		add_socdem_to_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { UKR_socdem_half_pop = party_popularity@social_democrat }
		multiply_temp_variable = { UKR_socdem_half_pop = 50 }
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = UKR_socdem_half_pop
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = UKR_social_democrat_party
			long_name = UKR_social_democrat_party_long
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.207.b	
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
				modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_completed_focus = UKR_Status_Quo
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_completed_focus = UKR_Sideline_The_Bund
			}		
		}
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_2 = yes
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSF/PULD(s-f)
	id = ukrpol.208
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.208" }
	title = ukrpol.208.t
	desc = ukrpol.208.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.208.a	
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_upss }
		}
		set_country_leader_ideology = centrist_subtype
		add_soccon_to_coalition = yes
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = UKR_Opanas_Andrievskyi_sec_ade
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.208.b	
		set_country_leader_ideology = centrist_subtype
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = UKR_Mykola_Mikhnovskyi_sec_ade
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.208.c
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_upss }
		}
		set_country_leader_ideology = centrist_subtype
		add_soccon_to_coalition = yes
		remove_ideas_with_trait = foreign_minister
		add_ideas = UKR_Valentyn_Otamanovskyi_for_ade
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = UKR_Mykola_Mikhnovskyi_sec_ade
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSF/PULD(s-f)
	id = ukrpol.211
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.211" }
	title = ukrpol.211.t
	desc = ukrpol.211.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.211.a	
		if = {
			limit = { 
				SWE = { has_socialist_government = no }
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = SWE
				modifier = small_increase
			}
			reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = SWE
				modifier = small_increase
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_political_power = -25
		set_country_flag = UKR_derzhavna_rada_parliament
	}	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.211.b
		if = {
			limit = { 
				SWI = { has_socialist_government = no }
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = SWI
				modifier = small_increase
			}
			reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = SWI
				modifier = small_increase
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		add_stability = -0.02
		set_country_flag = UKR_federal_assembly_parliament
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.211.c
		if = {
			limit = { 
				HOL = { has_socialist_government = no }
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = HOL
				modifier = small_increase
			}
			reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = HOL
				modifier = small_increase
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		add_stability = -0.02
		set_country_flag = UKR_republic_rada_parliament
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSF/PULD(s-f)
	id = ukrpol.213
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.213" }
	title = ukrpol.213.t
	desc = ukrpol.213.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.213.a	
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_AUS_enemies }
			country_exists = AUS
			AUS = {
				is_subject = no
				has_government = social_liberal
				NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_FACTION_LEADER }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_leader_ideology = paneuropeanism_subtype
		set_country_flag = UKR_federation_delegation_to_habsburgs
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = AUS
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
	}	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.213.b
		trigger = {
			country_exists = GER
			GER = { 
				is_subject = no 
				NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 10 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_FACTION_LEADER }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_AUSTRIA }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = GER
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.213.c
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 70 
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Oleksandr Shulhyn"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_AUSTRIA }
				}
			}
		}		
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_faction = yes }
			leave_faction = yes
			if = {
				limit = { is_in_faction_with = AUS }
				clr_country_flag = UKR_joined_DA
			}
			UKR_update_military = yes
			GER_remove_from_mitteleuropa = yes
			MIE_remove_from_intermarium = yes
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		add_stability = -0.02
		set_country_flag = UKR_federation_of_central_europe
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSF/PULD(s-f)
	id = ukrpol.214
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.214" }
	title = ukrpol.214.t
	desc = ukrpol.214.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_for_sender = yes

	major = yes
	show_major = {
		OR = {
			original_tag = UKR
			tag = WHR
			tag = GEO
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.214.a			
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.07
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { # UPSF/PULD(s-f)
	id = ukrpol.215
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.215" }
	title = ukrpol.215.t
	desc = ukrpol.215.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_freikrops

		name = ukrpol.215.a			
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = UKR_National_Personal_Autonomy }
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = GER
			modifier = UKR_german_autonomy
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.215.b		
		add_political_power = -30
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.07
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.215.c		
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
		UKR_breadbasket_add_consumer_goods = yes
		UKR_breadbasket_add_pp = yes
		UKR_breadbasket_add_monthly_population = yes
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSS
	id = ukrpol.220
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.220" }
	title = ukrpol.220.t
	desc = ukrpol.220.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.220.a			
		UKR_triumvirs_decrease_nationalism = yes
		add_stability = -0.1
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		add_ideas = UKR_nationalist_resistance
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = UKR_deal_with_nationalist_resistance }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.268
				days = 200
			}
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSS
	id = ukrpol.221
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.221" }
	title = ukrpol.221.t
	desc = ukrpol.221.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.221.a	
		set_global_flag = UKR_hetmanate_is_over
		clr_country_flag = UPR_uvo_openly_joins_dyrektoria
		add_to_variable = { dyrektoria_dirty = 1 }
		set_country_flag = UKR_compromises_with_nationalists
		UKR_triumvirs_increase_nationalism = yes
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = UKR_Dmytro_Andriyevskyi_sec_npo
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party2
			long_name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party2_long
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Andriy Melnyk"
			desc = "POLITICS_ANDRIY_MELNYK_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Andriy_Melnyk_Extra.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = junta_subtype
		}
		add_pataut_to_coalition = yes
		add_natpop_to_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_global_flag = UPR_dyrektoria_become_exiled_in_WSU }
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = UPR.party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat 
			}
			UPR = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_trait = UKR_uvo_officer }
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_temp_variable = { UKR_natpop_half_pop = party_popularity@national_populist }
				multiply_temp_variable = { UKR_natpop_half_pop = 50 }
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = national_populist
					popularity = UKR_natpop_half_pop
				}				
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					popularity = UKR_natpop_half_pop
				}				
				WSU = {
					every_unit_leader = {
						limit = { has_trait = UKR_uvo_officer }
						set_nationality = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}		
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSS
	id = ukrpol.222
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.220" }
	title = ukrpol.222.t
	desc = ukrpol.220.d

		UKR_triumvirs_increase_shapoval = yes
		UKR_triumvirs_increase_bolbochan = yes		
		add_stability = -0.1
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
	}

country_event = { # UPSS
	id = ukrpol.223
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.223" }
	title = ukrpol.223.t
	desc = ukrpol.223.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.223.a			
		set_global_flag = UKR_hetmanate_is_over
		UKR_triumvirs_increase_socialism = yes
		UKR_triumvirs_increase_bolbochan = yes
		remove_ideas_with_trait = economy_minister
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = UKR_Mykola_Shrag_eco_sde
		add_ideas = UKR_Fedir_Shvets_sec_sde
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = UKR_social_democrat_party4
			long_name = UKR_social_democrat_party4_long
		}
		add_socdem_to_coalition = yes
		add_radsoc_to_coalition = yes
		set_global_flag = UPR_dyrektoria_joined_peacefully
		clr_country_flag = UKR_dyrektoria_uprising_active
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_global_flag = UPR_dyrektoria_become_exiled_in_WSU } 
			}
			remove_ideas = UKR_political_instability
			UPR = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_id = 17908 }
					}
					set_unit_leader_flag = original_unr_leader
					set_nationality = UKR
				}
			}
			WSU = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_trait = UKR_uvo_officer }
					set_nationality = UKR
				}
			}
			clear_variable = UKR_Direktoriia_Strength
			clear_global_event_target = UKR_dyrektoria_headquarters
			else = {
				clr_global_flag = UPR_dyrektoria_become_exiled_in_WSU
				WSU = {
					every_unit_leader = {
						limit = { 
							NOT = { has_id = 17908 }
							has_unit_leader_flag = original_unr_leader 
						}
						set_nationality = UKR
					}
				}
			}
		}	
		add_ideas = UKR_compromises_with_dyrektoria
		hidden_effect = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				popularity = 0.05
			}	
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				name = UKR_social_liberal_party2
				long_name = UKR_social_liberal_party2_long
			}	
			XXA = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = original_unr_leader }
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
			}			
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSS
	id = ukrpol.225
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.225" }
	title = ukrpol.225.t
	desc = ukrpol.225.d
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_vasyl
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.225.a		
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				90 = {
					modifier = {
						set_temp_variable = { ai_chance = UKR_triumvirs_militarism }
						factor = ai_chance
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ukrpol.226
						days = 5
					}
				}
				10 = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrpol.229
						days = 5
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.225.b	
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_vasyl_first_president
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				90 = {
					modifier = {
						set_temp_variable = { ai_chance = UKR_triumvirs_militarism }
						factor = ai_chance
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ukrpol.226
						days = 5
					}
				}
				10 = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrpol.229
						days = 5
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSS
	id = ukrpol.226
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.226" }
	title = ukrpol.226.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.226.d1
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_vasyl_first_president }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.226.d2
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_vasyl_first_president }
	}
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_vasyl2
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.226.a		
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_vasyl_first_president }
			UKR_triumvirs_decrease_bolbochan = yes
			UKR_triumvirs_decrease_hrekiv = yes
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.228
				days = 7
			}
		}
		else = {
			UKR_triumvirs_decrease_shapoval = yes
			UKR_triumvirs_decrease_bolbochan = yes
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.227
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSS
	id = ukrpol.228
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.228" }
	title = ukrpol.228.t
	desc = ukrpol.228.d
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_vasyl5
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.228.a		
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		UKR_remove_king = yes
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Vilhelm fon Habsburg-Lotarynzkyi"
			desc = "POLITICS_VASYL_PRESIDENT_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Vasyl_Habsburg_suit.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = social_nationalism_subtype
		}
		set_global_flag = UKR_vasyl_a_common_man
		effect_tooltip = {
			create_corps_commander = { name = "Vilhelm fon Habsburg-Lotarynzkyi" }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			XXA = {
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 17989 }
					set_leader_name = UKR_wilhelm_franz_von_habsburg_ukrainian
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
			}
			random_other_country = { news_event = ukrpol.231 }
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.256
				days = 90
				random_days = 180
			}
		}
	}	
}

				limit = {
					OR = {
						check_variable = { UKR_triumvirs_bolbochan_coef > UKR_triumvirs_shapoval_coef }
						check_variable = { UKR_triumvirs_bolbochan_coef > UKR_triumvirs_hrekiv_coef }

							is_ai = yes
							OR = {
								has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN }
								has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN_DEMOCRACY }

					days = 2
				}
			}
			else = {

					id = ukrpol.230
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}

news_event = { # Crisis
	id = ukrpol.231
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.231" }
	title = ukrpol.231.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.231.d
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_vasyl_a_common_man }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol.231.d.vasyl
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = UKR_vasyl_a_common_man
		}
	}	
	
	picture = GFX_news_event_UKR_vasyl_abdication
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { wants_world_news = yes }
	major = yes
	fire_for_sender = no
	show_major = {
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			is_neighbor_of = UKR
		}
		NOT = { original_tag = UKR }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.231.a
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.231.b
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
	}		
}

		name = ukrpol.233.a	
		trigger = { tag = AUS }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_opinion_modifier = {

			modifier = UKR_outraged_by_putsch
		}

				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

		name = ukrpol.233.b

			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
					has_government = social_conservative
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				tag = GER
			}
		}

		add_stability = 0.02

			target = FROM
			modifier = UKR_condemns_the_putsch
		}
		FROM = {

				id = ukrpol.237
				days = 2
			}
		}

				XXA = {

						limit = { has_id = 17989 }

			}
		}

		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = UKR_deep_concern
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.238
				days = 2
			}
		}

			if = {

							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

			base = 30
		}

				remove_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea

			}
		}

			}		
		}
	}

country_event = { # UPSS
	id = ukrpol.245
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.245" }
	title = ukrpol.245.t
	desc = ukrpol.245.d
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_bolbochan
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.245.a	
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Leadership_Of_Bolbochan
		set_country_leader_ideology = authdem_junta_subtype
		add_ideas = UKR_Petro_Bolbochan_hog_ade
		add_ideas = UKR_Valentyn_Otamanovskyi_for_ade
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_militarist_nationalist 
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_socialist_nationalist 
				}
			}
			add_ideas = UKR_Oleksander_Natiyev_eco_ade
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_militarist_socialist 
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_socialist_militarist 
				}
			}
			add_ideas = UKR_Mykhailo_Bilynskyi_eco_ade
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = UKR_Yevhen_Arkhypenko_eco_ade
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_militarist_nationalist 
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_nationalist_militarist 
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_socialist_militarist 
				}
			}
			add_ideas = UKR_Volodymyr_Oskilko_sec_ade
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = UKR_Opanas_Andrievskyi_sec_ade
		}		
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_compromises_with_dyrektoria }
			end_coalition = yes
			set_country_flag = UKR_oppositional_dyrektoria
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = UKR_compromises_with_dyrektoria
				add_idea = UKR_dyrektoria_resistance
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.267
				days = 7
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = UKR_deal_with_dyrektoria_resistance }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrmisc.36
				days = 90
				random_days = 30
			}
		}
	}	
}

				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 12
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.257
				days = 265
			}
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { # UPSS
	id = ukrpol.247
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.247" }
	title = ukrpol.247.t
	desc = ukrpol.247.d
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_hrekiv
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.247.a	
		clr_country_flag = UKR_vasyl_first_president
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Batkivschyna_In_Power
		UKR_remove_king = yes
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party2
			long_name = UKR_authoritarian_democrat_party2_long
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Oleksandr Hrekiv"
			desc = "POLITICS_OLEKSANDR_HREKIV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Oleksandr_Hrekiv.png" 
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = authdem_junta_subtype
		}
		add_ideas = UKR_Oleksander_Hrekiv_hog_ade
		add_ideas = UKR_Valentyn_Otamanovskyi_for_ade
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_militarist_nationalist 
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_socialist_nationalist 
				}
			}
			add_ideas = UKR_Oleksander_Natiyev_eco_ade
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_militarist_socialist 
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_socialist_militarist 
				}
			}
			add_ideas = UKR_Mykhailo_Bilynskyi_eco_ade
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = UKR_Yevhen_Arkhypenko_eco_ade
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_militarist_nationalist 
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_nationalist_militarist 
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_socialist_militarist 
				}
			}
			add_ideas = UKR_Volodymyr_Oskilko_sec_ade
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = UKR_Opanas_Andrievskyi_sec_ade
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				UPR = { has_unit_leader = 17908 }
			}
			UPR = {
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 17908 }
					set_unit_leader_flag = original_unr_leader
					set_nationality = UKR
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				WSU = { has_unit_leader = 17908 }
			}
			WSU = {
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 17908 }
					set_unit_leader_flag = original_unr_leader
					set_nationality = UKR
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				XXA = {
					random_unit_leader = {
						limit = { has_id = 17908 }
						set_unit_leader_flag = original_unr_leader
						set_nationality = UKR
					}
				}
			}
		}		
	}	
}
country_event = { # UPSS
	id = ukrpol.249
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.249" }
	title = ukrpol.249.t
	desc = ukrpol.249.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.249.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = UKR_upss_socialist_nationalist
				has_country_flag = UKR_upss_socialist_militarist
				has_country_flag = UKR_upss_nationalist_socialist
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_CONSERVATIVE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_CONSERVATIVE_MONARCH }
				}
			}
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = UKR_Opanas_Andrievskyi_hog_ade
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_Opanas_Andrievskyi_sec_ade }
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = UKR_Volodymyr_Oskilko_sec_ade
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_vasyl_in_power = no }
			set_country_flag = UKR_presidential_elections
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Opanas Andriyevskyi"
				desc = "POLITICS_OPANAS_ANDRIYEVSKYI_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Opanas_Andriyevskyi.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = social_nationalism_subtype
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_leader_ideology = authdem_monsoc_subtype
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrmisc.36
					days = 90
					random_days = 30
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_compromises_with_nationalists }
			end_coalition = yes
			add_ideas = UKR_nationalist_resistance
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = UKR_deal_with_nationalist_resistance }
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrpol.268
					days = 200
				}
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Ukrainian_Socialism	
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.252
				days = 100
				random_days = 150
			}
		}		
	}	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.249.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = UKR_upss_socialist_nationalist
				has_country_flag = UKR_upss_socialist_militarist
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_SOCIALISM }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_MONSOC }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_socialist_nationalist
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_socialist_militarist
					has_country_flag = UKR_upss_nationalist_socialist
				}
			}
			set_country_leader_ideology = generic_national_democracy_subtype
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_compromises_with_dyrektoria }
			end_coalition = yes
			set_country_flag = UKR_oppositional_dyrektoria
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = UKR_compromises_with_dyrektoria
				add_idea = UKR_dyrektoria_resistance
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.267
				days = 7
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = UKR_deal_with_dyrektoria_resistance }
		}
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Adopt_Conservative_Platform
	}	
}

		add_stability = -0.05
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value = party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat }
			multiply_temp_variable = { UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value = 0.33 }
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value_reverse = 0 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { var = UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value_reverse value = party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat }
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value_reverse }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value }
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_shapoval_is_uskhd
	}	
}

					UKR_vasyl_president_in_power = yes
				}

		}

				}	
			}
		}

		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_2 = yes
		UKR_triumvirs_decrease_hrekiv = yes
		UKR_triumvirs_increase_shapoval = yes
		UKR_triumvirs_increase_socialism = yes

				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_SOCIALISM }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_MONSOC }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_HREKIV_JUNTA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_HREKIV_OTAMANOVSKYI }						
				}	
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.02
		add_political_power = 15
		UKR_triumvirs_increase_bolbochan = yes
		UKR_triumvirs_increase_nationalism = yes
		UKR_triumvirs_increase_militarism = yes
	}	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.265.b
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_CONSERVATIVE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_CONSERVATIVE_MONARCH }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KING_UPSS_BOLBOCHAN_DEMOCRACY }
				}	
			}
		}
		add_war_support = -0.01
		add_political_power = -20
		UKR_triumvirs_decrease_bolbochan = yes
		UKR_triumvirs_decrease_militarism = yes
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSS
	id = ukrpol.268
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.268" }
	title = ukrpol.268.t
	desc = ukrpol.268.d
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = UKR_nationalist_resistance
			has_idea = UKR_nationalist_resistance_1
			has_idea = UKR_nationalist_resistance_2
		}
		NOT = { owns_state = 91 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.268.a
		army_experience = -50
		add_command_power = -50
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_nationalist_resistance }
			remove_ideas = UKR_nationalist_resistance
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_nationalist_resistance_1 }
			remove_ideas = UKR_nationalist_resistance_1
		}
		else = {
			remove_ideas = UKR_nationalist_resistance_2
		}
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_trait = UKR_uvo_officer }
			set_nationality = WSU
		}
	}	
}

			base = 90

			}
		}

		add_war_support = 0.05

			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				free_building_slots = { building = industrial_complex size > 0 include_locked = yes }
				free_building_slots = { building = arms_factory size > 0 include_locked = yes }
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.269.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}

	}

country_event = { # Fall of Kyiv for Dyrektoria
	id = ukrpol.630
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol.630" }
	title = ukrpol.630.t
	desc = ukrpol.630.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_cossacks2
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol.630.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_hetman_abdicated }
			remove_ideas = UKR_hetman_abdicated
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { has_unit_leader = 17913 }
				}
				XXA = {
					random_unit_leader = {
						limit = { has_id = 17913 }
						set_nationality = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = 0.12
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = 0.08
			}
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = UKR_Ivan_Poltvets_Ostrianytsia_hog_pau
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Ivan Poltavets-Ostrianytsia"
			desc = "POLITICS_IVAN_POLTAVETS_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Ivan_Poltavets_Ostrianytsia.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = pataut_cossack_subtype
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_tech = cossack_corps_tech }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = cossack_corps_tech_effect
			hidden_effect = { set_technology = { cossack_corps_tech  = 1 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_template = "Kozatska Dyviziia" }
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "Kozatska Dyviziia"
				division_names_group = UKR_CAV_02
				regiments = {
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
				}
				support = {
					recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
				owner = ROOT
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.4"
				owner = ROOT
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
				owner = ROOT
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
				owner = ROOT
			}
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party4
			long_name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party4_long
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = UKR_cossack_state
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = UKR_khmel_host } }
			add_ideas = UKR_khmel_host			
			UKR_improve_ukrainisation = yes
		}		
	}	
}

			set_party_name = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				name = UKR_national_populist_party2
				long_name = UKR_national_populist_party2_long
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsun.12
			days = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # SUN Assembly
	id = ukrsun.12
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsun.12" }	
	title = ukrsun.12.t
	desc = ukrsun.12.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_uvo_flag
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsun.12.a
		add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_provid_modifier }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_uvo_propaganda_strong }
			set_variable = { UKR_provid_natpop_drift = 0.02 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_uvo_partisan_strong }
			set_variable = { UKR_provid_army_core_defence_factor = 0.02 }
			set_variable = { UKR_provid_equipment_capture = 0.02 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_uvo_military_strong }
			set_variable = { UKR_provid_army_experience_gain = 0.1 }
			set_variable = { UKR_provid_war_support_factor = 0.07 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_uvo_strong_grip }
			add_to_variable = { UKR_provid_natpop_drift = 0.01 }
			add_to_variable = { UKR_provid_pp_gain = 0.07 }
			else = {
				add_to_variable = { UKR_provid_consumer_goods = 0.03 }
				add_to_variable = { UKR_provid_stability_factor = 0.04 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_dontsov_culture }
			add_to_variable = { UKR_provid_war_support_factor = 0.1 }
			add_to_variable = { UKR_provid_conscription_factor = 0.02 }
			else = {
				add_to_variable = { UKR_provid_army_core_defence_factor = 0.03 }
				add_to_variable = { UKR_provid_productions_speed_arms_factory = 0.04 }
			}
		}		
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsun.13
			days = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # SUN Assembly
	id = ukrsun.13
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsun.13" }	
	title = ukrsun.13.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrsun.13.d
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Yevhen_Konovalets_dead }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsun.13.d2
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = Yevhen_Konovalets_dead
			check_variable = { UKR_dontsov_var < 3 }		
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsun.13.d3
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = Yevhen_Konovalets_dead
			check_variable = { UKR_dontsov_var > 2 }		
		}
	}
		
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_uvo
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsun.13.a
		set_country_flag = UKR_sun_assembly_concluded
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = Yevhen_Konovalets_dead
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UVO_DONTSOV }
					}
					check_variable = { UKR_dontsov_var > 2 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { UKR_dmytro_dontsov_in_power = no }
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Dmytro Dontsov"
					desc = "POLITICS_DMITRI_DONTSOV_DESC"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Dmitri_Dontsov.png"
					expire = "1.1.1"
					ideology = ukrainian_nationalism_subtype
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_party_name = { ideology = paternal_autocrat name = UKR_national_populist_party5 }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = national_populist
					name = UKR_national_populist_party4
					long_name = UKR_national_populist_party4_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					name = UKR_national_populist_party5
					long_name = UKR_national_populist_party5_long
				}
				add_pataut_to_coalition = yes
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Andriy Melnyk"
					desc = "POLITICS_ANDRIY_MELNYK_DESC"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Andriy_Melnyk_Extra.png"
					expire = "1.1.1"
					ideology = junta_subtype
				}
				UKR_melnyk_events = yes
			}			
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			add_ideas = UKR_Oleh_Olzhych_hog_pau
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = Yevhen_Konovalets_dead }
			if = { 
				limit = { UKR_andriy_melnyk_in_power = no }
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Andriy Melnyk"
					desc = "POLITICS_ANDRIY_MELNYK_DESC"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Andriy_Melnyk_Extra.png"
					expire = "1.1.1"
					ideology = ukrainian_nationalism_subtype
				}
			}
			else = { set_country_leader_ideology = ukrainian_nationalism_subtype }
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_dontsov_integralism }
				set_temp_variable = { UKR_sun_temp = UKR_sun_integralists }
				divide_temp_variable = { UKR_sun_temp = 2 }
				add_to_variable = { UKR_sun_nrm = UKR_sun_temp}
				add_to_variable = { UKR_sun_old_guard = UKR_sun_temp}
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { UKR_sun_integralists = UKR_sun_integralists }			
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_idea = UKR_Andriy_Melnyk_hog_pau }
				}
				remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
				add_ideas = UKR_Andriy_Melnyk_hog_pau
			}
			UKR_dontsov_events = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.1
			add_stability = 0.05
			set_country_leader_ideology = ukrainian_nationalism_subtype
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_idea = UKR_Andriy_Melnyk_hog_pau }
				}
				remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
				add_ideas = UKR_Andriy_Melnyk_hog_pau
			}
			UKR_dontsov_events = yes
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = UKR_nationalist
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				country_event = ukrfor.90
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Convene_Great_Assembly_OUN }
				}
				complete_national_focus = UKR_Convene_Great_Assembly_OUN
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = ukrsun.131
					days = 1
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsun.24
				days = 60
				random_days = 60
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsun.26
				days = 10
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsun.27
				days = 80
				random_days = 30
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsun.28
				days = 100
				random_days = 60
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.1
				days = 40
				random_days = 30
			}
			UKR_nrm_events = yes			
		}
	}	
}

	}

country_event = { # Extraordinary congress
	id = ukrsun.18
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsun.18" }
	title = ukrsun.18.t
	desc = ukrsun.18.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_stsiborskyi
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrsun.18.a
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_country_leader_ideology = ukrainian_nationalism_subtype }
			}
			set_country_leader_ideology = ukrainian_nationalism_subtype
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_isolate_uvo
		hidden_effect = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Andriy Richytskyi"
				desc = "POLITICS_ANDRIY_RYCHYTSKYI_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Andriy_Richytskyi.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = national_communism_subtype
				traits = { UKR_anticolonialist }
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				long_name = UKR_totalist_party
				name = UKR_totalist_party_long
			}
			remove_tot_from_coalition = yes			
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_natpop = party_popularity_100@national_populist}
			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_natpop = party_popularity_100@totalist  }

			set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_natpop }
			
			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_natpop = sum } #avoid rounding errors

			set_popularities = {
				totalist = 0
				syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
				radical_socialist = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist
				social_democrat = party_popularity_100@social_democrat
				social_liberal = party_popularity_100@social_liberal
				market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
				social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
				authoritarian_democrat = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat
				paternal_autocrat = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat
				national_populist = UKR_new_natpop
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_sun_mechanic_ended
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 17917 }
			retire = yes
		}
	}		
}
country_event = { # Extraordinary congress
	id = ukrsun.19
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsun.19" }
	title = ukrsun.19.t
	desc = ukrsun.19.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_dontsov
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrsun.19.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				UKR_dmytro_dontsov_in_power = yes
			}
			effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = paternal_autocrat }
			custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_isolate_dontsov
			hidden_effect = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = national_populist
					long_name = UKR_national_populist_party3
					name = UKR_national_populist_party3_long
				}			
				set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_pataut = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat}
				add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_pataut = party_popularity_100@national_populist  }

				set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@totalist }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_pataut }
				
				add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_pataut = sum } #avoid rounding errors

				set_popularities = {
					totalist = party_popularity_100@totalist
					syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
					radical_socialist = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist
					social_democrat = party_popularity_100@social_democrat
					social_liberal = party_popularity_100@social_liberal
					market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
					social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
					authoritarian_democrat = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat
					paternal_autocrat = UKR_new_pataut
					national_populist = 0
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_Dmitri_Dontsov_sec_npo }
			remove_ideas = UKR_Dmitri_Dontsov_sec_npo
			add_ideas = UKR_Vasyl_Kuchabskyi_sec_pau
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_sun_mechanic_ended
	}		
}

	option = {
		name = ukrsun.29.a
		set_temp_variable = { UKR_uvo_faction_change = 6 }
		UKR_nationalist_change_old = yes	
		add_stability = 0.03
		add_ideas = UKR_soborna_ukraina
		if = {
			limit = {
				137 = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
			}
			137 = { remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				1220 = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
			}
			1220 = { remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				1221 = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
			}
			1221 = { remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
		}		
	}

	id = ukrsun.45
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsun.45" }
	title = ukrsun.45.t
	desc = ukrsun.45.d

			UKR_dmytro_dontsov_in_power = yes
		}
	}

		name = ukrsun.45.a
		every_possible_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					has_socialist_government = yes
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
				}
			}
			reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { 
				target = UKR
				modifier = KR_hostile
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = { 
				target = UKR
				modifier = KR_hostile
			}
		}

		UKR_nationalist_change_int = yes

			ideology = totalist
			popularity = -0.05

			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = -0.05
		}

			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		set_variable = { UKR_Borotbyst_Riot_timeout = 68 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = UKR_Borotbyst_Riot }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = UKR_Borotbyst_Riot
				days = 18
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = UKR_Land_Reform_Plan }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = UKR_Land_Reform_Plan
				days = -30
			}
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = UKR
				modifier = KR_hates_govt
			}
		}
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_id = 17911
					has_id = 17901
					has_id = 17986
					has_id = 17942
					has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_borotbyst_loyalist
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
	}

country_event = { # 
	id = ukrsun.51
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsun.51" }
	title = ukrsun.51.t
	desc = ukrsun.51.d	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_shaian
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		UKR_dmytro_dontsov_in_power = yes
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Rely_On_Tradition }
		has_completed_focus = UKR_Ruthless_Xenophobia
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_sun_mechanic_ended }
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrsun.51.a
		set_country_flag = knights_of_solar_god
		set_country_flag = UKR_sun_mechanic_ended
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			name = UKR_sun_party
			long_name = UKR_sun_god_party_long
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Volodymyr Shaian"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Volodymyr_Shaian.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = occultism_subtype
			traits = { UKR_knight_of_solar_god }
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		remove_ideas_with_trait = foreign_minister
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = UKR_Volodymyr_Shaian_hog_npo
		add_ideas = UKR_Mykhailo_Havrylko_for_npo
		add_ideas = UKR_Yurii_Myroliubov_sec_npo
		division_template = {
			name = "Lytsary Ordena"
			division_names_group = UKR_INF_03
			regiments = {
				irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
				irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
				irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
				irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
				irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
				irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
				irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Lytsary Ordena\" start_experience_factor = 0.8"
				owner = PREV
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Lytsary Ordena\" start_experience_factor = 0.8"
				owner = PREV
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Lytsary Ordena\" start_experience_factor = 0.8"
				owner = PREV
			}
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = RDN
	}
}

country_event = { # 
	id = ukrsun.52
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsun.52" }
	title = ukrsun.52.t
	desc = ukrsun.52.d	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_stsiborskyi
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			UKR_uvo_in_power = yes
			UKR_dmytro_dontsov_in_power = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrsun.52.a
		set_temp_variable = { UKR_uvo_faction_change = 5 }
		UKR_nationalist_change_nrm = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.03 }
	}

country_event = { # 
	id = ukrsun.60
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsun.60" }
	title = ukrsun.60.t
	desc = ukrsun.60.d	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_SWE_army
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = MIE
		has_country_flag = UKR_nationalist_subversive_mie
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsun.60.a
		FROM = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
				ROOT = { divisions_in_state = { state = PREV size > 0 } }
			}
			teleport_armies = {
				limit = { tag = ROOT }
				to_state_array = owned_controlled_states
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			teleport_armies = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				to_state_array = owned_controlled_states
			}
		}
		GER_remove_from_mitteleuropa = yes
		MIE_remove_from_intermarium = yes
		remove_from_all_tech_sharing_groups = yes	
		create_faction = "Eastern Europe Defensive Pact"
		every_country = {
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = MIE_member 
				has_country_flag = MIE_member_will_be_couped
				NOT = { tag = FROM }
			}
			remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
			peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			MIE_remove_from_intermarium = yes
			country_event = ukrsun.61
		}
		MIE = { delete_unit = { id = 177013 } }
		clear_global_event_target = MIE_leader
		clr_global_flag = MIE_intermarium_formed
	}
}

country_event = { # 
	id = ukrsun.61
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsun.61" }
	title = ukrsun.61.t
	desc = ukrsun.61.d	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_SWE_army
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsun.61.a
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
				ROOT = { divisions_in_state = { state = PREV size > 0 } }
			}
			teleport_armies = {
				limit = { tag = ROOT }
				to_state_array = owned_controlled_states
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			teleport_armies = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				to_state_array = owned_controlled_states
			}
		}
		FROM = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { tag = LIT }
			clear_all_relations = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = LIT_german_economic_dominance_1 }
				remove_ideas = LIT_german_economic_dominance_1
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_idea = LIT_german_economic_dominance_2 }
				remove_ideas = LIT_german_economic_dominance_2
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = LIT_german_aviation_advisors }
				remove_ideas = LIT_german_aviation_advisors
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				LIT_remove_monarchy = yes				
			}
			GER = { country_event = LIT.212 }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Augustinas Voldemaras"
				desc = "POLITICS_VOLDEMARAS_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/LIT/Portrait_LIT_Augustinas_Voldemaras_KX.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = national_populist_subtype
			}
			set_temp_variable = { LIT_coup_popularity = LIT_LAF_threat }
			divide_temp_variable = { LIT_coup_popularity = 200 }
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = national_populist
				popularity = LIT_coup_popularity
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = national_populist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			add_ideas = LIT_aftermath_of_the_coup
			add_ideas = LIT_uprising_army

			load_focus_tree = lithuania_natpop_focus
			complete_national_focus = LIT_the_vilnius_coup

				if = {
					limit = { has_unit_leader = 76614 } #Vincas Vitkauskas

						limit = { has_id = 76614 }			
						remove_unit_leader = yes
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_unit_leader = 76615 } #Lucjan Zeligowski
					random_unit_leader = {
						limit = { has_id = 76615 }			
						remove_unit_leader = yes
					}
				}
			}
			add_state_claim = 188
			set_country_flag = Vincas_Vitkauskas_dead
			set_country_flag = Stasys_Rastikis_dead
			set_country_flag = Lucjan_Zeligowski_dead
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_all_minister_types = yes
				add_ideas = {
					LIT_Klemensas_Brunius_hog_npo
					LIT_Petras_Kubiliunas_for_npo
					LIT_Leonas_Prapuolenis_eco_npo
					LIT_Jonas_Statkus_sec_npo
				}
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 76614 }
					set_nationality = NSW
				}
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 76615 }
					set_nationality = POL
				}
				news_event = { id = worldnews.43 days = 1 }
				country_event = { id = LIT.301 days = 2 }
				country_event = { id = LIT.302 days = 3 }
				remove_ideas = LIT_increased_welfare_spending
				remove_ideas = LIT_agrarian_tax_relief
				remove_ideas = LIT_agricultural_revival
				remove_ideas = LIT_cultural_divide_1
				remove_ideas = LIT_cultural_divide_2
				remove_ideas = LIT_cultural_divide_3

				remove_ideas = LIT_welfare_state
				remove_ideas = LIT_social_economy_idea
				remove_ideas = LIT_long_road_to_pluralism_idea

				remove_ideas = LIT_military_funding_cuts_2

				remove_ideas = LIT_political_democracy_3

				remove_ideas = LIT_economic_democracy_4
				remove_ideas = LIT_economic_democracy_5
				remove_ideas = LIT_optimal_system_idea

				remove_ideas = LIT_unitary_state_9
				remove_ideas = LIT_tautos_vadas_idea
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = WHR }
			if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
				}
				complete_national_focus = WHR_The_Countercoup
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = national_populist
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = national_populist

				}
				remove_all_ministers = yes
				add_ideas = WHR_Vaclau_Lastouski_hog_npo
				add_ideas = WHR_Uladzislau_Kazlouski_for_npo
				add_ideas = WHR_Vaclau_Ivanouski_eco_npo
				add_ideas = WHR_Siarhey_Pjasetski_sec_npo
				clr_country_flag = WHR_ai_bulakhovich
				clr_country_flag = WHR_ai_revolution
				clr_country_flag = WHR_ai_german
				clr_country_flag = WHR_ai_anarchy
				clr_country_flag = sigismund_I_HoS
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = infantry_equipment
					amount = var:WHR.MIE_infantry_equipment_revolt
				}
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = support_equipment
					amount = var:WHR.MIE_support_equipment_revolt
				}
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = artillery_equipment
					amount = var:WHR.MIE_artillery_equipment_revolt
				}
				hidden_effect = {
					news_event = { id = worldnews.469 days = 1}
				}
				UKR = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = POL }
			if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
				}
				add_stability = 0.1
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = national_populist
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_country_flag = POL_ready_to_go_foreign
				hidden_effect = {
					set_cosmetic_tag = POL_REPUBLIC
					unlock_national_focus = POL_the_great_debate
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Roman Rybarski"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/POL/Portrait_POL_Roman_Rybarski.png"

						ideology = national_democracy_subtype
					}
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Bolesław Piasecki"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/POL/Portrait_POL_Boleslaw_Piasecki_KX.png"
						expire = "1.1.1"
						ideology = national_radicalism_subtype
					}
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "Władysław Studnicki"
						desc = "POLITICS_WLADYSLAW_STUDNICKI_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/POL/Portrait_POL_Wladyslaw_Studnicki.png"

						ideology = absolute_monarchy_subtype
					}

						picture = "gfx/leaders/POL/Portrait_POL_Julian_Leszczynski.png"

					}

						picture = "gfx/leaders/POL/Portrait_POL_Alfred_Lampe.png"
						expire = "1.1.1"
						ideology = centralized_syndicalism_subtype
					}

						picture = "gfx/leaders/POL/Portrait_POL_Adolf_Warski.png"

						days = 1
					}

						id = poland.195
						days = 28
					}
				}				
				add_ideas = {
					POL_Boleslaw_Piasecki_hog_npo
					POL_Marian_Reutt_for_npo
					POL_Jerzy_Rutkowski_eco_npo

					type = infantry_equipment
					amount = var:POL.MIE_infantry_equipment_revolt
				}
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = support_equipment
					amount = var:POL.MIE_support_equipment_revolt

					amount = var:POL.MIE_artillery_equipment_revolt

				}
				12 = {
					remove_core_of = ROOT

				}
				13 = {
					remove_core_of = ROOT
					add_claim_by = ROOT
					force_enable_resistance = { occupier = BAT occupied = EST clear = yes }
				}
				190 = {
					remove_core_of = ROOT
					add_claim_by = ROOT
					force_enable_resistance = { occupier = BAT occupied = LAT clear = yes }
				}

					remove_core_of = ROOT
					add_claim_by = ROOT
					force_enable_resistance = { occupier = BAT occupied = EST clear = yes }
				}

					transfer_state = 190
					transfer_state = 12
					transfer_technology = yes
					load_oob = "LAT"

						limit = { has_template = "Deutsch-Balt. Kampfbataillon" }
						delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Deutsch-Balt. Kampfbataillon" }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_template = "Freiwilligen-Regiment" }
						delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Freiwilligen-Regiment" }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_template = "Motorized-Kampfbataillon" }
						delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Motorized-Kampfbataillon" }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_template = "Panzer-Kampfbataillon" }
						delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Panzer-Kampfbataillon" }
					}
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = infantry_equipment
						amount = var:LAT.MIE_infantry_equipment_revolt
					}
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = support_equipment
						amount = var:LAT.MIE_support_equipment_revolt
					}

						amount = var:LAT.MIE_artillery_equipment_revolt
					}

						days = 2
					}
				}

					transfer_state = 191
					transfer_state = 13
					transfer_technology = yes
					load_oob = "EST"
					if = {
						limit = { has_template = "Deutsch-Balt. Kampfbataillon" }
						delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Deutsch-Balt. Kampfbataillon" }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_template = "Freiwilligen-Regiment" }
						delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Freiwilligen-Regiment" }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_template = "Motorized-Kampfbataillon" }
						delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Motorized-Kampfbataillon" }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_template = "Panzer-Kampfbataillon" }
						delete_unit_template_and_units = { division_template = "Panzer-Kampfbataillon" }
					}
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = infantry_equipment
						amount = var:EST.MIE_infantry_equipment_revolt
					}
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = support_equipment
						amount = var:EST.MIE_support_equipment_revolt
					}
					add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
						type = artillery_equipment
						amount = var:EST.MIE_artillery_equipment_revolt
					}
				}
				BAT_becomes_Riga = yes
				LAT = { annex_country = { target = BAT } }
				news_event = { id = worldnews.414 hours = 8 }
				baltic_germans_flee = yes
				UKR = { 
					add_to_faction = LAT 
					add_to_faction = BAT 
				}
			}
		}		
	}

country_event = { # 
	id = ukrsun.62
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsun.62" }
	title = ukrsun.62.t
	desc = ukrsun.62.d	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsun.62.a
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				if = {
					limit = { tag = POL }
					OR = {
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_foreign_policy option = POL_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
						UKR = { has_country_flag = UKR_pol_gal_relations_forever_destroyed }
					}
				}				
			}
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsun.63
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = MIE_member_will_be_couped
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsun.62.b
		FROM = { 
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsun.64
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # 
	id = ukrsun.63
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsun.63" }
	title = ukrsun.63.t
	desc = ukrsun.63.d	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsun.63.a
		add_political_power = 15
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM 
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
	}
}

	id = ukrsun.64
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsun.64" }

		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM 
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # 
	id = ukrsun.65
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsun.65" }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsun.65.a
		if = {
			limit = { tag = LIT }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_game_rule = { rule = LIT_path option = LIT_PATH_CHRISTIAN_DEMOCRAT }
						has_game_rule = { rule = LIT_path option = LIT_PATH_SOCIAL_DEMOCRAT }
						has_game_rule = { rule = LIT_path option = LIT_PATH_AUTHORITARIAN_DEMOCRAT }
						has_game_rule = { rule = LIT_path option = LIT_PATH_SOCIAL_LIBERAL }
						has_game_rule = { rule = LIT_path option = LIT_PATH_PATERNAL_AUTOCRAT }
						has_game_rule = { rule = LIT_path option = LIT_PATH_RADICAL_SOCIALIST }
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = MIE_member_will_be_couped
				FROM = { 
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsun.66
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				FROM = { 
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsun.67
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = BAT }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_game_rule = { rule = BAT_political_path option = BAT_POLITICAL_PATH_SCHIEMANN_SOCLIB }
						has_game_rule = { rule = BAT_political_path option = BAT_POLITICAL_PATH_SCHIEMANN_SOCCON }
						has_game_rule = { rule = BAT_political_path option = BAT_POLITICAL_PATH_SCHIEMANN_AUTDEM }
						has_game_rule = { rule = BAT_political_path option = BAT_POLITICAL_PATH_KNIGHTHOODS }
						has_game_rule = { rule = BAT_political_path option = BAT_POLITICAL_PATH_BROTHERHOOD }
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = MIE_member_will_be_couped
				FROM = { 
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsun.66
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				FROM = { 
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsun.67
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = WHR }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_situation option = WHR_SITUATION_ANARCHISTS_TOT }
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_situation option = WHR_SITUATION_ANARCHISTS_RADSOC }
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_situation option = WHR_SITUATION_BRA }
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_situation option = WHR_SITUATION_BPSR }
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_situation option = WHR_SITUATION_BSRH }
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_situation option = WHR_SITUATION_BSDP }
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_situation option = WHR_SITUATION_BSDP_KING }
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_situation option = WHR_SITUATION_BPSF }
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_situation option = WHR_SITUATION_BNP }
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_situation option = WHR_SITUATION_CENTRAL_RADA }
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_situation option = WHR_SITUATION_SIGISMUND_COUP }
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_situation option = WHR_SITUATION_GERMAN_GOVERNMENT }
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_situation option = WHR_SITUATION_BULAK_BALAKHOVICH }
					}
				}				
				set_country_flag = MIE_member_will_be_couped
				FROM = { 
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsun.66
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				FROM = { 
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsun.67
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = POL }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_the_great_debate option = POL_THE_GREAT_DEBATE_REPUBLIC }
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_the_great_debate option = POL_THE_GREAT_DEBATE_MILITARY }
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_the_great_debate option = POL_THE_GREAT_DEBATE_SYNDIE_RADSOC }
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_the_great_debate option = POL_THE_GREAT_DEBATE_SYNDIE_SYN }
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_the_great_debate option = POL_THE_GREAT_DEBATE_SYNDIE_TOTAL }
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_the_great_debate option = POL_THE_GREAT_DEBATE_KING_SAXON }
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_the_great_debate option = POL_THE_GREAT_DEBATE_KING_HABSBURG }
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_the_great_debate option = POL_THE_GREAT_DEBATE_KING_LITHUANIAN_COMMONWEALTH }
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_the_great_debate option = POL_THE_GREAT_DEBATE_KING_LITHUANIAN_SEPERATE }
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_the_great_debate option = POL_THE_GREAT_DEBATE_KING_POLISH }
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_sejm_election option = POL_SEJM_ELECTION_SOCLIB }
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_sejm_election option = POL_SEJM_ELECTION_MARLIB }
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_sejm_election option = POL_SEJM_ELECTION_SOCCON }
						has_game_rule = { rule = POL_sejm_election option = POL_SEJM_ELECTION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCH }
						UKR = { has_country_flag = UKR_pol_gal_relations_forever_destroyed }
					}
				}				
				set_country_flag = MIE_member_will_be_couped
				FROM = { 
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsun.66
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				FROM = { 
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsun.67
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
