### Dyrektoria Events ###
country_event = { # Victory
	id = ukrsoc.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.1" }
	immediate = { set_country_flag = UKR_can_secure_power }
	title = ukrsoc.1.t
	desc = ukrsoc.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_dyrektoria
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.1.a
		set_country_flag = UKR_natpops_in_opposition
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UPR_uvo_openly_joins_dyrektoria }
			custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_uvo_authority_increase
			add_to_variable = { UKR_uvo_authority = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { dyrektoria_dirty = 1 }
		}
		add_ideas = UKR_political_instability_dyrektoria
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.2
			days = 5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrmisc.42
				days = 10
				random_days = 30
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_dnieper_explosion }
				AUS = {
					country_event = ukrpol_explosion.9
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { # Victory
	id = ukrsoc.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.2" }
	title = ukrsoc.2.t
	desc = ukrsoc.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_protest2
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.2.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_FAILS_USDRP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_FAILS_UPSF }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_SHUMSKYI }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_FAILED_STATE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_MELNYK }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_vynnychenko_authority_increase
		add_to_variable = { UKR_vynnychenko_authority = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { dyrektoria_dirty = 1 }
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_anarchy_in_the_streets
			days = 125
		}
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.3
			days = 8
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.2.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UKP_R  }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UKP_S  }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UKP_SH  }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_SHUMSKYI }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_SHUMSKYI_SOVIET }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_SHUMSKYI_DICTATOR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSR_R  }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSR  }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_USDRP_R  }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_USDRP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSF_FEDERALIST }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSF_LIBERAL }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UVO_DONTSOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UVO_MELNYK }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_petliura_authority_increase
		add_to_variable = { UKR_petliura_authority = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { dyrektoria_dirty = 1 }
		add_stability = 0.03
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.3
			days = 8
		}
	}	
}

					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UKP_SH  }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_SHUMSKYI }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_SHUMSKYI_SOVIET }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_SHUMSKYI_DICTATOR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSR_R  }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSR  }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_USDRP_R  }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_USDRP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSF_FEDERALIST }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSF_LIBERAL }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UVO_DONTSOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UVO_MELNYK }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_petliura_authority_increase
		add_to_variable = { UKR_petliura_authority = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { dyrektoria_dirty = 1 }
		add_stability = 0.03
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_rampant_crime
			days = 30
		}
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.6
			days = 8
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { # Victory
	id = ukrsoc.9
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.9" }
	title = ukrsoc.9.t
	desc = ukrsoc.9.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_rada
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.9.a
		trigger = { check_variable = { UKR_vynnychenko_authority > UKR_petliura_authority } }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_petliura_authority = -2 }
		add_to_variable = { dyrektoria_dirty = 1 }
		remove_ideas = UKR_political_instability_dyrektoria
		add_stability = 0.06
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_congress_begins
		effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = UKR_All_Ukrainian_Constituent_Congress }
		set_variable = { UKR_ukapist_authority = 0 }
		set_variable = { UKR_borbist_authority = 0 }
		set_variable = { UKR_eser_authority = 0 }
		set_variable = { UKR_esdek_authority = 0 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = UPR_soclibs_leave_dyrektoria }
			}
			set_variable = { UKR_esef_authority = 0 }
		}
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.13
			days = 3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.8
				days = 7
				random_days = 21
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.14
				days = 14
				random_days = 30
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.9.b
		trigger = { check_variable = { UKR_vynnychenko_authority < UKR_petliura_authority } }
		set_variable = { UKR_vynnychenko_authority = 0 }
		add_to_variable = { dyrektoria_dirty = 1 }
		remove_ideas = UKR_political_instability_dyrektoria
		add_stability = 0.06
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_anarchy_in_the_streets }
			remove_ideas = UKR_anarchy_in_the_streets
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Symon Petliura"
			desc = "POLITICS_SYMON_PETLIURA_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Symon_Petliura.png" 
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = socdem_junta_subtype
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			UKR_Symon_Petliura_hog_sde
			UKR_Ivan_Romanchenko_for_sde
			UKR_Andriy_Zhuk_eco_sde
			UKR_Oleksander_Dotsenko_sec_sde
		}
		end_coalition = yes
		clr_country_flag = UKR_dyrektoria_tree_unlocked
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Petliura_Coup
		set_variable = { UKR_petliura_resistance_mission_cost = 25 }
		set_variable = { UKR_shumskyi_resistance_mission_days = 35 }
		set_variable = { UKR_melnyk_resistance_mission_cost = 25 }
		set_variable = { UKR_usdrp_resistance_mission_cost = 25 }
		set_variable = { UKR_uns_leftwing_resistance_mission_cost = 35 }
		set_variable = { UKR_uns_rightwing_resistance_mission_cost = 35 }
		set_variable = { UKR_shumskyi_resistance_mission_cost = 25 }
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = UKR_social_democrat_party6
			long_name = UKR_social_democrat_party6_long
		}		
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.8
				days = 7
				random_days = 21
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.14
				days = 14
				random_days = 30
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.250
				days = 2
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.259
				days = 20
				random_days = 20
			}
			random_other_country = { news_event = ukrnews.5 }
		}
	}

		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Elect_New_Ataman }
				}
				unlock_national_focus = UKR_Elect_New_Ataman
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsoc.273
						days = 25
						random_days = 15
					}
				}	
				country_event = ukrsoc.283		
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = {
						is_field_marshal = yes
						has_id = 17908
					}
					demote_leader = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = UKR_Symon_Petliura_carm }
					remove_ideas = UKR_Symon_Petliura_carm
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { # UKP 
	id = ukrsoc.28
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.28" }
	title = ukrsoc.28.t
	desc = ukrsoc.28.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.28.a
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 34
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UKP_S }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UKP_SH }
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_totalist = party_popularity_100@totalist}
			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_totalist = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist  }

			set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_totalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@national_populist }

			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_totalist = sum } #avoid rounding errors

			set_popularities = {
				totalist = UKR_new_totalist
				syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
				radical_socialist = 0
				social_democrat = party_popularity_100@social_democrat
				social_liberal = party_popularity_100@social_liberal
				market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
				social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
				authoritarian_democrat = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat
				paternal_autocrat = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat
				national_populist = party_popularity_100@national_populist
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = totalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Andriy Richytskyi"
			desc = "POLITICS_ANDRIY_RYCHYTSKYI_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Andriy_Richytskyi.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = richytskyi_thought_subtype
			traits = { UKR_anticolonialist }
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			UKR_Andriy_Richytskyi_hog_tot
			UKR_Mykola_Khvylovyi_for_rso
			UKR_Mykhailo_Yalovy_eco_rso
			UKR_Mykhailo_Tkachenko_sec_rso
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = { news_event = ukrnews.8 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.28.b
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 33 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UKP_R }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UKP_SH }
				}
			}
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mykola Skrypnyk"
			desc = "POLITICS_MYKOLA_SKRYPNYK_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Mykola_Skrypnyk.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_communism_subtype
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			UKR_Mykola_Skrypnyk_hog_rso
			UKR_Mykola_Khvylovyi_for_rso
			UKR_Yuri_Lapchynskyi_eco_rso
			UKR_Mykola_Skrypnyk_sec_rso
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = { news_event = ukrnews.10 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.28.c
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UKP_R }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UKP_S }
				}
			}
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 17938 }
			clr_unit_leader_flag = UKR_borotbyst_loyalist
			promote_leader = yes
		}		
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_shakhrai_in_power = no }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Vasyl Shakhrai"
				desc = "POLITICS_VASYL_SHAKHRAI_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Vasyl_Shakhrai.png" 
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = radsoc_national_communism_subtype
			}
		}		
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = { news_event = ukrnews.9 }
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { # Richytskyi events
	id = ukrsoc.44
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.44" }
	title = ukrsoc.44.t
	desc = ukrsoc.44.d
	trigger = {
		has_idea = UKR_dekulakization
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Step_Back }
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_New_Farming_Communes }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.44.a
		set_temp_variable = { UKR_uprising_debuff = UKR_kulak_strength }
		divide_temp_variable = { UKR_uprising_debuff = -20 }
		add_stability = UKR_uprising_debuff
		add_war_support = UKR_uprising_debuff
		multiply_temp_variable = { UKR_uprising_debuff = 1000 }
		add_political_power = UKR_uprising_debuff
		set_temp_variable_to_random = {
			var = UKR_infantry_equipment_lost
			min = -500
			max = -50
		}
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = var:UKR_infantry_equipment_lost
		}
		set_temp_variable_to_random = {
			var = UKR_manpower_lost
			min = -250
			max = -25
		}
		add_manpower = UKR_manpower_lost
		add_to_variable = { UKR_kulak_strength = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.44
				days = 55
				random_days = 100
			}
		}	
	}	
}

			ideology = social_democrat

		}		
	}	
}

	title = ukrsoc.52.t
	desc = ukrsoc.52.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.52.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.7
				has_socialist_government = no
				has_left_democratic_government = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = { KCN_add_to_kcn_council = yes }
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = UKR_Kyiv_Conference_decisions
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = hosts_kyiv_conference
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.53
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.52.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_socialist_government = no
				has_left_democratic_government = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = KCN_refused_kcn_participation
	}	
}

country_event = { # Kyiv Conference
	id = ukrsoc.54
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.54" }
	title = ukrsoc.54.t
	desc = ukrsoc.54.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.54.a
		add_political_power = 100
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_other_country = {
					has_country_flag = kcn_council_vote
					has_socialist_government = yes
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.55
				days = 2
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.58
				days = 20
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.59
				days = 25
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.60
				days = 30
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.61
				days = 35
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.63
				days = 40
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.58
				days = 5
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.59
				days = 10
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.60
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.61
				days = 20
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.63
				days = 25
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Economci cooperation - voting
	id = ukrsoc.65
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.65 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = ukrsoc.65.t
	desc = ukrsoc.65.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Yes
		name = KCN_vote_yes
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 30
				has_government = totalist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				has_democratic_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes = 1 }
	}

	option = {	#No
		name = KCN_vote_no
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				ROOT = { 
					OR = {
						GER_is_in_mitteleuropa = yes
						is_in_array = { global.asian_economic_sphere = THIS }
						is_in_tech_sharing_group = phalanstere_research
					}
				}				
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.kcn_no_votes = 1 }
	}

	option = {	#Abstain
		name = KCN_vote_abstain
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 25
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.kcn_abstain_votes = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { # Kyiv Conference
	id = ukrsoc.69
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.69" }
	title = {
		text = ukrsoc.69.t.yes
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes > global.kcn_no_votes } }
	}
	title = {
		text = ukrsoc.69.t.no
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes < global.kcn_no_votes } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.69.d.yes
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes > global.kcn_no_votes } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.69.d.no
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes < global.kcn_no_votes } }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.69.a
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes > global.kcn_no_votes } }
		add_political_power = 25
		set_global_flag = KCN_economic_yes
		KCN_add_to_kcn_economic = yes
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = kcn_council_vote }
			}
			country_event = ukrsoc.71
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = kcn_council_vote
					OR = {
						GER_is_in_mitteleuropa = yes
						is_in_array = { global.asian_economic_sphere = THIS }
						is_in_tech_sharing_group = phalanstere_research
					}
				}
				set_temp_variable = { KCN_vote_delay = 2 }
				for_each_scope_loop = {
					array = global.KCN_voters
					country_event = { id = ukrsoc.70 days = KCN_vote_delay }
					add_to_temp_variable = { KCN_vote_delay = 1 }
				}
			}
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = kcn_council_vote
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							GER_is_in_mitteleuropa = yes
							is_in_array = { global.asian_economic_sphere = THIS }
							is_in_tech_sharing_group = phalanstere_research
						}
					}
				}
				set_temp_variable = { KCN_vote_delay = 2 }
				for_each_scope_loop = {
					array = global.KCN_voters
					country_event = { id = ukrsoc.71 days = KCN_vote_delay }
					add_to_temp_variable = { KCN_vote_delay = 1 }
				}
			}
		}			
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.69.b
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes < global.kcn_no_votes } }
		add_political_power = -25
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}	
}
country_event = { # Kyiv Conference
	id = ukrsoc.70
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.70" }
	title = ukrsoc.70.t
	desc = ukrsoc.70.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.70.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					GER_is_in_mitteleuropa = yes
					is_in_array = { global.asian_economic_sphere = THIS }
					is_in_tech_sharing_group = phalanstere_research
				}
			}
		}			
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = JAP_member_integration_1
				has_idea = JAP_member_integration_2
				has_idea = JAP_member_integration_3
			}
		}
		GER_leave_mitteleuropa = yes
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_tech_sharing_group = phalanstere_research }
			remove_from_tech_sharing_group = phalanstere_research
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_array = { global.asian_economic_sphere = ROOT } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = JAP_withdraws_from_sphere
			hidden_effect = { country_event = japfor.404 }
			JAP = {
				add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_outraged }
				country_event = japfor.409
			}
			remove_ideas = JAP_nav_tra_idea
		}
		KCN_add_to_kcn_economic = yes
	}	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.70.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					GER_is_in_mitteleuropa = yes
					is_in_array = { global.asian_economic_sphere = THIS }
					is_in_tech_sharing_group = phalanstere_research
				}
			}
		}		
	}		
}

	id = ukrsoc.72
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.72" }
	title = {
		text = ukrsoc.72.t.yes
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes > global.kcn_no_votes } }
	}
	title = {
		text = ukrsoc.72.t.no
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes < global.kcn_no_votes } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.72.d.yes
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes > global.kcn_no_votes } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.72.d.no
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes < global.kcn_no_votes } }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.72.a
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes > global.kcn_no_votes } }
		add_political_power = 25
		set_global_flag = KCN_research_yes			
		add_to_tech_sharing_group = kyiv_conf_research
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = kcn_council_vote }
			}
			country_event = ukrsoc.73
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = kcn_council_vote
					is_in_tech_research_group = yes
				}
				set_temp_variable = { KCN_vote_delay = 2 }
				for_each_scope_loop = {
					array = global.KCN_voters
					country_event = { id = ukrsoc.73 days = KCN_vote_delay }
					add_to_temp_variable = { KCN_vote_delay = 1 }
				}
			}
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = kcn_council_vote
					is_in_tech_research_group = no
				}
				set_temp_variable = { KCN_vote_delay = 2 }
				for_each_scope_loop = {
					array = global.KCN_voters
					country_event = { id = ukrsoc.74 days = KCN_vote_delay }
					add_to_temp_variable = { KCN_vote_delay = 1 }
				}
			}
		}			
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.72.b
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes < global.kcn_no_votes } }
		add_political_power = -25
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}	
}

	title = ukrsoc.73.t
	desc = ukrsoc.73.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {

		ai_chance = {
			base = 70

				factor = 0.8
				is_in_tech_research_group = yes
			}
		}			
		hidden_effect = { remove_from_all_tech_sharing_groups = yes }
		add_to_tech_sharing_group = kyiv_conf_research

		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				is_in_tech_research_group = yes
			}
		}		
	}

	title = ukrsoc.74.t
	desc = ukrsoc.74.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.74.a

			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_socialist_government = no
				has_left_democratic_government = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 30
				has_government = totalist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				has_democratic_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}			
		hidden_effect = { remove_from_all_tech_sharing_groups = yes }
		add_to_tech_sharing_group = kyiv_conf_research

country_event = { #KCN offers us an alliance
	id = ukrsoc.75
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.75" }
	title = ukrsoc.75.t
	desc = ukrsoc.75.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.75.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.7
				has_socialist_government = no
				has_left_democratic_government = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = hosts_kyiv_conference
		}
		FROM = {
			set_country_flag = KCN_allied_@ROOT
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.76
				days = 3
				random = 72
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.75.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = KCN_allied_@FROM }
		}
		set_country_flag = KCN_alliance_refused_@FROM
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_socialist_government = no
				has_left_democratic_government = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = KCN_refused_kcn_participation
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.76
				days = 3
				random = 72
			}
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { #Country responds
	id = ukrsoc.76
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.76" }

	title = {
		text = ukrsoc.76.t.accept
		trigger = { has_country_flag = KCN_allied_@FROM }
	}
	title = {
		text = ukrsoc.76.t.refuse
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = KCN_allied_@FROM } }
	}

	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.76.d.accept
		trigger = { has_country_flag = KCN_allied_@FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.76.d.refuse
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = KCN_allied_@FROM } }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.76.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = KCN_allied_@FROM
		}
		clr_country_flag = KCN_allied_@FROM
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = FROM decision = KCN_initialize_country_accept }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.76.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = KCN_allied_@FROM }
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Membership - voting
	id = ukrsoc.77
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.77 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = ukrsoc.77.t
	desc = ukrsoc.77.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Yes
		name = KCN_vote_yes
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				event_target:KCN_candidate_membership = { same_government_type_as_ROOT_authoritarian = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				event_target:KCN_candidate_membership = { same_continent_as_ROOT = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 30
				event_target:KCN_candidate_membership = { has_same_government_as_ROOT = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				event_target:KCN_candidate_membership = { same_government_type_as_ROOT_authoritarian = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				event_target:KCN_candidate_membership = { any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_owned_state = { 
					OR = {
						is_claimed_by = event_target:KCN_candidate_membership
						is_core_of = event_target:KCN_candidate_membership
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes = 1 }
	}

	option = {	#No
		name = KCN_vote_no
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
				event_target:KCN_candidate_membership = { any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
				any_owned_state = { 
					OR = {
						is_claimed_by = event_target:KCN_candidate_membership
						is_core_of = event_target:KCN_candidate_membership
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				event_target:KCN_candidate_membership = { same_government_type_as_ROOT_authoritarian = no }
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.kcn_no_votes = 1 }
	}

	option = {	#Abstain
		name = KCN_vote_abstain
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				event_target:KCN_candidate_membership = { same_continent_as_ROOT = no }
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.kcn_abstain_votes = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { # Kyiv Conference
	id = ukrsoc.79
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.79" }
	title = {
		text = ukrsoc.79.t.yes
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes > global.kcn_no_votes } }
	}
	title = {
		text = ukrsoc.79.t.no
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes < global.kcn_no_votes } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.79.d.yes
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes > global.kcn_no_votes } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.79.d.no
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes < global.kcn_no_votes } }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.79.a
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes > global.kcn_no_votes } }
		event_target:KCN_candidate_membership = {
			KCN_add_to_kcn_council = yes
			country_event = ukrsoc.80
			if = {
				limit = { has_socialist_government = yes }
				country_event = ukrsoc.56
			}
		}
		clear_global_event_target = KCN_candidate_membership
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.79.b
		trigger = { check_variable = { global.kcn_yes_votes < global.kcn_no_votes } }
		add_political_power = -25
		event_target:KCN_candidate_membership = {
			country_event = ukrsoc.81
		}
		clear_global_event_target = KCN_candidate_membership
	}	
}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		add_manpower = -5000
		effect_tooltip = {
			send_equipment = {
				target = FROM
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = 500
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = KCN_manpower_and_guns
	}

	option = { # some mans
		name = ukrsoc.83.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		add_manpower = -5000
		set_country_flag = KCN_manpower		
	}

	option = { # some guns

		}

		effect_tooltip = {
			send_equipment = {
				target = FROM
				type = infantry_equipment

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { # get support from europe
	id = ukrsoc.84
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.84"}
	title = ukrsoc.84.t
	desc = ukrsoc.84.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_IRE_german_volunteers

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		FROM = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = KCN_manpower_and_guns
				has_country_flag = KCN_manpower
				has_country_flag = KCN_guns
			}
		}
	}

	option = { # manpower and some guns
		name = ukrsoc.84.a
		trigger = {
			FROM = { has_country_flag = KCN_manpower_and_guns }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		add_manpower = 5000
		FROM = { 
			clr_country_flag = KCN_manpower_and_guns
			send_equipment = {
				target = ROOT
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = 500
			}
		}
	}

	option = { # some mans
		name = ukrsoc.84.a
		trigger = {
			FROM = { has_country_flag = KCN_manpower }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
		add_manpower = 5000
		FROM = { clr_country_flag = KCN_manpower }
	}

	option = { # some guns
		name = ukrsoc.84.a
		trigger = {
			FROM = { has_country_flag = KCN_guns }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
		FROM = { 
			clr_country_flag = KCN_guns

				target = ROOT

			}

country_event = { # UKP 
	id = ukrsoc.113
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.113" }
	title = ukrsoc.113.t
	desc = ukrsoc.113.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.113.a
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { is_faction_leader = yes } }
			FROM = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
			}
			INT = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
		}
		else = {
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = yes
			}
			give_guarantee = FROM
			FROM = { give_guarantee = ROOT }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { has_government = totalist }
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				name = UKR_radical_socialist_party
				long_name = UKR_radical_socialist_party_long
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = totalist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Mykola Skrypnyk"
				desc = "POLITICS_MYKOLA_SKRYPNYK_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Mykola_Skrypnyk.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = national_communism_subtype
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_radsoc = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist }
				add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_radsoc = party_popularity_100@totalist  }

				set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_radsoc }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@national_populist }

				add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_radsoc = sum } #avoid rounding errors

				set_popularities = {
					totalist = 0
					syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
					radical_socialist = UKR_new_radsoc
					social_democrat = party_popularity_100@social_democrat
					social_liberal = party_popularity_100@social_liberal
					market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
					social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
					authoritarian_democrat = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat
					paternal_autocrat = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat
					national_populist = party_popularity_100@national_populist
				}
				set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_radsoc = UKR.party_popularity_100@radical_socialist }
				divide_temp_variable = { UKR_new_radsoc = 3 }

				set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_totalist = UKR.party_popularity_100@totalist }
				add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_totalist = UKR_new_radsoc }

				set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_totalist }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_radsoc }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat }
				subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@national_populist }

				add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_totalist = sum } #avoid rounding errors

				set_popularities = {
					totalist = UKR_new_totalist
					syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
					radical_socialist = UKR_new_radsoc
					social_democrat = party_popularity_100@social_democrat
					social_liberal = party_popularity_100@social_liberal
					market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
					social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
					authoritarian_democrat = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat
					paternal_autocrat = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat
					national_populist = party_popularity_100@national_populist
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			UKR_update_military = yes
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.117
				days = 180
				random_days = 300
			}
		}
	}		
}

country_event = { # UKP 
	id = ukrsoc.121
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.121" }
	title = ukrsoc.121.t
	desc = ukrsoc.121.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.121.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_in_faction_with = RUS
						is_guaranteed_by = RUS
						has_guaranteed = RUS
						has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_borotbysts
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = ukrsoc.123
					days = 4
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Success < 30 }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsoc.123
						days = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Success > 29 }
						check_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Success < 50 }
					}
					set_country_flag = UKR_fragile_alliance
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsoc.122
						days = 4
					}
				}
				else = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsoc.122
						days = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # UKP 
	id = ukrsoc.122
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.122" }
	title = {
		text = ukrsoc.122.t
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_fragile_alliance }
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = ukrsoc.122.t2
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_fragile_alliance }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.122.d
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_fragile_alliance }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.122.d2
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_fragile_alliance }
	}
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.122.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_fragile_alliance }
			decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
			add_stability = 0.05
			unlock_national_focus = UKR_Stable_Two_Party
			add_synd_to_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_resistance_change = -5 }
			UKR_land_reform_borotbysts_weaken = yes
			add_to_variable = { UKR_Borotbyst_Riot_timeout = 30 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_active_mission = UKR_Borotbyst_Riot }
				add_days_mission_timeout = {
					mission = UKR_Borotbyst_Riot
					days = 30
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = UKR_disable_borotbist_uprisings
			add_synd_to_coalition = yes
			remove_ideas_with_trait = foreign_minister
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = {
				UKR_Antin_Prikhodko_for_rso
				UKR_Hryhorii_Hrynko_sec_rso
			}
			increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
			add_stability = 0.1
			set_country_flag = UKR_ukp_borotbist_success
			effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = UKR_Stable_Two_Party }
			hidden_effect = {
				XXA = {
					every_unit_leader = {
						limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_borotbyst_loyalist }
						set_nationality = UKR
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # USDRP
	id = ukrsoc.124
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.124" }
	title = ukrsoc.124.t
	desc = ukrsoc.124.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.124.a
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = UKR_future
					option = UKR_FUTURE_USDRP_R
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = UKR_future
					option = UKR_FUTURE_USDRP
				}
			}
		}
		UKR_USDRP_more_left = yes
		set_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Success = 30 }
		set_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Popularity = 50 }		
		set_country_flag = LandReformBegunUKR
		set_country_flag = UKR_Socialization_Land
		custom_effect_tooltip = LandReformBegunUKR_desc
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = UKR_land_reform
		activate_mission = UKR_Land_Reform_Plan
		hidden_effect = {			
			add_ideas = UKR_land_reform
			activate_mission = UKR_Borotbyst_Riot
			UKR_recalculate_land_reform = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.124.b
		ai_chance = { base = 25 }
		UKR_USDRP_more_center = yes
		set_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Success = 45 }
		set_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Popularity = 25 }		
		set_country_flag = LandReformBegunUKR
		set_country_flag = UKR_Municipalization_Land
		custom_effect_tooltip = LandReformBegunUKR_desc
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = UKR_land_reform
		activate_mission = UKR_Land_Reform_Plan
		hidden_effect = {			
			add_ideas = UKR_land_reform
			activate_mission = UKR_Borotbyst_Riot
			UKR_recalculate_land_reform = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.124.c
		ai_chance = { base = 25 }
		UKR_USDRP_more_center = yes
		set_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Success = 35 }
		set_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Popularity = 15 }		
		set_country_flag = LandReformBegunUKR
		custom_effect_tooltip = LandReformBegunUKR_desc
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = UKR_land_reform
		activate_mission = UKR_Land_Reform_Plan
		hidden_effect = {			
			add_ideas = UKR_land_reform
			activate_mission = UKR_Borotbyst_Riot
			UKR_recalculate_land_reform = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.124.e
		ai_chance = { base = 25 }
		UKR_USDRP_more_right = yes
		set_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Success = 35 }
		set_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Popularity = 20 }		
		set_country_flag = LandReformBegunUKR
		custom_effect_tooltip = LandReformBegunUKR_desc
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = UKR_land_reform
		activate_mission = UKR_Land_Reform_Plan
		hidden_effect = {			
			add_ideas = UKR_land_reform
			activate_mission = UKR_Borotbyst_Riot
			UKR_recalculate_land_reform = yes
		}
	}

				set_nationality = USR
			}

				limit = { has_id = 17923 }

				set_nationality = USR
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { # USDRP
	id = ukrsoc.127
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.127" }
	title = ukrsoc.127.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.127.d.usdrp
		trigger = { UKR_usdrp_in_power = yes }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.127.d.upsr
		trigger = { UKR_upsr_in_power = yes }
	}	
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.127.d.ukp
		trigger = { UKR_ukp_in_power = yes }
	}	
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.127.d.upsrb
		trigger = { UKR_borotbysts_in_power = yes }
	}	
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.127.a
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = UKR_future
					option = UKR_FUTURE_USDRP_R
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = UKR_future
					option = UKR_FUTURE_USDRP
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_usdrp_in_power = yes }
			UKR_USDRP_more_left = yes
		}
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = -0.07
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions
					has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions
					has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh
				}
			}
			GER = { country_event = ukrsoc.134 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_idea = UKR_aus_some_concessions }
			}
			AUS = { country_event = ukrsoc.134 }
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = BEL
					tag = POL
					tag = SWE
					tag = CZE
					tag = HOL
				}
				NOT = { 
					is_subject_of = UKR 
					is_in_faction_with = UKR
				}
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = UKR
				modifier = UKR_nationalized_our_assets
			}
			country_event = ukrsoc.134
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_usdrp_in_power = no }
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.128
				days = 5
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_mass_nationalization_drive_tt
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_mass_nationalization
			days = 273
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { UKR_industry_cost = 20 }
		subtract_from_variable = { UKR_industry_cost_high = 20 }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.127.b
		trigger = { 
			UKR_ukp_in_power = no 
			UKR_borotbysts_in_power = no
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 35 }
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_usdrp_in_power = yes }
			UKR_USDRP_more_center = yes
		}
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_2 = yes
		add_political_power = -25
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions
					has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions
					has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh
				}
			}
			GER = { country_event = ukrsoc.134 }
		}

			}

		}
		if = {

			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions
				days = 1825
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { FROM = { tag = BEL } }

				idea = UKR_bel_some_concessions
				days = 1825
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { tag = AUS } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = UKR_aus_some_concessions
				days = 1825
			}
		}
		if = {

				days = 1825
			}
		}
		if = {

			add_timed_idea = {

				days = 1825
			}
		}

				days = 1825
			}
		}

	id = ukrsoc.131
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.131" }
	title = ukrsoc.131.t
	desc = ukrsoc.131.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.131.a
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = UKR_future
					option = UKR_FUTURE_USDRP_R
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = UKR_future
					option = UKR_FUTURE_USDRP
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_usdrp_in_power = yes }
			UKR_USDRP_more_left = yes
		}
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_2 = yes
		add_stability = 0.02
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.133
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}				
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.131.b
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_usdrp_in_power = yes }
			UKR_USDRP_more_right = yes
		}
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		add_stability = -0.02
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_paying_compensations_3 }
			remove_ideas = UKR_paying_compensations_3
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = UKR_paying_compensations_4
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_paying_compensations_2 }
			remove_ideas = UKR_paying_compensations_2
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = UKR_paying_compensations_3
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_paying_compensations_1 }
			remove_ideas = UKR_paying_compensations_1
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = UKR_paying_compensations_2
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_paying_compensations_0 }
			remove_ideas = UKR_paying_compensations_0
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = UKR_paying_compensations_1
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = UKR_paying_compensations_0 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = UKR_paying_compensations_0
				days = 365
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.132
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}				
	}			
}

			target = UKR

		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_ukrainian_compensation
			days = 365
		}
	}			
}

country_event = { # USDRP
	id = ukrsoc.136
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.136" }
	title = {
		text = ukrsoc.136.t.left
		trigger = { UKR_USDRP_left = yes }
	}
	title = {
		text = ukrsoc.136.t.centre
		trigger = { 
			UKR_USDRP_left = no
			UKR_USDRP_right = no
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = ukrsoc.136.t.right
		trigger = { UKR_USDRP_right = yes }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.136.d.left
		trigger = { UKR_USDRP_left = yes }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.136.d.centre
		trigger = { 
			UKR_USDRP_left = no
			UKR_USDRP_right = no
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.136.d.right
		trigger = { UKR_USDRP_right = yes }
	}
	
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.136.a
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_USDRP_left = yes }
			UKR_USDRP_more_left = yes
			complete_national_focus = UKR_The_Left_Rallies_Support
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { UKR_USDRP_right = yes }
			UKR_USDRP_more_right = yes
			complete_national_focus = UKR_Unexpected_Allies
		}
		else = {
			UKR_USDRP_more_center = yes
			complete_national_focus = UKR_Center_Holds
		}		
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				name = UKR_social_democrat_party
				long_name = UKR_social_democrat_party_long
			}
		}
	}			
}

country_event = { # USDRP
	id = ukrsoc.149
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.149" }
	title = ukrsoc.149.t
	desc = ukrsoc.149.d
	trigger = {
		UKR_usdrp_in_power = yes	
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.149.a
		end_coalition = yes
		set_country_flag = UKR_usdrp_is_radsoc
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Volodymyr Vynnychenko"
			desc = "POLITICS_VOLODYMYR_VYNNYCHENKO_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Volodymyr_Vynnychenko.png" 
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_revisionist_marxism_subtype
			traits = { UKR_writer_of_the_revolution }
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = radical_socialist
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value = party_popularity@social_democrat }
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value_reverse = 0 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { var = UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value_reverse value = party_popularity@social_democrat }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value_reverse }
			add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = UKR_moderate_to_extremist_value }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.08 }
			if = {
				limit = { is_faction_leader = no }
				remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_guaranteed_by = AUS }
			AUS = { country_event = ukrfor.64 }
		}
		else = {
			GER = { country_event = ukrfor.50 }
		}
	}	
}

	}
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_no_more_loans }
		OR = {
			AND = {
				check_variable = { UKR_kyiv_budget > 0 }
				check_variable = { UKR_kyiv_budget < 11 }
			}
			check_variable = { UKR_kyiv_budget < 0 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.152.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		set_temp_variable = { UKR_red_kyiv_pop_change = -10 }
		UKR_increase_red_kyiv_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = UKR_Great_Constructions_full }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = UKR_Great_Constructions_full
				days = 180
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = UKR_Great_Constructions_moderate }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = UKR_Great_Constructions_moderate
				days = 180
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_decision = UKR_Navodnytskyi_Mist }
			add_days_remove = {
				decision = UKR_Navodnytskyi_Mist
				days = 30
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_decision = UKR_Renovate_Velykyi_Mykola }
			add_days_remove = {
				decision = UKR_Renovate_Velykyi_Mykola
				days = 30
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_decision = UKR_Karl_Marx_Monument }
			add_days_remove = {
				decision = UKR_Karl_Marx_Monument
				days = 30
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_decision = UKR_Metro_Construction }
			add_days_remove = {
				decision = UKR_Metro_Construction
				days = 150
			}
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_decision = UKR_Open_Shevchenko_State_Art_School }
			add_days_remove = {
				decision = UKR_Open_Shevchenko_State_Art_School
				days = 15
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_decision = UKR_Launch_The_First_Trolleybus_Line }
			add_days_remove = {
				decision = UKR_Launch_The_First_Trolleybus_Line
				days = 30
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.152
				days = 90
				random_days = 220
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_Borrow_money_tt
		add_to_variable = { var = UKR_kyiv_budget_debt value = 40 }
		multiply_variable = { UKR_kyiv_budget_debt = 1.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = UKR_Repay_money }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = UKR_Repay_money
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else = { activate_mission = UKR_Repay_money }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.152.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
		}		
		set_country_flag = UKR_no_more_loans
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 25
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
		set_temp_variable = { UKR_red_kyiv_pop_change = 5 }
		UKR_increase_red_kyiv_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { UKR_red_kyiv_budget_monthly_change = -5 }
		UKR_increase_kyiv_budget_monthly_by_sum = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = UKR_Great_Constructions_full }
			remove_mission = UKR_Great_Constructions_full
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = UKR_Great_Constructions_moderate }
			remove_mission = UKR_Great_Constructions_moderate
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_decision = UKR_Metro_Construction }
			add_days_remove = {
				decision = UKR_Metro_Construction
				days = 150
			}
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_decision = UKR_Launch_The_First_Trolleybus_Line }
			remove_decision = UKR_Launch_The_First_Trolleybus_Line
		}		
		set_temp_variable = { UKR_red_kyiv_budget_change = 40 }
		UKR_increase_kyiv_budget_by_sum = yes
	}		
}

country_event = { # UPSR
	id = ukrsoc.165
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.165" }
	title = ukrsoc.165.t
	desc = ukrsoc.165.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_holubovych
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.165.a
		add_stability = -0.03
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.166
			days = 5
		}
	}		
}
country_event = { # UPSR
	id = ukrsoc.166
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.166" }
	title = ukrsoc.166.t
	desc = ukrsoc.166.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_holubovych
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.166.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = UKR_future
					option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSR_R
				}
			}	
		}
		add_stability = -0.07
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		hidden_effect = {
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "[RADA_NAME]"
						desc = "POLITICS_CENTRAL_RADA_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Rada.png"
						expire = "1.1.1"
						ideology = socdem_narodism_subtype
					}
				}
				RADA_NAME = "[GetUkrainianParliamentFullName]"
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Holubovych_Issue
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.167
			days = 5
		}
	}	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.166.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = UKR_future
					option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSR_R
				}
			}	
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_upsr_block_the_left_tree
		add_stability = -0.11
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		remove_country_leader_trait = UKR_pro_german_collaborator
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Holubovych_Issue
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.168
			days = 5
		}
	}		
}
country_event = { # UPSR
	id = ukrsoc.167
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.167" }
	title = ukrsoc.167.t
	desc = ukrsoc.167.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_republic
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.167.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = UKR_future
					option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSR_R
				}
			}	
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_upsr_block_the_right_tree
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Levko Kovaliv"
			desc = "POLITICS_LEVKO_KOVALIV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Lev_Kovaliv.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = socdem_narodism_subtype
		}
		add_ideas = UKR_Levko_Kovaliv_hog_rso
		add_stability = 0.03
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.168
			days = 5
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.167.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mykola Kovalevskyi"
			desc = "POLITICS_MYKOLA_KOVALEVSKYI_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Mykola_Kovalevskyi.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = socdem_narodism_subtype
			traits = { UKR_cooperator }
		}	
		add_ideas = UKR_Mykola_Kovalevskyi_hog_sde
		add_stability = 0.03
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		remove_ideas = UKR_Mykola_Kovalevskyi_eco_sde
		add_ideas = UKR_Mykola_Shrag_eco_sde
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.168
			days = 5
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.167.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}

			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = socdem_narodism_subtype
			traits = { UKR_cooperator }
		}	
		add_ideas = UKR_Pavlo_Khristiuk_hog_sde
		add_stability = 0.03
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.168
			days = 5
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.167.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mykyta Shapoval"
			desc = "POLITICS_MYKYTA_SHAPOVAL_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Mykyta_Shapoval.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = socdem_narodism_subtype
			traits = { UKR_forester }
		}

			id = ukrsoc.168

			base = 20
		}

			name = "Mykhailo Hrushevskyi"

			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = socdem_narodism_subtype
			traits = { 
				UKR_first_premier
			}
		}	
		add_ideas = UKR_Mykhailo_Hrushevskyi_hog_sde
		add_stability = 0.03
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.168
			days = 5
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { # UPSR
	id = ukrsoc.168
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.168" }
	title = ukrsoc.168.t
	desc = ukrsoc.168.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_flag
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.168.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Levko Kovaliv"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Mykhailo Hrushevskyi"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSR_R }
			}	
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_soviet_platform_chosen
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Adopt_The_Soviet_Platform
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_anarchy_in_the_streets }
			remove_ideas = UKR_anarchy_in_the_streets
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.168.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Levko Kovaliv"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSR }
			}	
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_dualist_platform_chosen
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Dualist_Platform
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_anarchy_in_the_streets }
			remove_ideas = UKR_anarchy_in_the_streets
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { # UPSR
	id = ukrsoc.169
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.169" }
	title = ukrsoc.169.t
	desc = ukrsoc.169.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.169.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		set_global_flag = UKR_upsr_are_friendly_to_russia
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {	psr_in_power = yes }
			}
			RUS = {
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = UKR
					modifier = UKR_psr_friendship
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.169.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {	psr_in_power = yes }
			}
			RUS = {
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = UKR
					modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSR
	id = ukrsoc.174
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.174" }
	title = ukrsoc.174.t
	desc = ukrsoc.174.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.174.a
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_radsoc_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = foreign_minister
		add_ideas = UKR_Volodymyr_Starosolskyi_for_sde
	}	
}
country_event = { # UPSR
	id = ukrsoc.175
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.175" }
	title = ukrsoc.175.t
	desc = ukrsoc.175.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.175.a
		set_country_flag = UKR_disable_borotbist_uprisings
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_disable_borotbist_uprisings_tt
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = UKR_borotbyst_uprising_state
				}
			}
			set_border_war = no
			remove_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = UKR_borotbyst_uprising_state
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { # UPSR
	id = ukrsoc.178
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.178" }
	title = ukrsoc.178.t
	desc = ukrsoc.178.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.178.a
		add_synd_to_coalition = yes
		remove_all_ministers_but_hog = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Levko Kovaliv"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			add_ideas = {
				UKR_Dmytro_Isaievych_for_sde
				UKR_Panas_P_Lyubchenko_eco_rso
				UKR_Hryhorii_Hrynko_sec_rso
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = {
				UKR_Levko_Kovaliv_for_rso
				UKR_Panas_P_Lyubchenko_eco_rso
				UKR_Hryhorii_Hrynko_sec_rso
			}
		}
		delete_unit_template_and_units = {
			division_template = "Petliurivtsi"
			disband = yes #will refund equipment and manpower
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { # UPSR
	id = ukrsoc.179
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.179" }
	title = ukrsoc.179.t
	desc = ukrsoc.179.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.179.a
		set_country_flag = UKR_upsr_is_radsoc
		UKR_move_upsr_leader_to_radsoc = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = radical_socialist
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_faction_leader = no }
				remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_totalist = party_popularity_100@totalist }
			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_totalist = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist  }

			set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_totalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@national_populist }

			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_totalist = sum } #avoid rounding errors

			set_popularities = {
				totalist = UKR_new_totalist
				syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
				radical_socialist = 0
				social_democrat = party_popularity_100@social_democrat
				social_liberal = party_popularity_100@social_liberal
				market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
				social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
				authoritarian_democrat = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat
				paternal_autocrat = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat
				national_populist = party_popularity_100@national_populist
			}
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_socdem = UKR.party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
			divide_temp_variable = { UKR_new_socdem = 2 }

			set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_radsoc = UKR.party_popularity_100@radical_socialist }
			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_radsoc = UKR_new_socdem }

			set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_radsoc }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_socdem }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@national_populist }

			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_radsoc = sum } #avoid rounding errors

			set_popularities = {
				totalist = party_popularity_100@totalist
				syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
				radical_socialist = UKR_new_radsoc
				social_democrat = UKR_new_socdem
				social_liberal = party_popularity_100@social_liberal
				market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
				social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
				authoritarian_democrat = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat
				paternal_autocrat = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat
				national_populist = party_popularity_100@national_populist
			}
		}
		
		
		add_synd_to_coalition = yes
		remove_all_ministers_but_hog = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Levko Kovaliv"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			add_ideas = {
				UKR_Dmytro_Isaievych_for_sde
				UKR_Panas_P_Lyubchenko_eco_rso
				UKR_Hryhorii_Hrynko_sec_rso
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = {
				UKR_Levko_Kovaliv_for_rso
				UKR_Panas_P_Lyubchenko_eco_rso
				UKR_Hryhorii_Hrynko_sec_rso
			}
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			name = UKR_syndicalist_party3
			long_name = UKR_syndicalist_party3_long
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			name = UKR_syndicalist_party3
			long_name = UKR_syndicalist_party3_long
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			XXA = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_borotbyst_loyalist }
					set_nationality = UKR
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Volodymyr Vynnychenko"
				desc = "POLITICS_VOLODYMYR_VYNNYCHENKO_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Volodymyr_Vynnychenko.png" 
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = revisionist_marxism_subtype
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				name = UKR_social_democrat_party
				long_name = UKR_social_democrat_party_long
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_guaranteed_by = AUS }
			AUS = { country_event = ukrfor.64 }
		}
		else = {
			GER = { country_event = ukrfor.50 }
		}
		delete_unit_template_and_units = {
			division_template = "Petliurivtsi"
			disband = yes #will refund equipment and manpower
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Elect_New_Ataman }
				}
				unlock_national_focus = UKR_Elect_New_Ataman
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsoc.273
						days = 25
						random_days = 15
					}
				}	
				country_event = ukrsoc.283		
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = {
						is_field_marshal = yes
						has_id = 17908
					}
					demote_leader = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = UKR_Symon_Petliura_carm }
					remove_ideas = UKR_Symon_Petliura_carm
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}

			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.201
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}		
}

country_event = { # Temporary
	id = ukrsoc.216
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.216" }
	title = ukrsoc.216.t
	desc = ukrsoc.216.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.216.a		
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_democrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		set_country_leader_ideology = socdem_junta_subtype
		set_country_leader_portrait = {
			ideology = var:ROOT.current_party_ideology_group
			portrait = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Symon_Petliura_Civilian.png"
		}		
		add_country_leader_trait = UKR_eternal_president
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = UKR_social_democrat_party6

country_event = { # Borotbysts
	id = ukrsoc.227
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.227" }
	title = ukrsoc.227.t
	desc = ukrsoc.227.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.227.a
		#random_unit_leader = {
		#	limit = { has_id = 1962 }
		#	add_unit_leader_trait = cavalry_expert
		#	supply_units = 36
		#	add_max_trait = 1
		#	add_attack = 1
		#}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_tech = cossack_corps_tech }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = cossack_corps_tech_effect
			hidden_effect = { set_technology = { cossack_corps_tech  = 1 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_template = "Kozatska Dyviziia" }
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "Kozatska Dyviziia"
				division_names_group = UKR_CAV_02
				regiments = {
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
				}
				support = {
					recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.4"
				owner = ROOT
				count = 2
			}
		}
	}		
}

	id = ukrsoc.250
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.250" }
	title = ukrsoc.250.t
	desc = ukrsoc.250.d

	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.250.a
		add_ideas = UKR_borotbyst_uprising
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 1233
					state = 1234
					state = 1238
					state = 1232
					state = 1229
					state = 821
					state = 240
					state = 203
					state = 259
					state = 221
					state = 227
					state = 228
					state = 1282
					state = 1283
					state = 1284
					state = 1285
					state = 1286
					state = 226
					state = 1231
					state = 200
					state = 1239
					state = 197
					state = 196	
				}
			}
			set_border_war = yes
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = UKR_borotbyst_uprising_state
			}
		}
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.251
				days = 5
			}
		}				
	}	
}

country_event = { # Petliura
	id = ukrsoc.252
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.252" }
	title = ukrsoc.252.t
	desc = ukrsoc.252.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.252.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_borotbysts }
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 15 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_MELNYK }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA }

			}

			country = USR

			give_guarantee = ROOT
			give_military_access = ROOT

				type = contain
				id = "UPR"
				value = -200
			}
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = conquer
				id = "UPR"
				value = -500
			}
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = antagonize
				id = "UPR"
				value = -200
			}
		}

			mission = UKR_war_with_borotbysts

		}

				factor = 0

					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_SHUMSKYI }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_FAILED_STATE }
				}
			}
		}
		UKR_setup_petliura_national_union = yes
		set_country_flag = UKR_petliura_category_unlocked
		effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = UKR_Repress_The_Radicals }
		remove_ideas = UKR_borotbyst_uprising
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.252.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = UPR_uvo_openly_joins_dyrektoria
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_uvo }
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 40 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_FAILS_USDRP }

					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_SHUMSKYI }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_FAILED_STATE }
				}
			}
		}
		UKR_setup_petliura_melnyk_diarchy = yes
		set_country_flag = UKR_petliura_category_unlocked

			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat

			name = "Symon Petliura"

		}

			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			name = UKR_social_democrat_party6
			long_name = UKR_social_democrat_party6_long
		}
		hidden_effect = {

				ideology = social_democrat

				long_name = UKR_social_democrat_party_long
			}
		}

			ideology = paternal_autocrat

		}

country_event = { # Petliura

country_event = { # Petliura
	id = ukrsoc.255
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.255" }
	title = ukrsoc.255.t
	desc = ukrsoc.255.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.255.a
		add_political_power = -30
		add_stability = 0.1
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_loyal_society_idea }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = UKR_loyal_society_idea
				add_idea = UKR_loyal_society_idea_1
			}
		}
		else = {
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = UKR_sbu
				add_idea = UKR_sbu_1
			}
		}
		UKR_decrease_usdrp_influence = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.255.b
		add_stability = -0.03
		UKR_increase_usdrp_influence = yes
	}		
}

				militia = { x = 1 y = 0 }
				militia = { x = 1 y = 1 }

			}

		}

			}

						infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
						infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
						infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						infantry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
					}

						artillery = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					}
				}
			}

				}

	title = ukrsoc.271.t
	desc = ukrsoc.271.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.271.a
		add_stability = -0.3
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 17908 }
			retire = yes
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_democrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					create_country_leader = {
						name = "[RADA_NAME]"
						desc = "POLITICS_CENTRAL_RADA_DESC"
						picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Rada.png"
						expire = "1.1.1"

					}
				}
				RADA_NAME = "[GetUkrainianParliamentFullName]"
			}
			#UKR_setup_ukrainian_collapse = yes
		}
	}
