country_event = { # Petliura
	id = ukrsoc.274
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.274" }
	title = ukrsoc.274.t
	desc = ukrsoc.274.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.274.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = -0.15
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.15
		}
		effect_tooltip = { retire_ideology_leader = syndicalist }
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_democrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		set_country_leader_ideology = socdem_junta_subtype
		set_country_leader_portrait = {
			ideology = var:ROOT.current_party_ideology_group
			portrait = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Symon_Petliura_Civilian.png"
		}		
		add_country_leader_trait = UKR_eternal_president
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = UKR_social_democrat_party6
			long_name = UKR_social_democrat_party6_long
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Vasyl Ellan-Blakytnyi"
				desc = "POLITICS_VASYL_BLAKYTNYI_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Vasyl_Ellan_Blakytnyi.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = radsoc_anarcho_syndicalist_subtype
				traits = { UKR_poet_of_revolution }
			}
			remove_ideas = {
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_8
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_7
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_6
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_5
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_4
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_3
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_2
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_1
				UKR_duumvirat_idea
			}
			clr_country_flag = UKR_petliura_shumskyi
			clr_country_flag = UKR_petliura_category_unlocked
			clear_variable = UKR_petliura_pm_authority
			clear_variable = UKR_shumskyi_authority
			clear_variable = UKR_Calm_The_Borotbysts_amount_var			
			remove_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = UKR_shumskyi_modifier
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_petliura_not_in_power_wait_elections
		annex_country = { target = USR transfer_troops = no }
		every_owned_state = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_core_of = USR }
				remove_core_of = USR
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
					}
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
					add_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_claim_by = USR		
		}
		
	}
}
country_event = { # Petliura
	id = ukrsoc.275
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.275" }
	title = ukrsoc.275.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.275.d.petliura
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Secure_The_Military_Power }
	}	
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.275.d
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Secure_The_Military_Power } 
		}		
	}
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.275.a
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Secure_The_Military_Power }
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = -0.15
		}
		clr_country_flag = UKR_petliura_shumskyi
		clr_country_flag = UKR_petliura_category_unlocked
		clear_variable = UKR_petliura_pm_authority
		clear_variable = UKR_shumskyi_authority
		clear_variable = UKR_Calm_The_Borotbysts_amount_var			
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		set_country_leader_ideology = centralized_syndicalism_subtype
		set_country_flag = UKR_borotbysts
		set_country_flag = UKR_disable_borotbist_uprisings
		remove_all_ministers = yes		
		add_ideas = {
			UKR_Oleksander_Shumsky_hog_rso
			UKR_Antin_Prikhodko_for_rso
			UKR_Panas_P_Lyubchenko_eco_rso
			UKR_Hryhorii_Hrynko_sec_rso
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			XXA = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_borotbyst_loyalist }
					set_nationality = UKR
				}
			}
		}
		disband_twenty_percent_units_delete_equipment = yes
		annex_country = { target = USR transfer_troops = yes }
		every_owned_state = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_core_of = USR }
				remove_core_of = USR
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
					}
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
					add_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_claim_by = USR		
		}
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Borotbyst_Revolution
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.275.b
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Secure_The_Military_Power } 
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = -0.15
		}
		clr_country_flag = UKR_petliura_shumskyi
		clr_country_flag = UKR_petliura_category_unlocked
		clear_variable = UKR_petliura_pm_authority
		clear_variable = UKR_shumskyi_authority
		clear_variable = UKR_Calm_The_Borotbysts_amount_var		
		hidden_effect = {
			UKR_setup_borotbyst_victory_over_petliura = yes
			remove_ideas = {
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_8
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_7
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_6
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_5
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_4
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_3
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_2
				UKR_duumvirat_idea_1
				UKR_duumvirat_idea
			}
			remove_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = UKR_petliura_modifier
			}
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes		
		add_ideas = {
			UKR_Oleksander_Shumsky_hog_rso
			UKR_Antin_Prikhodko_for_rso
			UKR_Panas_P_Lyubchenko_eco_rso
			UKR_Hryhorii_Hrynko_sec_rso
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			XXA = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_borotbyst_loyalist }
					set_nationality = UKR
				}
			}
		}
		disband_fifty_percent_units = yes
		annex_country = { target = USR transfer_troops = yes }
		every_owned_state = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_core_of = USR }
				remove_core_of = USR
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
					}
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
					add_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_claim_by = USR		
		}
		delete_unit_template_and_units = {
			division_template = "Petliurivtsi"
			disband = yes #will refund equipment and manpower
		}
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Borotbyst_Revolution
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
}

	desc = ukrsoc.277.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.277.a
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		add_political_power = -100
		add_ideas = UKR_local_radas_seize_control
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = UKR_war_with_borotbysts
			days = 10
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.278
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.277.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		hidden_effect = { UKR_collapse_duumvirate = yes }
	}	
}

country_event = { # Petliura
	id = ukrsoc.280
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.280" }
	title = ukrsoc.280.t
	desc = ukrsoc.280.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.280.a
		end_coalition = yes
		clr_country_flag = UKR_petliura_melnyk
		clr_country_flag = UKR_petliura_category_unlocked
		clear_variable = UKR_usdrp_pm_authority
		clear_variable = UKR_melnyk_pm_authority
		clear_variable = UKR_petliura_pm_authority
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = -0.15
		}
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Andriy Melnyk"
			desc = "POLITICS_ANDRIY_MELNYK_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Andriy_Melnyk_Civilian.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = junta_subtype
			traits = { UKR_melnyk_cult }
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party2
			long_name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party2_long
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party2
			long_name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party2_long
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				is_field_marshal = yes
				has_id = 17908
			}
			demote_leader = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_unit_leader = 17907 }
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					is_field_marshal = no
					has_id = 17907
				}
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					is_field_marshal = no
					has_id = 17905
				}
				promote_leader = yes
			}		
		}
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsun.25
			days = 2
		}
	}
}

	id = ukrsoc.283
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.283" }
	title = ukrsoc.283.t
	desc = ukrsoc.283.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_petliura
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.283.a
		trigger = { has_unit_leader = 17944 }
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 17944 }
			if = {
				limit = { is_field_marshal = no }
				promote_leader = yes
			}
			add_max_trait = 1
			add_skill_level = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea_with_trait = chief_of_army }
			remove_ideas_with_trait = chief_of_army
		}
		add_ideas = UKR_Oleksandr_Udovychenko_carm
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_usdrp_in_power = yes }
			UKR_USDRP_more_center = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.283.b
		trigger = { has_unit_leader = 28001 }
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 28001 }
			if = {
				limit = { is_field_marshal = no }
				promote_leader = yes
			}
			add_max_trait = 1
			add_skill_level = 1
		}

			remove_ideas_with_trait = chief_of_army
		}

		if = {
			limit = { UKR_usdrp_in_power = yes }
			UKR_USDRP_more_right = yes
		}
	}

		trigger = { has_unit_leader = 17931 }

			limit = { has_id = 17931 }
			if = {
				limit = { is_field_marshal = no }
				promote_leader = yes
			}
			add_max_trait = 1

			remove_ideas_with_trait = chief_of_army
		}
		add_ideas = UKR_Yurii_Tiutiunnik_carm
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_usdrp_in_power = yes }
			UKR_USDRP_more_left = yes
		}
	}

		name = ukrsoc.283.e
		trigger = { 
			has_unit_leader = 17905
			NOT = { has_unit_leader = 17907 }
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 17905 }
			if = {
				limit = { is_field_marshal = no }
				promote_leader = yes
			}
			add_max_trait = 1
			add_skill_level = 1
		}
		if = {

		}

country_event = { # Petliura
	id = ukrsoc.298
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.298" }
	title = ukrsoc.298.t
	desc = ukrsoc.298.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_petliura
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.298.a
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		set_country_flag = UKR_petliura_not_in_power_wait_elections
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_liberal
			elections_allowed = no
		}			
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Isaak Mazepa"
			desc = "POLITICS_ISAAK_MAZEPA_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Isaak_Mazepa.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = socdem_democratic_socialism_subtype				
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Andriy Nikovskyi"
			desc = "POLITICS_ANDRIY_NIKOVSKYI_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Andriy_Nikovskyi.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = centrist_subtype				
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes			
		add_ideas = UKR_Andriy_Nikovskyi_hog_sli
		delete_unit_template_and_units = {
			division_template = "Petliurivtsi"
			disband = yes #will refund equipment and manpower
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Elect_New_Ataman }
				}
				unlock_national_focus = UKR_Elect_New_Ataman
				hidden_effect = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrsoc.273
						days = 25
						random_days = 15
					}
				}	
				country_event = ukrsoc.283		
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = {
						is_field_marshal = yes
						has_id = 17908
					}
					demote_leader = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = UKR_Symon_Petliura_carm }
					remove_ideas = UKR_Symon_Petliura_carm
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Petliura
	id = ukrsoc.300
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.300" }
	title = ukrsoc.300.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.300.d
		trigger = { UKR_isaak_mazepa_in_power = yes }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrsoc.300.d2
		trigger = { UKR_isaak_mazepa_in_power = no }
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_republic
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.300.a
		set_country_flag = UKR_uns_elections
		custom_effect_tooltip = elections_in_three_months
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_isaak_mazepa_in_power = yes }
			hidden_effect = {
				meta_effect = {
					text = {
						set_politics = {
							ruling_party = social_democrat
							last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
							election_frequency = 3
							elections_allowed = yes
						}
					}
					CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
				}
			}		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				meta_effect = {
					text = {
						set_politics = {
							ruling_party = social_liberal
							last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
							election_frequency = 3
							elections_allowed = yes
						}
					}
					CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Hidden AI event
	id = ukrsoc.301 
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.301" }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	
	option = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_active_mission = UKR_uns_leftwing_resistance_mission }
			}
			activate_mission = UKR_uns_leftwing_resistance_mission
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_active_mission = UKR_uns_rightwing_resistance_mission }
			}
			activate_mission = UKR_uns_rightwing_resistance_mission
		}
	}
}

### Khrushchev ###
## Bolsheviks
country_event = { # Bolsheviks
	id = ukrsoc.335
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.335" }
	title = ukrsoc.335.t
	desc = ukrsoc.335.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.335.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		add_war_support = -0.1
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				is_field_marshal = yes
				NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_bolshevist_officer }
			}
			demote_leader = yes
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				has_id = 17982
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.336
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.335.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KHRUSHCHEV_UKR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_KHRUSHCHEV_RUS }
				}
			}
		}
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes		
	}	
}

country_event = { # Bolsheviks
	id = ukrsoc.341
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.341" }
	title = ukrsoc.341.t
	desc = ukrsoc.341.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.341.a
		set_temp_variable_to_random = {
			var = UKR_manpower_lost
			max = -10000
			min = -20000
		}
		add_manpower = UKR_manpower_lost		
		202 = { 
			set_demilitarized_zone = no 
			damage_building = {
				type = infrastructure
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				damage = 1
			}
			damage_building = {
				type = arms_factory
				damage = 1
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Yevhenia Bosh"
			desc = "POLITICS_YEVHENIYA_BOSCH_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Evheniya_Bosch.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = authcom_subtype
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = UKR_bolshevist
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = totalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Establish_Dictatorship_Of_UKPB
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			scoped_sound_effect = "effect_khruschev_mr_uncanny3"
		}
		clear_all_relations = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_will_terminate_brotfrieden }
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_GER }
				remove_ideas = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_GER
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea }
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea
					add_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS
				}
				activate_targeted_decision = { decision = UKR_terminate_the_brotfrieden target = AUS }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS }
				remove_ideas = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS
				activate_targeted_decision = { decision = UKR_terminate_the_brotfrieden target = AUS }
			}
		}
		get_current_government_type = yes
		RUS = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = ROOT
				autonomous_state = kr_soviet_republic_not_equal
			}
		}
		restore_previous_government_type = yes			
		add_ideas = UKR_unpopular_regime
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_unpopular_regime_tt
	}	
}

			division_template = "Sichovi Striltsi"
			disband = no
		}

			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_bolshevist_officer }

				}
				retire = yes
			}
		}

					NOT = { has_trait = SOV_bolshevik_officer }

				set_nationality = XXA

					every_unit_leader = {
						limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = UKR_borotbyst_loyalist }
						set_nationality = UKR
					}
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.343
			days = 5
		}	
	}	
}

		}

country_event = { # Bolsheviks
	id = ukrsoc.351
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.351" }
	title = ukrsoc.351.t
	desc = ukrsoc.351.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_khruschev4
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.351.a
		end_coalition = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_integrate_popularfront
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { UKR_new_tot = party_popularity_100@totalist}
			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_tot = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist  }
			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_tot = party_popularity_100@social_democrat  }

			set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = UKR_new_tot }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@national_populist }

			add_to_temp_variable = { UKR_new_tot = sum } #avoid rounding errors

			set_popularities = {
				totalist = UKR_new_tot
				syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
				radical_socialist = 0
				social_democrat = 0
				social_liberal = party_popularity_100@social_liberal
				market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
				social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
				authoritarian_democrat = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat
				paternal_autocrat = party_popularity_100paternal_autocrat
				national_populist = party_popularity_100@national_populist
			}
		}
		UKR_improve_ukrainisation = yes
		add_stability = 0.1
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = UKR_unpopular_regime_1
			add_idea = UKR_popular
		}
	}	
}

		}

				add_idea = UKR_russification_under_internationalist_slogan_1
			}
		}

	}

	id = ukrsoc.376
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.376" }

	desc = ukrsoc.376.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = arsenal_factory_available
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line

			limit = { has_dlc_aat = no }
			custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_upgrade_arsenal
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = arsenal_factory }
					swap_ideas = {
						remove_idea = arsenal_factory
						add_idea = arsenal_factory_expanded
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_idea = arsenal_factory2 }
					swap_ideas = {
						remove_idea = arsenal_factory2
						add_idea = arsenal_factory2_expanded
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			mio:UKR_arsenal_ukr_organisation = {
				add_mio_size = 2
				add_mio_funds = 1000
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Hidden AI event for going radical paths
	id = ukrsoc.1999 
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrsoc.1999" }
	
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #Borotbyst revolution will not happen
		ai_chance = {
			base = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_SHUMSKYI }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_SHUMSKYI_SOVIET }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_SHUMSKYI_DICTATOR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_revolution option = UKR_REVOLUTION_GUARANTEED }
					has_country_flag = UKR_ai_borotbysts
				}			
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_ai_borotbysts_fail
	}
	option = { #Borotbyst revolution will happen
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_revolution option = UKR_REVOLUTION_DISABLED }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_ai_borotbysts
	}
}

		has_tech = potato_corn_tech
		has_tech = winter_corn_tech

		has_tech = popcorn_tech

		has_tech = iron_cowboy
		has_tech = panzerkukuruza
		has_tech = ultimatuve_selection
		has_tech = desert_potato_seeds
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 30 }

	option = {
		name = ukrsoc.386.a
		division_template = {
			name = "Division of Corn"
			division_names_group = UKR_INF_03
			regiments = {
				elite_infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 0 y = 4 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 1 y = 4 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 2 y = 3 }
				elite_infantry = { x = 2 y = 4 }
				tpaktop = { x = 3 y = 0 }
			}
			template_counter = 203
		}
		capital_scope = {
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Division of Corn\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
				owner = ROOT
				count = 30
			}
		}
	}
}

			}

				days = 18
			}

				id = ukrpol.9
				days = 14
			}

			}

country_event = { # Agricultural crisis!
	id = ukreco.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukreco.2" }
	title = ukreco.2.t
	desc = ukreco.2.d

	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukreco.2.a
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = GER
			modifier = UKR_GER_no_help_agr_crisis
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				industrial_complex > 0
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 1
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				industrial_complex > 0
			}
			remove_building = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 1
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.25
		set_country_flag = UKR_agriculture_crisis
		UKR_fire_agricultural_crisis = yes
		add_ideas = UKR_village_outflow
		UKR_increase_direktoria = yes
		FIN = {
			country_event = { id = finland.3 days = 2 }			
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = { news_event = ukrnews.1 }
			country_event = {
				id = crm.3
				days = 5
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrmisc.25
				days = 32
			}	
			UPR = {
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = GER
					modifier = UKR_GER_no_help_agr_crisis
				} # -10
			}		
		}
		
	}
}

				}
			}
		}

		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = UKR_decrease_amount_lands }
	}
}

country_event = { #Land reform event 5, decision 4
	id = ukreco.23
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukreco.23" }
	title = ukreco.23.t
	desc = ukreco.23.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_economic_policy

	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_LandReform_Success }
	}

	option = {
		name = ukreco.23.a
		add_political_power = 45
		add_stability = -0.04
		set_temp_variable = { UKR_influence_change = 3 }
		UKR_reform_score = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = ukreco.23.b
		add_stability = 0.04
		set_temp_variable = { UKR_influence_change = 1 }
		UKR_reform_score = yes
	}
}

country_event = { # Dnieper hydro stops
	id = ukreco.40
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukreco.40" }
	title = ukreco.40.t
	desc = ukreco.40.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_dnipro_construction
	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukreco.40.a
		add_stability = -0.02
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = 200 decision = UKR_resume_dnipro }
	}
}

country_event = { # Ukraine leaves bread peace?
	id = ukreco.42
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukreco.42" }
	title = ukreco.42.t
	desc = ukreco.42.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukreco.42.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukreco.43
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukreco.42.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
		}
		UKR = { clear_relations_with_PREV = yes }
		add_political_power = -100
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_european_food_shortage
			days = 365
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_outraged
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = GER }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						GER_is_in_mitteleuropa = yes
						is_ally_of_ROOT = yes
					}
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = { original_tag = UKR }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = ukreco.47
					days = 2
					random_days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = AUS }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_of_ROOT = yes
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = { original_tag = UKR }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = ukreco.47
					days = 2
					random_days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = { news_event = ukreco.49 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukreco.42.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
		}
		UKR = { clear_relations_with_PREV = yes }
		add_political_power = 50
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_european_food_shortage
			days = 365
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_outraged
		}
		embargo_FROM = yes
		if = {
			limit = { tag = GER }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						GER_is_in_mitteleuropa = yes
						is_ally_of_ROOT = yes
					}
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = { original_tag = UKR }
				}
				embargo_FROM = yes
				country_event = {
					id = ukreco.47
					days = 2
					random_days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = AUS }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_of_ROOT = yes
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = { original_tag = UKR }
				}
				embargo_FROM = yes
				country_event = {
					id = ukreco.47
					days = 2
					random_days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukreco.44
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}		
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = { news_event = ukreco.49 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Ukraine leaves bread peace?
	id = ukreco.43
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukreco.43" }
	title = ukreco.43.t
	desc = ukreco.43.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukreco.43.a
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukreco.45
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukreco.43.b
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction = no
			NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
			FROM = { both_socialist_or_both_not_socialist = yes }
			has_war = no
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 80 }
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukreco.46
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}	
	}
}

country_event = { # Ukraine leaves bread peace?
	id = ukreco.44
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukreco.44" }
	title = ukreco.44.t
	desc = ukreco.44.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukreco.44.a
		add_political_power = -25
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
		UKR_breadbasket_add_consumer_goods = yes
		UKR_breadbasket_remove_trade_opinion = yes
	}
}

country_event = { # Ukraine leaves bread peace?
	id = ukreco.45
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukreco.45" }
	title = ukreco.45.t
	desc = ukreco.45.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukreco.45.a
		trigger = { can_declare_war_on = FROM }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
					UKR = { is_in_faction_with = AUS }
					UKR = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
					UKR = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_global_flag = second_weltkrieg_has_started
				OR = {
					strength_ratio = {
						tag = FROM
						ratio < 0.5
					}
					FROM = {
						is_in_faction_with = RUS
						strength_ratio = {
							tag = ROOT
							ratio > 0.8
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		UKR = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_faction_leader = no }
				remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			}
			GER_remove_from_mitteleuropa = yes
			MIE_remove_from_intermarium = yes
			remove_from_all_tech_sharing_groups = yes		
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukreco.45.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 95
		}
		UKR = { clear_relations_with_PREV = yes }
		add_political_power = 50
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_european_food_shortage
			days = 365
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_outraged
		}
		embargo_FROM = yes
		if = {
			limit = { tag = GER }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						GER_is_in_mitteleuropa = yes
						is_ally_of_ROOT = yes
					}
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = { original_tag = UKR }
				}
				embargo_FROM = yes
				country_event = {
					id = ukreco.47
					days = 2
					random_days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = AUS }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_of_ROOT = yes
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = { original_tag = UKR }
				}
				embargo_FROM = yes
				country_event = {
					id = ukreco.47
					days = 2
					random_days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukreco.44
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}		
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = { news_event = ukreco.49 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Ukraine leaves bread peace?
	id = ukreco.46
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukreco.46" }
	title = ukreco.46.t
	desc = ukreco.46.d
	
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukreco.46.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 55
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				if = {
					limit = { tag = GER }
					OR = {
						has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_TRUE }
						has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_TRUE_GER_UNION }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		give_guarantee = FROM
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukreco.48
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukreco.46.b
		trigger = { can_declare_war_on = FROM }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
					UKR = { is_in_faction_with = AUS }
					UKR = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
					UKR = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_FALSE }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_global_flag = second_weltkrieg_has_started
				OR = {
					strength_ratio = {
						tag = FROM
						ratio < 0.5
					}
					FROM = {
						is_in_faction_with = RUS
						strength_ratio = {
							tag = ROOT
							ratio > 0.8
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		UKR = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_faction_leader = no }
				remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			}
			GER_remove_from_mitteleuropa = yes
			MIE_remove_from_intermarium = yes
			remove_from_all_tech_sharing_groups = yes		
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukreco.46.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				if = {
					limit = { tag = GER }
					OR = {
						has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_TRUE }
						has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_TRUE_GER_UNION }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		UKR = { clear_relations_with_PREV = yes }
		add_political_power = 50
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_european_food_shortage
			days = 365
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_outraged
		}
		embargo_FROM = yes
		create_wargoal = {
			type = annex_everything
			target = FROM
		} 
		if = {
			limit = { tag = GER }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						GER_is_in_mitteleuropa = yes
						is_ally_of_ROOT = yes
					}
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = { original_tag = UKR }
				}
				embargo_FROM = yes
				country_event = {
					id = ukreco.47
					days = 2
					random_days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = AUS }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_of_ROOT = yes
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = { original_tag = UKR }
				}
				embargo_FROM = yes
				country_event = {
					id = ukreco.47
					days = 2
					random_days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukreco.44
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}		
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = { news_event = ukreco.49 }
		}
	}
}

	id = ukreco.47
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukreco.47" }
	title = ukreco.47.t
	desc = ukreco.47.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukreco.47.a
		add_political_power = -50
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_european_food_shortage
			days = 365
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = UKR
			modifier = KR_outraged
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Ukraine leaves bread peace?
	id = ukreco.48
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukreco.48" }
	title = ukreco.48.t
	desc = ukreco.48.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukreco.48.a
		add_political_power = 25
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_trade_agreement
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
		UKR_breadbasket_remove_consumer_goods = yes
		UKR_breadbasket_add_pp = yes
		UKR_breadbasket_add_trade_opinion = yes
		
	}
}

news_event = { # Ukraine leaves bread peace?
	id = ukreco.49
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukreco.49" }
	title = ukreco.49.t
	desc = ukreco.49.d
	
	picture = GFX_news_event_UKR_famine
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			is_neighbor_of = UKR
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	major = yes
	show_major = {
		NOT = { original_tag = UKR }
	}
	

	option = {
		name = ukreco.49.a
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukreco.49.b
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				is_ally_with = GER
				is_ally_with = AUS
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukreco.49.c
		trigger = { 
			has_socialist_government = no
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = GER
				is_ally_with = AUS
			}
		}
	}	
}

### Land Reform ###
country_event = { # End of Reform?
	id = ukreco.25
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukreco.25" }
	title = ukreco.25.t
	desc = ukreco.25.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukreco.25.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Borotbysts < 30 }
					AND = {
						is_ai = yes
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = UKR_ai_borotbysts_fail
							has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_revolution option = UKR_REVOLUTION_DISABLED }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_stability = 0.15
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Success > 75 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = SUN_nationalization_land }
					custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
					UKR_breadbasket_add_pp = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_add_consumer_goods = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_monthly_population = yes
					
					
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_trade_opinion = yes
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = SUN_redistribution_land }
					custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
					UKR_breadbasket_add_pp = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_add_consumer_goods = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_monthly_population = yes
					
					
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_trade_opinion = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_Socialization_Land }
					add_ideas = UKR_socialization_of_land
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_Municipalization_Land }
					add_ideas = UKR_municipalization_of_land
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = UKR_Nationalization_Land 
							has_country_flag = SUN_nationalization_land
						}
					}
					add_ideas = UKR_nationalisation_of_land
				}
				else = { 
					add_ideas = UKR_successful_land_reform_plan_excellent
					custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_consumer_goods = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_add_monthly_population = yes
					
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_resource_penalty = yes
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { UKR_Land_Reform_Success > 50 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = SUN_nationalization_land }
					custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
					UKR_breadbasket_add_pp = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_add_consumer_goods = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_monthly_population = yes
					
					
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_trade_opinion = yes
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = SUN_redistribution_land }
					custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
					UKR_breadbasket_add_pp = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_add_consumer_goods = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_monthly_population = yes
					
					
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_trade_opinion = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_Socialization_Land }
					add_ideas = UKR_socialization_of_land_mediocre
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_Municipalization_Land }
					add_ideas = UKR_municipalization_of_land_mediocre
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = UKR_Nationalization_Land 
							has_country_flag = SUN_nationalization_land
						}
					}
					add_ideas = UKR_nationalisation_of_land_mediocre
				}
				else = { 
					add_ideas = UKR_successful_land_reform_plan_good 
					custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_consumer_goods = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_add_monthly_population = yes
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = SUN_nationalization_land }
					custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
					UKR_breadbasket_add_pp = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_add_consumer_goods = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_monthly_population = yes
					
					
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_trade_opinion = yes
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = SUN_redistribution_land }
					custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
					UKR_breadbasket_add_pp = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_add_consumer_goods = yes
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_monthly_population = yes
					
					
					UKR_breadbasket_remove_trade_opinion = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_Socialization_Land }
					add_ideas = UKR_socialization_of_land_bad
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_Municipalization_Land }
					add_ideas = UKR_municipalization_of_land_bad
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = UKR_Nationalization_Land 
							has_country_flag = SUN_nationalization_land
						}
					}
					add_ideas = UKR_nationalisation_of_land_bad
				}
				else = { add_ideas = UKR_successful_land_reform_plan_decent }
			}
			set_country_flag = UKR_LandReform_Success
			set_country_flag = UKR_disable_borotbist_uprisings
			clr_country_flag = LandReformBegunUKR
			remove_ideas = UKR_land_reform
			remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_land_reform_modifier }
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = {
						modifier = UKR_borotbyst_uprising_state
					}
				}
				set_border_war = no
				remove_dynamic_modifier = {
					modifier = UKR_borotbyst_uprising_state
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.15
			set_country_flag = UKR_LandReform_Success
			set_country_flag = UKR_disable_borotbist_uprisings
			clr_country_flag = LandReformBegunUKR
			remove_ideas = UKR_land_reform
			remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_land_reform_modifier }
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.200
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

	}

country_event = { #Nation at war
	id = ukrmisc.23
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrmisc.23" }
	title = ukrmisc.23.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_elected_government = no
			UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = yes
			has_war_with = RUS
			RUS = {
				has_elected_government = yes
				RUS_russian_monarch = no
			}
		}
		text = ukrmisc.23.d1 #hetmanate vs democratic RUS
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_elected_government = yes
			has_war_with = RUS
			RUS = {
				has_elected_government = yes
				RUS_russian_monarch = no
			}
		}
		text = ukrmisc.23.d2 #democratic UKR vs democratic RUS
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = RUS
			RUS = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
			UKR = {
				has_elected_government = no
				UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		text = ukrmisc.23.d3 #hetmanate vs socialist RUS
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_war_with = SOV }
				OR = {
					has_elected_government = yes
					UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = no
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					RUS = { has_elected_government = no }
					UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = yes
					AND = {
						has_elected_government = no
						UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
		text = ukrmisc.23.d4 #generic
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_war_with = RUS
		UKR_bolsheviks_in_power = no
		UKR_borotbysts_in_power = no
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_war_propaganda

	option = {
		name = ukrmisc.23.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = {
					has_elected_government = yes
					RUS_russian_monarch = no
				}
				UKR = {
					has_elected_government = no
					UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = yes
				}
			}
			add_war_support = 0.10
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.15
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = war_economy } }
			increase_mobilisation = yes
		}
		else = {
			increase_conscription = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						has_socialist_government = yes
						has_left_democratic_government = yes
					}
                    NOT = { 
						has_global_flag = KX_superevent_sounds_off 
						has_global_flag = KX_superevent_total_off
					}
				}
				scoped_sound_effect = "effect_ukraine_liberation_war_dem"
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { 
					UKR_is_hetmanate_or_monarchy = yes
					NOT = { 
						has_global_flag = KX_superevent_sounds_off 
						has_global_flag = KX_superevent_total_off
					}
				}
				scoped_sound_effect = "effect_ukraine_liberation_war_mon"
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { 
					has_government = national_populist 
					NOT = { 
						has_global_flag = KX_superevent_sounds_off 
						has_global_flag = KX_superevent_total_off
					}
				}
				scoped_sound_effect = "effect_ukraine_liberation_war_nat"
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_global_flag = KX_superevent_sounds_off 
						has_global_flag = KX_superevent_total_off
					}
				}	
				scoped_sound_effect = "effect_ukraine_liberation_war"
			}
		}
	}
}

				UKR_usdrp_in_power = yes
			}

		259 = { set_state_flag = king_stays_here }
		set_country_flag = king_has_visited_poltava
		activate_mission = UKR_king_stays		
	}
}

country_event = { # Renaming Oleksandrovsk
	id = ukrmisc.60
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrmisc.60" }
	title = ukrmisc.60.t
	desc = ukrmisc.60.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = UKR
		owns_state = 202
		has_war = no
		date > 1938.1.1
		OR = {
			UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = no
			AND = {
				UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = yes
				OR = {
					has_idea = UKR_Mykola_Mikhnovsky_hog_pau
					has_idea = UKR_Ivan_Poltvets_Ostrianytsia_hog_pau
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 30
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukrmisc.60.a
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = renamed_oleksandrivsk_to_zaporizhia
		set_province_name = { id = 11405 name = VICTORY_POINTS_11405_ZAPORIZHIA }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_has_administrative_reform }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = allowrenaming_flag }
				200 = { set_state_name = STATE_200_REFORMED_ZAPORIZHIA_UKRAINIAN }
			}
			else = {
				200 = { set_state_name = STATE_200_REFORMED_ZAPORIZHIA_ENGLISH }
			}
		}
		else = {
			200 = { set_state_name = STATE_200_ZAPORIZHIA }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrmisc.60.b
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		set_global_flag = renamed_oleksandrivsk_to_khortytsia
		set_province_name = { id = 11405 name = VICTORY_POINTS_11405_KHORTYTSIA }
		200 = { set_state_name = STATE_200_KHORTYTSIA }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrmisc.60.c
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = renamed_oleksandrivsk_to_vyshnevetskyi
		set_province_name = { id = 11405 name = VICTORY_POINTS_11405_VYSHEVETSKYI }
		200 = { set_state_name = STATE_200_VYSHEVETSKYI }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrmisc.60.e
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 10 
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = renamed_oleksandrivsk_to_sich
		set_province_name = { id = 11405 name = VICTORY_POINTS_11405_SICH }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_has_administrative_reform }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = allowrenaming_flag }
				200 = { set_state_name = STATE_200_REFORMED_SICH_UKRAINIAN }
			}
			else = {
				200 = { set_state_name = STATE_200_REFORMED_SICH_ENGLISH }
			}
		}
		else = {
			200 = { set_state_name = STATE_200_SICH }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrmisc.60.f
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 20 
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrmisc.62.a

				id = ukrmisc.62

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { # Renaming Oleksandrovsk
	id = ukrmisc.76
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrmisc.76" }
	title = ukrmisc.76.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrmisc.76.d
		trigger = { 
			has_socialist_government = no
			NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrmisc.76.d2
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = social_democrat 
			}
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = UKR
		owns_state = 226
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukrmisc.76.a
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		set_global_flag = renamed_katerynoslav_to_dnipro
		set_province_name = { id = 11437 name = VICTORY_POINTS_11437_DNIPRO }
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_has_administrative_reform }
			}
			226 = { set_state_name = STATE_226_DNIPRO }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrmisc.76.b
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		set_global_flag = renamed_katerynoslav_to_dniproslav
		set_province_name = { id = 11437 name = VICTORY_POINTS_11437_DNIPROSLAV }
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_has_administrative_reform }
			}
			226 = { set_state_name = STATE_226_DNIPROSLAV }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrmisc.76.c
		ai_chance = { base = 40 }
		set_global_flag = renamed_katerynoslav_to_sicheslav
		set_province_name = { id = 11437 name = VICTORY_POINTS_11437_SICHESLAV }
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_has_administrative_reform }
			}
			226 = { set_state_name = STATE_226_SICHESLAV }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrmisc.76.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = social_democrat 
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 10 
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = renamed_katerynoslav_to_krasnodniprovsk
		set_province_name = { id = 11437 name = VICTORY_POINTS_11437_KRASNODNIPROVSK }
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_has_administrative_reform }
			}
			226 = { set_state_name = STATE_226_KRASNODNIPROVSK }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrmisc.60.f
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = no }
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 20 
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = yes }
			UKR_skoropadsky_increase_russophiles = yes
		}
		else = {
			decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		}
	}
}

### New Foreign Policy ###
country_event = { # Bigger claims?
	id = ukrfor.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.1" }
	title = ukrfor.1.t
	desc = ukrfor.1.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_boidunyk

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.1.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80			
		}		
		add_political_power = -25
		add_war_support = 0.05
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		remove_ideas_with_trait = foreign_minister
		add_ideas = UKR_Osyp_Boidunyk_for_npo
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_claimed_by = KUB
					is_core_of = KUB
					state = 1234
					state = 1266
					state =	1189 
					state = 1191
					state = 218
					state = 1263
					state = 1265
				}
				is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = no
			}
			add_claim_by = ROOT
		}		
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.1.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				UKR_dmytro_dontsov_in_power = yes 
			}
		}					
		add_political_power = 25
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
	}	
}

country_event = { # WHR & UKR are independent
	id = ukrfor.11
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.11" }
	title = ukrfor.11.t
	desc = ukrfor.11.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = UKR
		is_subject = no
		is_in_faction = no
		has_war = no
		NOT = {
			owns_state = 95
			owns_state = 194
		}
		has_country_flag = UKR_can_secure_power
		WHR = {
			is_subject = no
			is_in_faction = no
			has_war = no
			NOT = {
				owns_state = 93
				owns_state = 997
				owns_state = 241
			}
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_WHR_poster
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.11.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_NEUTRALITY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_INTERNATIONALE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_AUSTRIA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
				}
			}
		}		
		WHR = {
			set_country_flag = { flag = WHR_allies days = 30 value = 1 }
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.12
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = "If they agree:"
		effect_tooltip = {
			create_faction = "Eastern Europe Defensive Pact"
			add_to_faction = FROM
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.11.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_FACTION_LEADER }
			}
		}					
		add_political_power = -25
	}	
}

country_event = { # WHR & UKR are independent
	id = ukrfor.12
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.12" }
	title = ukrfor.12.t
	desc = ukrfor.12.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_mapa

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.12.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = paternal_autocrat
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_STAY_WITH_GERMAN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA_SECRET_PACT }
					has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_INTERNATIONALE }
				}
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = UKR_WHR_treaty_flag
		add_stability = 0.02
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				create_faction = "Eastern Europe Defensive Pact"
				add_to_faction = ROOT
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.13
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.12.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_STAY_WITH_GERMAN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA_SECRET_PACT }
					has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_INTERNATIONALE }
				}
			}
		}	
		add_political_power = 25
		custom_effect_tooltip = if_FROM_agrees
		effect_tooltip = { 
			241 = { transfer_state_to = ROOT }
			FROM = {
				create_faction = "Eastern Europe Defensive Pact"
				add_to_faction = ROOT
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.14
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.12.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = { has_same_government_as_ROOT = yes }					
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = paternal_autocrat
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_UKRAINE }
			}
		}		
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_political_power = -25
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.17
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}	
}

			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = { has_same_government_as_ROOT = no }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM

		}

			241 = { transfer_state_to = FROM }
			create_faction = "Eastern Europe Defensive Pact"
			add_to_faction = FROM
		}

				id = ukrfor.15

			}

			factor = 30

				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_FACTION_LEADER }
			}		
		}

		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.16
				days = 2

country_event = { # West Ukraine
	id = ukrfor.25
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.25" }
	title = ukrfor.25.t
	desc = ukrfor.25.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_galicia

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.25.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_AUS_enemies }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					UKR_upss_in_power = yes
					UKR_vasyl_in_power = no
					UKR_vasyl_president_in_power = no
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			91 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_AUS_or_subject = yes }
		}
		AUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.26
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.25.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					UKR_vasyl_in_power = yes
					UKR_vasyl_president_in_power = yes
					AUS = { both_socialist_or_both_not_socialist = yes }			
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:91.owner = { is_subject_of = AUS }
			}
			AUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrfor.35
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			91 = {
				owner = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrfor.38
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # West Ukraine
	id = ukrfor.30
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.30" }
	title = ukrfor.30.t
	desc = ukrfor.30.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy2

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.30.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_left_democratic_government = no
			}
		}
		set_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_What_austria_terms_var = 1 }
		var:202.owner = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.33
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_if_agrees_tooltip
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_state = {
				limit = { 
					is_east_galicia = yes
					is_owned_and_controlled_by_AUS_or_subject = yes
				}
				transfer_state_to = var:202.owner
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_polish_autonomy }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.30.c
		trigger = {
			FROM = { 
				NOT = { has_idea = UKR_austrian_trade }
				NOT = { has_idea = UKR_austrian_trade_ump }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
		}
		set_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_What_austria_terms_var = 3 }
		var:202.owner = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.33
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_if_agrees_tooltip
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_state = {
				limit = { 
					is_east_galicia = yes
					is_owned_and_controlled_by_AUS_or_subject = yes
				}
				transfer_state_to = var:202.owner
			}
			var:202.owner = { add_ideas = UKR_excessive_trade_with_austria }
			add_ideas = AUS_UKR_excessive_trade_with_austria
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.30.e
		trigger = {
			FROM = { 
				NOT = { has_idea = UKR_austrian_trade }
				NOT = { has_idea = UKR_austrian_trade_ump }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				var:202.owner = { at_peace_or_same_enemies_as_ROOT = no }
			}
		}
		set_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_What_austria_terms_var = 3 }
		var:202.owner = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.33
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_if_agrees_tooltip
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_state = {
				limit = { 
					is_east_galicia = yes
					is_owned_and_controlled_by_AUS_or_subject = yes
				}
				transfer_state_to = var:202.owner
			}
			add_to_faction = var:202.owner
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # West Ukraine
	id = ukrfor.32
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.32" }
	title = ukrfor.32.t
	desc = ukrfor.32.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy2

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.32.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_left_democratic_government = no
			}
		}
		set_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_What_austria_terms_var = 1 }
		var:202.owner = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.33
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_if_agrees_tooltip
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_How_much_land_var = 3 }
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
							state = 80
							state = 89
							state = 1140
							state = 91
						}
						is_owned_and_controlled_by_AUS_or_subject = yes
					}
					transfer_state_to = var:202.owner
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_polish_autonomy }
				}
			}
			else = {
				every_state = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
							state = 80
							state = 89
							state = 1140
						}
						is_owned_and_controlled_by_AUS_or_subject = yes
					}
					transfer_state_to = var:202.owner
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_polish_autonomy }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.32.b
		trigger = {
			FROM = { 
				NOT = { has_idea = UKR_austrian_trade }
				NOT = { has_idea = UKR_austrian_trade_ump }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 45
		}
		set_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_What_austria_terms_var = 3 }
		var:202.owner = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.33
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_if_agrees_tooltip
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_How_much_land_var = 3 }
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
							state = 80
							state = 89
							state = 1140
							state = 91
						}
						is_owned_and_controlled_by_AUS_or_subject = yes
					}
					transfer_state_to = var:202.owner
				}
			}
			else = {
				every_state = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
							state = 80
							state = 89
							state = 1140
						}
						is_owned_and_controlled_by_AUS_or_subject = yes
					}
					transfer_state_to = var:202.owner
				}
			}
			UKR = { add_ideas = UKR_excessive_trade_with_austria }
			add_ideas = AUS_UKR_excessive_trade_with_austria
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.32.c
		trigger = {
			FROM = { 
				NOT = { has_idea = UKR_austrian_trade }
				NOT = { has_idea = UKR_austrian_trade_ump }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				var:202.owner = { at_peace_or_same_enemies_as_ROOT = no }
			}
		}
		set_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_What_austria_terms_var = 3 }
		var:202.owner = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.33
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_if_agrees_tooltip
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_How_much_land_var = 3 }
				}
				every_state = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
							state = 80
							state = 89
							state = 1140
							state = 91
						}
						is_owned_and_controlled_by_AUS_or_subject = yes
					}
					transfer_state_to = var:202.owner
				}
			}
			else = {
				every_state = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
							state = 80
							state = 89
							state = 1140
						}
						is_owned_and_controlled_by_AUS_or_subject = yes
					}
					transfer_state_to = var:202.owner
				}
			}
			add_to_faction = var:202.owner
		}
	}
}

	id = ukrfor.33
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.33" }
	title = ukrfor.33.t
	desc = ukrfor.33.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy2

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.33.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.4
				check_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_How_much_land_var = 2 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_What_austria_terms_var = 3 }
				OR = {
					UKR_vasyl_in_power = no
					UKR_vasyl_president_in_power = no
					has_government = national_populist
					both_socialist_or_both_not_socialist = no
					AND = {
						is_in_faction = yes
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_What_austria_terms_var = 1 }
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_What_austria_terms_var = 3 }
				UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.34
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}		
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.33.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					OR = {
						UKR_vasyl_in_power = yes
						UKR_vasyl_president_in_power = yes
					}
					UKR_upss_in_power = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:91.owner = { is_subject_of = AUS }
			}
			AUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrfor.35
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			#activate_targeted_decision = { target = 91.owner decision = UKR_attack_for_galicia }
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { # West Ukraine
	id = ukrfor.34
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.34" }
	title = ukrfor.34.t
	desc = ukrfor.34.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.34.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_How_much_land_var = 3 }
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						state = 80
						state = 89
						state = 1140
						state = 91
					}
					is_owned_and_controlled_by_AUS_or_subject = yes
				}
				transfer_state_to = UKR
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_What_austria_terms_var = 1 } }
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_polish_autonomy }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_How_much_land_var = 2 }
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						state = 80
						state = 89
						state = 1140
					}
					is_owned_and_controlled_by_AUS_or_subject = yes
				}
				transfer_state_to = UKR
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_What_austria_terms_var = 1 } }
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_polish_autonomy }
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			every_state = {
				limit = { 
					is_east_galicia = yes
					is_owned_and_controlled_by_AUS_or_subject = yes
				}
				transfer_state_to = UKR
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_What_austria_terms_var = 1 } }
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_polish_autonomy }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { global.UKR_AUS_What_austria_terms_var = 4 }
			}
			var:202.owner = { 
				if = {
					limit = { is_faction_leader = no }
					remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
					peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = { has_guaranteed = ROOT }
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = ROOT
						relation = guarantee
						active = no
					}
				}
				GER_remove_from_mitteleuropa = yes
				MIE_remove_from_intermarium = yes
				remove_from_all_tech_sharing_groups = yes
			}
			add_to_faction = var:202.owner
		}
		else = {
			var:202.owner = { 
				add_ideas = UKR_excessive_trade_with_austria 
				hidden_effect = {
					set_country_flag = UKR_joined_DA
					UKR_update_military = yes
				}		
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = KR_trade_agreement
				}
				reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = KR_trade_agreement
				}
			}
			add_ideas = AUS_UKR_excessive_trade_with_austria
			
		}
	}	
}

			}

				factor = 0

		FROM = {

				id = ukrfor.37

			}
		}

country_event = { # West Ukraine
	id = ukrfor.37
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.37" }
	title = ukrfor.37.t
	desc = ukrfor.37.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.37.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
				}
			}			
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			type = annex_everything
			target = AUS
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				country_exists = GAL 
				GAL = { 
					is_subject_of = AUS 
					owns_state = 91
				}
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				type = annex_everything
				target = GAL
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				country_exists = POL 
				POL = { 
					is_subject_of = AUS 
					owns_state = 91
				}
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				type = annex_everything
				target = POL
			}
		}
	}	
	#option = {
	#	name = ukrfor.37.b
	#	ai_chance = {

	#		modifier = {

	#			FROM = { ROOT_is_threatened = yes }

	id = ukrfor.38
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.38" }
	title = ukrfor.38.t
	desc = ukrfor.38.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.38.a #Accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_polish_tag = yes
				UKR = { has_country_flag = UKR_pol_gal_relations_forever_destroyed }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = {
				91 = {
					owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
				}
			}
			91 = {
				owner = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrfor.41
						days = 1
						random = 24
					}
					every_owned_state = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								is_core_of = FROM
								is_claimed_by = FROM
							}
						}
						FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.39
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.38.b #refuse
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.40
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

}

		}
		var:202.owner = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.60
				hours = 4
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = GER_notify_AUS_of_war_with_UKR }
			AUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrfor.65
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.59.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
					UKR = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
				}
			}	
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = UKR
			type = annex_everything
		}
		activate_mission = UKR_crush_the_ukrainian_revolt
		hidden_effect = { 
			var:202.owner = { activate_mission = UKR_resist_the_germans }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = GER_notify_AUS_of_war_with_UKR }
			AUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrfor.66
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #for AUS, start negotiations with Ukraine
	id = ukrfor.64
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.64" }
	title = ukrfor.64.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.64.d.borotbysts
		trigger = { 
			var:202.owner = { UKR_borotbysts_in_power = yes }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.64.d
		trigger = { 
			var:202.owner = { UKR_borotbysts_in_power = no }
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.64.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { at_peace_or_same_enemies_as_ROOT = no }
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			has_left_democratic_government = yes
			UKR = { UKR_usdrp_in_power = yes }
		}
		UKR = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.67
				hours = 6
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.64.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_AUSTRIA }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = GER_ukr_some_concessions }
			remove_ideas = GER_ukr_some_concessions
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_guaranteed = FROM }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = guarantee
				active = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_military_access_to = FROM }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = military_access
				active = no
			}
		}
		GER = {
			set_country_flag = GER_notify_AUS_of_war_with_UKR
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.50
				hours = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

			peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes

		MIE_remove_from_intermarium = yes
		remove_from_all_tech_sharing_groups = yes
	}

country_event = { #The Conspiracy Strikes
	id = ukrfor.74
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.74 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = ukrfor.74.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored } } }
		text = ukrfor.74.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored } }
		text = ukrfor.74.d2
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_propaganda

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { # The Conspiracy Wins
		name = ukrfor.74.a
		faction_leader = { country_event = ukrfor.75 }		
		hidden_effect = {
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						is_owned_by = ROOT
						is_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
					ROOT = { divisions_in_state = { state = PREV size > 0 } }
				}
				teleport_armies = {
					limit = { tag = ROOT }
					to_state_array = owned_controlled_states
				}
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				teleport_armies = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							tag = ROOT
							has_war_with = ROOT
						}
					}
					to_state_array = owned_controlled_states
				}
			}
		}		
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_15 = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_economic_standstill
			days = 365
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_economic_crisis_tt
		if = {
			limit = { 
				RUS = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
				has_war_with = RUS
			}
			RUS = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }
		}
	}
}

	id = ukrfor.76
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.76 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = ukrfor.76.t
	desc = ukrfor.76.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_german_soldier

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.76.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_INTERNATIONALE }
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
				both_socialist_or_both_not_socialist = yes
			}
		}
		RUS = { country_event = ukrfor.77 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.76.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					UKR_skrypnyk_in_power = yes
					RUS = {
						OR = {
							has_country_leader = {
								ruling_only = yes
								name = "Grigory Zinoviev"
							}
							has_country_leader = {
								ruling_only = yes
								name = "Lev Kamenev"
							}
							has_country_leader = {
								ruling_only = yes
								name = "Grigory Sokolnikov"
							}
							has_country_leader = {
								ruling_only = yes
								name = "Mikhail Kalinin"
							}
							nsp_in_power = yes
							has_country_flag = right_communists_victorous
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		INT = { country_event = ukrfor.77 }
	}
}

		add_political_power = -15
	}

		var:202.owner = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }
		add_to_faction = FROM
	}
	option = { # Don't accept - attack
		name = ukrfor.77.c
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = FROM
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
	}
}

			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						UKR_vasyl_in_power = yes
						UKR_vasyl_president_in_power = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.81
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # UPSS-GER
	id = ukrfor.80
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.80" }
	title = ukrfor.80.t
	desc = ukrfor.80.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.80.a
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
		UKR_remove_brotfrieden_without_events = yes
		var:202.owner = {
			set_temp_variable = { target = GER }
			clear_all_relations_with_TARGET = yes 
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.84
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.80.b
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		add_stability = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = german-ukrainian_railways } }
			country_event = { id = ukrfor.107 days = 2 }
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = german-ukrainian_railways
			GER = { add_ideas = UKR_railway_profits }
		}
		leave_faction = yes
		add_ideas = UKR_ger_all_concessions
		hidden_effect = {
			GER_add_to_mitteleuropa = yes
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = GER
						is_in_faction_with = GER
					}
				}
				var:202.owner = { give_military_access = PREV }
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = GER
						is_in_faction_with = GER
					}
				}
				PREV = { give_military_access = UKR }
			}
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.82
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.80.c
		add_political_power = 55
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.83
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # UPSS-GER
	id = ukrfor.85
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.85" }
	title = ukrfor.85.t
	desc = ukrfor.85.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.85.a
		trigger = { original_tag = UKR }
		add_ideas = UKR_ger_some_concessions
		var:202.owner = { remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes }
		var:202.owner = { peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes }
		GER_add_to_mitteleuropa = yes
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = german-ukrainian_railways } }
			country_event = { id = ukrfor.107 days = 2 }
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = german-ukrainian_railways
			GER = { add_ideas = UKR_railway_profits }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_GER }
			remove_ideas = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_GER
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS }
			remove_ideas = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea }
			remove_ideas = UKR_brotfrieden_idea
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.85.a
		trigger = { tag = GER }
		add_ideas = GER_ukr_some_concessions		
	}
}

country_event = { # UPSS-GER
	id = ukrfor.86
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.86" }
	title = ukrfor.86.t
	desc = ukrfor.86.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.86.a
		embargo_FROM = yes
		every_other_country = {
			limit = { is_ally_with = GER }
			ROOT = { embargo_PREV = yes }
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_economic_standstill_1
			days = 365
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_economic_crisis_1_tt
	}
}

country_event = { # UPSS-GER
	id = ukrfor.87
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.87" }
	title = ukrfor.87.t
	desc = ukrfor.87.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.87.a
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					is_controlled_by = ROOT
				}
				ROOT = { divisions_in_state = { state = PREV size > 0 } }
			}
			teleport_armies = {
				limit = { tag = ROOT }
				to_state_array = owned_controlled_states
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			teleport_armies = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						tag = ROOT
						has_war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				to_state_array = owned_controlled_states
			}
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = UKR_economic_standstill_1
			days = 365
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_economic_crisis_1_tt
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = war_economy } }
			increase_mobilisation = yes
		}
		else = {
			increase_conscription = yes
		}
		FROM = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = ROOT
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
	}
}
