					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_NEUTRALITY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = UKR_mie_subversive
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsun.33
			days = 20
			random_days = 20
		}	
	}
}

country_event = { # UVO-GER
	id = ukrfor.98
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.98" }
	title = ukrfor.98.t
	desc = ukrfor.98.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.98.a
		trigger = { tag = GER }
		var:202.owner = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_global_flag = GER_UKR_demands_good }
				}
				remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
				GER_add_to_mitteleuropa = yes
			}
			country_event = ukrfor.98
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_germany_will_guarantee }
			give_guarantee = UKR
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_railway_profits }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = UKR_railway_profits
				add_idea = UKR_railway_profits_1
			}
		}		
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.98.a
		trigger = { original_tag = UKR }
		if = {
			limit = { is_faction_leader = no }
			remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
			peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_germany_will_guarantee }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh
				add_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions
				add_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions }
			}
			add_ideas = UKR_ger_some_concessions
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_will_terminate_brotfrieden }
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_GER }
				remove_ideas = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_GER
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea }
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea
					add_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS
				}
				activate_targeted_decision = { decision = UKR_terminate_the_brotfrieden target = AUS }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS }
				remove_ideas = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS
				activate_targeted_decision = { decision = UKR_terminate_the_brotfrieden target = AUS }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mil_access }
			hidden_effect = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							tag = GER
							is_in_faction_with = GER
						}
					}
					var:202.owner = { give_military_access = PREV }
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							tag = GER
							is_in_faction_with = GER
						}
					}
					PREV = { give_military_access = UKR }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = GER_UKR_demands_good }
			GER_leave_mitteleuropa = yes
		}
		UKR_update_military = yes
	}
}

	id = ukrfor.99
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.99" }
	title = ukrfor.99.t
	desc = ukrfor.99.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.99.a

			UKR_remove_brotfrieden_without_events = yes
			clear_relations_with_PREV = yes
			peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = var:202.owner
			type = annex_everything
		}
		activate_mission = UKR_crush_the_ukrainian_revolt
		hidden_effect = {
			var:202.owner = { activate_mission = UKR_resist_the_germans }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #for GER, start negotiations with Ukraine
	id = ukrfor.100
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.100" }
	title = ukrfor.100.t
	desc = ukrfor.100.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.100.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				AND = {
					UKR = { has_government = social_democrat }
					GER = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				UKR = { has_government = social_democrat }
				WHR = { 
					OR = {
						has_government = social_democrat 
						has_government = social_conservative
					}
					is_in_faction_with = GER
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.01 }
		var:202.owner = { 
			set_country_flag = UKR_GER_harsh
			country_event = { id = ukrfor.103 days = 2 } 
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.100.b
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.01 }
		var:202.owner = { country_event = { id = ukrfor.102 days = 2 } }
	}
}

			modifier = {
				factor = 0

			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		GER = { country_event = { id = ukrfor.104 days = 4 } }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.102.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50			
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_AUSTRIA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_NEUTRALITY }
				}
			}
		}

			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = german-ukrainian_railways } }
			country_event = { id = ukrfor.107 days = 2 }
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = german-ukrainian_railways
			GER = { add_ideas = UKR_railway_profits }
		}
		country_event = { id = ukrfor.110 days = 4 }
	}

country_event = { #GER-UKR deal
	id = ukrfor.110
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.110" }
	title = ukrfor.110.t
	desc = ukrfor.110.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.110.a
		trigger = { original_tag = UKR }
		GER_add_to_mitteleuropa = yes
		add_to_tech_sharing_group = german_research
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_GER_compromise } #Most lenient deal
			add_ideas = UKR_ger_some_concessions
			GER = { give_guarantee = UKR }
			hidden_effect = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							tag = GER
							is_in_faction_with = GER
						}
					}
					var:202.owner = { give_military_access = PREV }
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							tag = GER
							is_in_faction_with = GER
						}
					}
					PREV = { give_military_access = UKR }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_GER_harsh } #Strictest deal
			GER = { add_to_faction = UKR }
			add_ideas = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh
			add_to_variable = { UKR_landreform_cost = 15 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_increase_reform_cost_15
		}
		else = { #Moderate deal
			add_ideas = UKR_ger_all_concessions
			GER = { give_guarantee = UKR }
			hidden_effect = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							tag = GER
							is_in_faction_with = GER
						}
					}
					var:202.owner = { give_military_access = PREV }
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							tag = GER
							is_in_faction_with = GER
						}
					}
					PREV = { give_military_access = UKR }
				}
			}
			add_to_variable = { UKR_landreform_cost = 10 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_increase_reform_cost_10
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			GER = { country_event = ukrfor.110 }
			var:202.owner = { country_event = { id = ukrfor.646 days = 14 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = UKR_transfered_our_fleet_to_CRM 
					has_country_flag = UKR_transfered_our_fleet_to_GER
				}
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = UKR_demand_our_fleet }
		}
		country_event = {
			id = ukrsoc.1
			days = 5
		}
		country_event = {
			id = ukrfor.111
			days = 2
			random_days = 20
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.110.a
		trigger = { tag = GER }
		add_political_power = 50
		effect_tooltip = {
			var:202.owner = {
				GER_add_to_mitteleuropa = yes
				add_to_tech_sharing_group = german_research
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_GER_compromise } #Most lenient deal
					add_ideas = UKR_ger_some_concessions
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_GER_harsh } #Strictest deal
					add_ideas = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh
					GER = { add_to_faction = UKR }
				}
				else = { #Moderate deal
					add_ideas = UKR_ger_all_concessions
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = ukrfor.116
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.116" }
	title = ukrfor.116.t
	desc = ukrfor.116.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.116.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				if = {
					limit = { tag = GER }
					OR = {
						has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_TRUE }
						has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_TRUE_GER_UNION }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		embargo_FROM = yes
		if = {
			limit = { tag = GER }
			set_global_flag = UKR_GER_peace
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = ROOT
						GER_is_in_mitteleuropa = yes
						is_subject_of = MAF
					}
				}
				embargo_FROM = yes
				hidden_effect = {
					var:202.owner = { embargo_PREV = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_global_flag = UKR_AUS_enemies
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
				}
				embargo_FROM = yes
				hidden_effect = {
					var:202.owner = { embargo_PREV = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.101
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.116.b
		trigger = { tag = GER }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
					UKR = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_FALSE }
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = UKR
			type = annex_everything
		}
		activate_mission = UKR_crush_the_ukrainian_revolt
		hidden_effect = {
			var:202.owner = { activate_mission = UKR_resist_the_germans }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Peace with Ukraine?
	id = ukrfor.117
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.117 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = ukrfor.117.t

	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.117.d.stalemate
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				any_allied_country = {
					has_capitulated = yes
					capital_scope = {
						controller = { is_ally_with = FROM }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.117.d.losing_ground
		trigger = {
			any_allied_country = {
				has_capitulated = yes
				capital_scope = {
					controller = { is_ally_with = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	trigger = {
		has_war_with = FROM
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
					has_capitulated = yes
					capital_scope = {
						controller = { is_ally_with = FROM }
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = capitulated_ally
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.117.a #We have no choice...
		FROM = { country_event = ukrfor.118 }
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.117.b #We will not negotiate with syndicalists!
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_war_support = -0.1
		FROM = { country_event = ukrfor.119 }
	}
}

	desc = ukrfor.118.d

	}

			limit = { has_full_control_of_state = 1231 }
			1231 = {
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
				add_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				DKB = { has_capitulated = yes }
			}
			set_country_flag = DKB_has_capitulated
		}

			limit = { has_full_control_of_state = 194 }
			194 = {

				add_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}

			}

			1088 = {

				add_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}

			1220 = {

				add_core_of = ROOT
			}

			1221 = {
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
		}

			137 = {
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
		}		
		FROM = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = DKB_has_capitulated }
			1263 = { set_demilitarized_zone = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = UKR_dyrektoria_tree_unlocked
				NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_congress_begins }
				has_dictatorship_government = no
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.1
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.118.b #No peace with the imperialists!
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_war_support = -0.1
		FROM = { country_event = ukrfor.119 }
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = UKR_dyrektoria_tree_unlocked
				NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_congress_begins }
				has_dictatorship_government = no
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.1
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}

				add_claim_by = GER
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = GER_UKR_CRM_docking_rights }
			var:202.owner = {
				annex_country = {
					target = CRM
				}
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = UKR
				relation = docking_rights
				active = yes
			}
		}		
	}
}

	id = ukrfor.133
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.133 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = ukrfor.133.t
	desc = ukrfor.133.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.133.a
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				UKR = {
					NOT = { 
						has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions 
						has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh 
						has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions } 
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions } 
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.134
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}	
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = if_FROM_agrees
		effect_tooltip = {
			CRM = { CRM_transfer_half_fleet_to_UKR = yes }
		}

			modifier = {

				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh } 
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions } 
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions } 
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0

					UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions }

				id = ukrfor.135
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}

		custom_effect_tooltip = if_FROM_agrees

				}
			}
		}

			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				OR = {
					UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh } 
					UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions } 
					UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions }

country_event = { # Black Sea Fleet
	id = ukrfor.134
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.134 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = ukrfor.134.t
	desc = ukrfor.134.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.134.a
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.5
				has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh 
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions 
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions 
			}
		}
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.137
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.134.b
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh 
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions 
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions 
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh 
					has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions 
					has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions 
				}
			}			
		}
		add_political_power = -35
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_transfered_our_fleet_to_GER }
			clr_country_flag = UKR_transfered_our_fleet_to_GER
			GER = { CRM_transfer_half_fleet_to_UKR = yes }
		}
		else = {
			CRM = { CRM_transfer_half_fleet_to_UKR = yes }
		}
		clr_country_flag = UKR_transfered_our_fleet_to_CRM
		set_global_flag = GER_UKR_CRM_half_fleet
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = CRM
				CRM = { is_subject_of = GER }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.120
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}	
}

	id = ukrfor.141
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.141" }
	title = ukrfor.141.t
	desc = ukrfor.141.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_skoropadsky_willie
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.141.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.1
				RUS = {
					OR = {
						is_in_faction = yes
						is_faction_leader = yes
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				RUS = {
					has_socialist_government = no
					NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
					NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
				}
			}	
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_TRUE_GER_UNION }
				}
			}		
		}
		add_ai_strategy = {
			type = dont_defend_ally_borders
			id = UKR
			value = -200
		}
		add_ai_strategy = {
			type = ignore
			id = UKR
			value = -200
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.142
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.141.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30		
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.143
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { # Threaten Germany
	id = ukrfor.142
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.142" }
	title = ukrfor.142.t
	desc = ukrfor.142.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_skoropadsky_willie
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.142.a
		remove_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = UKR_GER_no_help_agr_crisis
		}
		UKR_skoropadsky_increase_germanophiles = yes
		add_ideas = UKR_Ties_Germany
		add_stability = 0.05
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea
				add_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = AUS decision = UKR_terminate_the_brotfrieden }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_GER }
			remove_ideas = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_GER
		}
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Threaten_Germany
	}
}

		ai_chance = {
			base = 40

			}

				days = 2

			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.143.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_TRUE_GER_UNION }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		UKR_skoropadsky_increase_germanophiles = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.143.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_protofis_dismissed }			
			RUS = {
				has_socialist_government = no
				NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
				NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 55
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { UKR_skoropadskyi_orientation > 0 }
			}			
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_TRUE_GER_UNION }
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = -0.08
		}
		add_political_power = -15
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.146
				days = 2
			}
		}
		UKR_skoropadsky_increase_russophiles = yes
	}
}

			base = 15

				factor = 2.5
				RUS = {
					has_socialist_government = no
					NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
					NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_TRUE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_TRUE_GER_UNION }
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.149
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

			base = 85

country_event = { # Threaten Germany
	id = ukrfor.145
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.145" }
	title = ukrfor.145.t
	desc = ukrfor.145.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_german_garrison
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.145.a
		remove_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = UKR_GER_no_help_agr_crisis
		}
		UKR_skoropadsky_increase_germanophiles = yes
		add_ideas = UKR_Ties_Germany
		add_stability = 0.05
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea
				add_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = AUS decision = UKR_terminate_the_brotfrieden }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_GER }
			remove_ideas = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_GER
		}
		complete_national_focus = UKR_Threaten_Germany
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = ukrfor.152
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.152" }
	title = ukrfor.152.t
	desc = ukrfor.152.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_poltava
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.152.a		
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { has_unit_leader = 17913 }
				}
				XXA = {
					random_unit_leader = {
						limit = { has_id = 17913 }
						set_nationality = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = 0.12
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = 0.08
			}
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = UKR_Ivan_Poltvets_Ostrianytsia_hog_pau
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Ivan Poltavets-Ostrianytsia"
			desc = "POLITICS_IVAN_POLTAVETS_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Ivan_Poltavets_Ostrianytsia.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = pataut_cossack_subtype
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_tech = cossack_corps_tech }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = cossack_corps_tech_effect
			hidden_effect = { set_technology = { cossack_corps_tech  = 1 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_template = "Kozatska Dyviziia" }
			}
			division_template = {
				name = "Kozatska Dyviziia"
				division_names_group = UKR_CAV_02
				regiments = {
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					irregular_cavalry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
				}
				support = {
					recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
				owner = ROOT
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.4"
				owner = ROOT
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
				owner = ROOT
			}
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Kozatska Dyviziia\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
				owner = ROOT
			}
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party4
			long_name = UKR_paternal_autocrat_party4_long
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = UKR_cossack_state
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = UKR_khmel_host } }
			add_ideas = UKR_khmel_host			
			UKR_improve_ukrainisation = yes
		}		
	}
}

	id = ukrfor.153
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.153" }
	title = ukrfor.153.t
	desc = ukrfor.153.d

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.153.a
		get_current_government_type = yes
		GER = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = UKR
				autonomous_state = kr_autonomy_personal_union
			}
		}
		restore_previous_government_type = yes
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				GER = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Wilhelm II"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Vasyl II"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Willy_II_Ukraine.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = pataut_ukrainian_conservatism_subtype
				traits = { UKR_hetman_title }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				GER = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Wilhelm III"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Vasyl II"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Willy_III_Ukraine.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = pataut_ukrainian_conservatism_subtype
				traits = { UKR_hetman_title }
			}
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = UKR_GER_union
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = UKR_Ivan_Poltvets_Ostrianytsia_hog_pau
	}	
}

country_event = { #
	id = ukrfor.158
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.158" }
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { is_faction_leader = no }
			remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
			peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
		}
		GER_remove_from_mitteleuropa = yes
		MIE_remove_from_intermarium = yes
		remove_from_all_tech_sharing_groups = yes
		#double check
		if = {
			limit = { 
				RUS = { has_war_with = ROOT }
			}
			RUS = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = RUS
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = no
		}
		RUS = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
		UKR_remove_brotfrieden_without_events = yes
	}
	trigger = { 
		original_tag = UKR 
		has_global_flag = UKR_secret_collusion_with_russia 
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	hidden = yes
	option = {
		UKR_skoropadsky_increase_russophiles = yes
		hidden_effect = { UKR_skoropadsky_increase_russophiles = yes }
	}	
} 

country_event = { #Peace with Ukraine?
	id = ukrfor.160
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.160 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = ukrfor.160.t

	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.160.d.stalemate
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				any_allied_country = {
					has_capitulated = yes
					capital_scope = {
						controller = { is_ally_with = FROM }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.160.d.losing_ground
		trigger = {
			any_allied_country = {
				has_capitulated = yes
				capital_scope = {
					controller = { is_ally_with = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	trigger = {
		has_war_with = FROM
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
					has_capitulated = yes
					capital_scope = {
						controller = { is_ally_with = FROM }
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = capitulated_ally
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.160.a #We have no choice...
		FROM = { country_event = ukrfor.161 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Germany Offers Peace
	id = ukrfor.161
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.161 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = ukrfor.161.t
	desc = ukrfor.161.d

	trigger = {
		has_war_with = FROM
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.161.a #Victory at last!
		set_global_flag = UKR_GER_peace
		if = {
			limit = { has_full_control_of_state = 1231 }
			1231 = {
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
				add_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				DKB = { has_capitulated = yes }
			}
			set_country_flag = DKB_has_capitulated
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_full_control_of_state = 194 }
			194 = {
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
				add_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_full_control_of_state = 95 }
			95 = {
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
				add_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_full_control_of_state = 1088 }
			1088 = {
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
				add_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_full_control_of_state = 1220 }
			1220 = {
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_full_control_of_state = 1221 }
			1221 = {
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_full_control_of_state = 137 }
			137 = {
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
		}		
		FROM = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = DKB_has_capitulated }
			1263 = { set_demilitarized_zone = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = UKR_dyrektoria_tree_unlocked
				NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_congress_begins }
				has_dictatorship_government = no
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrsoc.1
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Ultimatum for Cholm
	id = ukrfor.200
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.200" }
	title = ukrfor.200.t
	desc = ukrfor.200.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.200.a #Accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				UKR = { has_country_flag = UKR_pol_gal_relations_forever_destroyed }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = {
				1088 = {
					owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
				}
			}
			1088 = {
				owner = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrfor.203
						days = 1
						random = 24
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = UKR
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = FROM
						is_claimed_by = FROM
					}
				}
				FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.201
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.200.b #refuse
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.202
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

}

country_event = { #owner accepts
	id = ukrfor.201
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.201" }
	title = ukrfor.201.t
	desc = ukrfor.201.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.201.a #great
		FROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
						AND = {
							is_claimed_by = ROM
							ROOT = { is_in_faction_with = ROM }
						}
					}
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #AUS refuses
	id = ukrfor.202
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.202" }
	title = ukrfor.202.t
	desc = ukrfor.202.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.202.a #then it's war
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
				}
			}				
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.229.b #then it's war
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { owns_state = 1088 }
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = FROM decision = UKR_attack_country }
		}
		else = {
			1088 = {
				owner = {
					ROOT = { activate_targeted_decision = { target = PREV decision = UKR_attack_country } }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.229.c #
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		add_political_power = -50
		add_war_support = -0.05
	}
}

country_event = { #AUS betrayed us
	id = ukrfor.203
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.203" }
	title = ukrfor.203.t
	desc = ukrfor.203.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.203.a #there is nothing we can do...
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_claimed_by = UKR
					is_core_of = UKR
				}
			}
			var:202.owner = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.203.b #resist
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		var:202.owner = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.204
				days = 1
				random = 24
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = ukrfor.205
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.205" }
	title = ukrfor.205.t
	desc = ukrfor.205.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.205.a #Accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = {
				CRM = { 
					OR = {
						is_subject_of = ROOT 
						is_guaranteed_by = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = CRM
				relation = guarantee
				active = no
			}
			CRM = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrfor.208
					days = 1
					random = 24
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.206
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.205.b #refuse
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = no }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.207
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

}

		ai_chance = { base = 65 }
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.221
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.220.b #we will show them!
		ai_chance = { base = 35 }
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.222
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}	
}

					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
				}

			target = FROM

		}

country_event = { #Ultimatum for Romania
	id = ukrfor.223
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.223" }
	title = ukrfor.223.t
	desc = ukrfor.223.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.223.a #
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_dictatorship_government = no
				UKR_bolsheviks_in_power = no
			}
		}
		add_state_claim = 78 #
		add_state_claim = 1222 #
		add_state_claim = 1320
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROM = { is_subject = yes }
			}
			ROM = {
				overlord = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrfor.224
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			ROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrfor.224
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.223.b #
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_dictatorship_government = yes
					UKR_bolsheviks_in_power = yes
				}
			}
		}
		add_state_claim = 1222 #
		add_state_claim = 1320
		if = {
			limit = {
				ROM = { is_subject = yes }
			}
			ROM = {
				overlord = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrfor.225
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			ROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrfor.225
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
	}

}
country_event = { #Ultimatum for Romania
	id = ukrfor.224
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.224" }
	title = ukrfor.224.t
	desc = ukrfor.224.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.224.a #Accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = {
				78 = {
					owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
				}
			}
			78 = {
				owner = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrfor.226
						days = 1
						random = 24
					}
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = FROM
						is_claimed_by = FROM
					}
					OR = {
						state = 1222
						state = 1320
						state = 78
					}
				}
				FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.228
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.224.b #refuse
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.229
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

}

country_event = { #betrayed us
	id = ukrfor.226
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.226" }
	title = ukrfor.226.t
	desc = ukrfor.226.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.226.a #there is nothing we can do...
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_claimed_by = UKR
					is_core_of = UKR
				}
			}
			var:202.owner = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.226.b #resist
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		var:202.owner = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.227
				days = 1
				random = 24
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #owner accepts
	id = ukrfor.228
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.228" }
	title = ukrfor.228.t
	desc = ukrfor.228.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.228.a #great
		FROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes				
					OR = {
						state = 1222
						state = 1320
						state = 78
					}
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
		clear_embargo_FROM = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #refuses
	id = ukrfor.229
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.229" }
	title = ukrfor.229.t
	desc = ukrfor.229.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.229.a #then it's war
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
				}
			}		
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.229.b #then it's war
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { owns_state = 78 }
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = FROM decision = UKR_attack_country }
		}
		else = {
			78 = {
				owner = {
					ROOT = { activate_targeted_decision = { target = PREV decision = UKR_attack_country } }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.229.c #
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		add_political_power = -50
		add_war_support = -0.05
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = ukrfor.230
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.230" }
	title = ukrfor.230.t
	desc = ukrfor.230.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_zluka

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.230.a #we will show them!
		FROM = {
			every_unit_leader = { set_nationality = ROOT }
			every_owned_state = {
				if = {
					limit = { is_core_of = PREV }
					add_core_of = ROOT
				}
				if = {
					limit = { is_claimed_by = PREV }
					add_claim_by = ROOT
				}				
			}
		}
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		add_political_power = 200
		add_stability = 0.15
		add_war_support = 0.15
		annex_country = {
			target = FROM
			transfer_troops = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrmisc.62
				months = 12
			}
		}
	}	
}


country_event = { #ROM-UKR peace deal
	id = ukrfor.231
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.231" }
	title = ukrfor.231.t
	
	title = {
		text = ukrfor.231.t.victory
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.231.d.victory
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	
	title = {
		text = ukrfor.231.t.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.231.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = ROM
		has_war_with = 202.owner
		owns_state = 78
		owns_state = 1222
		owns_state = 1320
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		set_temp_variable = { UKR_enemy_tag = 202.owner }
		var:UKR_enemy_tag = {
			is_ukrainian_tag = yes
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		OR = {
			#Romania loses
			var:UKR_enemy_tag = {
				controls_state = 78 #Bessarabia
				controls_state = 1222 # Bujak
				controls_state = 1320 # 
				controls_state = 79 #Moldavia
			}
			surrender_progress > 0.15
			#Romania wins
			var:UKR_enemy_tag = { surrender_progress > 0.1 }
			controls_state = 202 #Kyiv
			controls_state = 226 #Ekaterinoslav
			AND = {
				controls_state = 192 #Odessa
				controls_state = 791 #Podolia
				OR = {
					controls_state = 197 #Kherson
					controls_state = 198 #Vinnitsa
					controls_state = 1245 #Bratslav
					controls_state = 199 #Proskurov
					controls_state = 1241 #Pobuzhie
					controls_state = 1233 #Elisavetgrad
					controls_state = 1232 #Nikolayev
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_ROM_offered_peace }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = { flag = UKR_ROM_offered_peace days = 90 value = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					surrender_progress > 0.15
					NOT = { controls_state = 78 }
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = { flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM days = 60 value = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.231.a #We have no choice; send word to Moscow.
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		var:219.owner = {
			country_event = { id = ukrfor.232 days = 1 random = 24 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.231.b #We can still win this!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.231.c #We prevail!
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM
		}
		var:219.owner = {
			country_event = { id = ukrfor.232 days = 1 random = 24 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.231.d #No, they must be taught a lesson.
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
}

country_event = { #Peace with Romania?
	id = ukrfor.232
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.232" }
	
	title = {
		text = ukrfor.232.t.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.232.d.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	title = {
		text = ukrfor.232.t.defeat
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.232.d.defeat
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		has_war_with = FROM
		FROM = { is_valid_peace_target = yes }
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.232.a #Accept; no point in wasting any more Russian lives.
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = ukrfor.233 }
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.232.b #Refuse; they must be taught a lesson!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		FROM = { country_event = ukrfor.234 }
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.232.c #Reach out to the Romanians; this humiliation must end.
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM
		}
		FROM = { country_event = ukrfor.233 }
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.232.b #To hell with them! We will reach Kishinev at all costs!
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		FROM = { country_event = ukrfor.234 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Treaty of Chisinau
	id = ukrfor.233
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.233" }
	title = ukrfor.233.t

	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.233.d.victory
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.233.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.233.a #United just to be torn asunder again...
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = FROM
					is_claimed_by = FROM
					state = 78 #Bessarabia
					state = 1222
					state = 1320
					if = {
						limit = {
							FROM = { owns_state = 89 } #Stanislawow
						}
						state = 80 #Cernauti
					}
				}
			}
			FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			FROM = { add_to_array = { global.UKR_integration_state_array = PREV } }
		}
		FROM = {
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.233.b 
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_defeated_by_ROM }
		FROM = {
			remove_state_claim = 78 #Bessarabia
			remove_state_claim = 1222
			remove_state_claim = 1320
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #betrayed us
	id = ukrfor.238
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.238" }
	title = ukrfor.238.t
	desc = ukrfor.238.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.238.a #there is nothing we can do...
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_claimed_by = UKR
					is_core_of = UKR
				}
			}
			var:202.owner = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.238.b #resist
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		var:202.owner = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.239
				days = 1
				random = 24
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #WHR attacks
	id = ukrfor.239
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.239" }
	title = ukrfor.239.t
	desc = ukrfor.239.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.239.a #we will show them!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
				}
			}		
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.229.b #then it's war
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					owns_state = 1119
					owns_state = 73
				}				
			}
			ROOT = { activate_targeted_decision = { target = PREV decision = UKR_attack_country } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.229.c #
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		add_political_power = -50
		add_war_support = -0.05
	}
}

country_event = { #Ultimatum for Belarus
	id = ukrfor.240
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.240" }
	title = ukrfor.240.t
	desc = ukrfor.240.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.240.b
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		add_state_claim = 1319
		every_other_country = {
			limit = { owns_state = 1319 }
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_subject = yes
				}
				overlord = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrfor.241
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrfor.241
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.240.c
		ai_chance = { base = 30 }
		add_state_claim = 1319
		add_state_claim = 1314
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					owns_state = 1319
					owns_state = 1314
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_subject = yes
				}
				overlord = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrfor.241
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrfor.241
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.240.e
		trigger = {
			has_government = national_populist
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 90 }
		add_state_claim = 1319
		add_state_claim = 1314
		add_state_claim = 1121
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					owns_state = 1319
					owns_state = 1314
					owns_state = 1121
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_subject = yes
				}
				overlord = {
					country_event = {
						id = ukrfor.241
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrfor.241
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
}
country_event = { #Ultimatum for Belarus
	id = ukrfor.241
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.241" }
	title = ukrfor.241.t
	desc = ukrfor.241.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.241.a #Accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:1319.owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
			}
			var:1319.owner = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrfor.244
					days = 1
					random = 24
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = FROM
						is_claimed_by = FROM
					}
				}
				FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.242
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.241.b #refuse
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.243
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

}

country_event = { #owner accepts
	id = ukrfor.242
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.242" }
	title = ukrfor.242.t
	desc = ukrfor.242.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.242.a #great
		FROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #refuses
	id = ukrfor.243
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.243" }
	title = ukrfor.243.t
	desc = ukrfor.243.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.243.a #then it's war
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
				}
			}		
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.229.b #then it's war
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						owns_state = 1319
						1319 = { is_claimed_by = ROOT }
					}
					AND = {
						owns_state = 1314
						1314 = { is_claimed_by = ROOT }
					}
					AND = {
						owns_state = 1121
						1121 = { is_claimed_by = ROOT }
					}
				}				
			}
			ROOT = { activate_targeted_decision = { target = PREV decision = UKR_attack_country } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.229.c #
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		add_political_power = -50
		add_war_support = -0.05
	}
}

country_event = { # Civil War
	id = ukrfor.252
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.252" }
	title = ukrfor.252.t
	desc = ukrfor.252.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.252.a
		trigger = { tag = GER }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						NOT = { POL = { is_ally_with = ROOT } }
						NOT = { WHR = { is_ally_with = ROOT } }
					}
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_FALSE  }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.6
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.7
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.253
				days = 2
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = UKR
			type = annex_everything
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = USR
			type = annex_everything
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						tag = POL
						is_in_faction = no
						is_subject = no
					}
					AND = {
						tag = ROM
						is_in_faction = no
						is_subject = no
					}
					AND = {
						tag = WHR
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
						is_subject = no
						NOT = { owns_state = 997 }
						NOT = { owns_state = 241 }
						NOT = { owns_state = 93 }
					}
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.252
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			UKR = { add_ideas = UKR_foreign_intervention }
			USR = { add_ideas = UKR_foreign_intervention }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.252.h
		trigger = { tag = GER }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.5
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					tag = GER
					OR = {
						has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_TRUE }
						has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_german_intervetion option = UKR_GERMAN_INTERVENTION_TRUE_GER_UNION }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { save_event_target_as = volunteer_target }
			send_volunteers_to_TARGET = yes
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.262
				days = 2
			}
		}			
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.252.b
		trigger = { 
			tag = RUS
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_war_with = GER
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk
					has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk_1
				}
			}
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.254
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}						
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.252.c
		trigger = { tag = POL }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				UKR = { has_country_flag = UKR_pol_gal_relations_forever_destroyed }
			}
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.254
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.252.e
		trigger = { tag = WHR }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.254
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.252.f
		trigger = { tag = ROM }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.254
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.252.g
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.7
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.4
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.3
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh }
			}
		}		
	}	
}
country_event = { # Petliura
	id = ukrfor.253
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.253" }
	title = ukrfor.253.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.253.d.GER
		trigger = { FROM = { tag = GER } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.253.d.RUS
		trigger = { FROM = { tag = RUS } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.253.d.POL
		trigger = { FROM = { tag = POL } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.253.d.WHR
		trigger = { FROM = { tag = WHR } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.253.d.ROM
		trigger = { FROM = { tag = ROM } }
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.253.a
		trigger = { 
			FROM = { tag = GER }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_petliura_shumskyi }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_petliura_shumskyi_united_front }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_duumvirate_colapsed }			
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_The_Great_Tragedy }			
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Duumvirate_Breaks }		
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
		}
		USR = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.260
				days = 2
			}
		}				
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.253.e
		trigger = { 
			FROM = { tag = GER }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 65
		}
		add_war_support = 0.02				
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.253.c	
		trigger = { 
			FROM = { NOT = { tag = GER } }
			NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
				}
			}			
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = UKR_foreign_intervention } }
			add_ideas = UKR_foreign_intervention
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.253.b		
		trigger = { 
			FROM = { NOT = { tag = GER } }
			NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_war_support = 0.02
		add_stability = -0.03
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.253.e	
		trigger = { 
			FROM = { NOT = { tag = GER } }
			has_war_with = FROM
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_war_support = 0.02				
	}			
}

country_event = { # Petliura
	id = ukrfor.255
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.255" }
	title = ukrfor.255.t
	desc = ukrfor.255.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.255.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = ROM }
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 791 #Transnistria
						state = 192 #Odesa
					}
					is_owned_by = UKR
				}
				add_claim_by = ROM
				transfer_state_to = ROM
			}
		}	
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = WHR }
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 93
						state = 997
						state = 241
					}
					is_owned_by = UKR
				}
				add_claim_by = WHR
				transfer_state_to = WHR
			}
		}	
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = POL }
			every_state = {
				limit = { is_polish_claim_in_ukraine = yes }
				add_claim_by = POL
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 1088
						state = 93
					}
					is_owned_by = UKR
				}
				add_claim_by = POL
				transfer_state_to = POL
			}			
		}			
		UKR = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.253
				days = 3
				random_days = 5
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.257
				days = 1
				random_days = 3
			}
		}				
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.255.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = RUS
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.256
				days = 1
				random_days = 3
			}
		}				
	}			
}
country_event = { # Petliura
	id = ukrfor.256
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.256" }
	title = ukrfor.256.t
	desc = ukrfor.256.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes

	desc = ukrfor.261.d

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.261.a
		set_country_flag = UKR_petliura_shumskyi_united_front
		create_faction = "People's Front Of Ukraine"
		add_to_faction = FROM
		USR = {
			give_guarantee = ROOT
			give_military_access = ROOT
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = contain
				id = "UPR"
				value = -200
			}
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = conquer
				id = "UPR"
				value = -500
			}
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = antagonize
				id = "UPR"
				value = -200
			}
		}
	}		
}
country_event = { # Petliura
	id = ukrfor.262
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.262" }
	title = ukrfor.262.t
	desc = ukrfor.262.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.262.a
		if = {
			limit = { 
				FROM = { tag = GER }
			}
			add_ideas = UKR_german_aid
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				FROM = { tag = AUS }
			}
			add_ideas = UKR_austrian_aid
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				FROM = { tag = RUS }
			}
			add_ideas = UKR_russian_aid
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = medium_increase
		}
	}		
}

country_event = { # Civil War
	id = ukrfor.263
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.263" }
	title = ukrfor.263.t
	desc = ukrfor.263.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.263.a
		trigger = { 
			tag = GER 
			var:202.owner = { has_socialist_government = no }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					NOT = { POL = { is_ally_with = ROOT } }
					NOT = { WHR = { is_ally_with = ROOT } }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.6
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions_harsh }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.7
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_all_concessions }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				UKR = { has_idea = UKR_ger_some_concessions }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = POL
						tag = WHR
						tag = ROM
					}
					NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				}
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = UKR decision = UKR_intervention }
			}
		}
		var:202.owner = {
			give_military_access = PREV
			every_enemy_country = {
				GER = {
					declare_war_on = {
						target = PREV
						type = annex_everything
					}
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.262
				days = 2
			}
		}			
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.263.b
		trigger = { tag = GER }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					NOT = { POL = { is_ally_with = ROOT } }
					NOT = { WHR = { is_ally_with = ROOT } }
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = POL
						tag = WHR
						tag = ROM
					}
					NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				}
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = UKR decision = UKR_intervention }
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = UKR
			type = annex_everything
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = USR
			type = annex_everything
		}
		UKR = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.264
				days = 2
			}
		}
		USR = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.264
				days = 2
			}
		}			
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.263.c
		trigger = { 
			tag = RUS
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
				}
			}			
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = var:221.owner
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.263.e
		trigger = {

		}

			base = 30

				factor = 0

					OR = {
						is_guaranteed_by = GER

					has_left_democratic_government = yes

						OR = {
							is_guaranteed_by = GER 
							is_ally_with = GER
						}
					}					
				}
			}
		}

			target = var:202.owner
			type = annex_everything
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = var:221.owner
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.252.c
		trigger = { tag = POL }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
		}
		every_state = {
			limit = { 
				is_polish_claim_in_ukraine = yes 
				OR = {
					is_owned_by = UKR
					is_owned_by = USR
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = no }
				add_claim_by = ROOT
			}
			transfer_state_to = ROOT
		}
		UKR = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.264
				days = 2
			}
		}
		USR = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.264
				days = 2
			}
		}	
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.252.e
		trigger = { tag = WHR }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
		}
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 93
					state = 997

				}
				OR = {
					is_owned_by = UKR
					is_owned_by = USR
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = no }

			}
			transfer_state_to = ROOT
		}

	id = ukrfor.264
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.264" }
	title = ukrfor.253.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.264.d.GER
		trigger = { FROM = { tag = GER } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.253.d.RUS
		trigger = { FROM = { tag = RUS } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.253.d.POL
		trigger = { FROM = { tag = POL } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.253.d.WHR
		trigger = { FROM = { tag = WHR } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.253.d.ROM
		trigger = { FROM = { tag = ROM } }
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.253.a
		trigger = { 
			FROM = { 
				OR = {
					tag = GER 
					tag = RUS
				}
			}
			UKR_petliura_in_power = yes
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_petliura_shumskyi }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_petliura_shumskyi_united_front }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_duumvirate_colapsed }			
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_The_Great_Tragedy }			
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Duumvirate_Breaks }			
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = UKR_foreign_intervention } }
			add_ideas = UKR_foreign_intervention
		}
		USR = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrfor.260
				days = 2
			}
		}			
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.253.e
		trigger = { 
			FROM = { tag = GER }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 65
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = UKR_foreign_intervention } }
			add_ideas = UKR_foreign_intervention
		}
		add_war_support = 0.02				
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.253.c	
		trigger = { 
			FROM = { NOT = { tag = GER } }
			NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
				}
			}			
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = UKR_foreign_intervention } }
			add_ideas = UKR_foreign_intervention
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.253.b		
		trigger = { 
			FROM = { NOT = { tag = GER } }
			NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = UKR_foreign_intervention } }
			add_ideas = UKR_foreign_intervention
		}
		add_war_support = 0.02
		add_stability = -0.03
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.253.e	
		trigger = { 
			FROM = { NOT = { tag = GER } }
			has_war_with = FROM
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = UKR_foreign_intervention } }
			add_ideas = UKR_foreign_intervention
		}

			base = 20
		}

	}

country_event = { #
	id = ukrfor.303
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.303" }
	title = ukrfor.303.t
	desc = ukrfor.303.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.303.a		
		add_political_power = -10
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_outraged
		}
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { is_russian_tag_that_can_integrate = yes } }
			add_war_support = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { tag = GER } }
			if = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea 
						has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_GER 
					}
				}
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = UKR_terminate_the_brotfrieden }
			}
		} 
		else_if = {
			limit = { FROM = { tag = AUS } }
			if = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea 
						has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS
					}
				}
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = AUS decision = UKR_terminate_the_brotfrieden }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Peace with Ukraine?
	id = ukrfor.304
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.304 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = ukrfor.304.t

	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.304.d.stalemate
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				any_allied_country = {
					has_capitulated = yes
					capital_scope = {
						controller = { is_ally_with = FROM }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.304.d.losing_ground
		trigger = {
			any_allied_country = {
				has_capitulated = yes
				capital_scope = {
					controller = { is_ally_with = FROM }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	trigger = {
		has_war_with = FROM
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
					has_capitulated = yes
					capital_scope = {
						controller = { is_ally_with = FROM }
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = capitulated_ally
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.304.a #We have no choice...
		FROM = { country_event = ukrfor.305 }
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.304.b #We will not negotiate with syndicalists!
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_war_support = -0.1
		FROM = { country_event = ukrfor.306 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Germany Offers Peace
	id = ukrfor.305
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.305 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = ukrfor.305.t
	desc = ukrfor.305.d

	trigger = {
		has_war_with = FROM
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.305.a #Victory at last!
		set_global_flag = UKR_GER_peace
		if = {
			limit = { has_full_control_of_state = 1231 }
			1231 = {
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
				add_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				is_east_galicia = yes
				ROOT = { has_full_control_of_state = PREV }
			}
			transfer_state_to = ROOT
			add_claim_by = ROOT
		}	
		FROM = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }		
	}

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.305.b #No peace with the imperialists!
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_war_support = -0.1
		FROM = { country_event = ukrfor.306 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Ukraine Refuses Peace
	id = ukrfor.306
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrfor.306 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = {
		text = ukrfor.306.t.ukr
		trigger = { original_tag = UKR }
	}
	title = {
		text = ukrfor.306.t.aus
		trigger = { tag = AUS }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.306.d.ukr
		trigger = { original_tag = UKR }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrfor.306.d.aus
		trigger = { tag = AUS }
	}
	
	trigger = {
		has_war_with = FROM
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukrfor.306.a
		trigger = { tag = AUS }
		add_war_support = 0.1
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.306.b
		trigger = { original_tag = UKR }
		add_war_support = 0.3
	}
}


country_event = { #UKR-WHR-POL cooperation for UKR
	id = ukrfor.646
	title = ukrfor.646.t
	desc = ukrfor.646.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3

	trigger = {
		original_tag = UKR
		has_left_democratic_government = yes
		UKR_is_hetmanate_or_monarchy = no
		POL = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
		WHR = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
		has_war = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ukrfor.646 option ukrfor.646.a"
		name = ukrfor.646.a
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = POL
					tag = WHR
					tag = LIT
					tag = KUB
				}
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			country_event = ukrfor.647
			custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_EE_coop_tt
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_ideas = UKR_EE_cooperation
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					modifier = KR_trade_agreement
					target = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		set_variable = { UKR_small_pact_pp = 20 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ukrfor.646 option ukrfor.646.b"
		name = ukrfor.646.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
	}
}
country_event = { #UKR-WHR-POL cooperation for others
	id = ukrfor.647
	title = ukrfor.647.t
	desc = ukrfor.647.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3

	immediate = { set_country_flag = UKR_small_pact_awaiting_response }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ukrfor.647 option ukrfor.647.a"
		name = ukrfor.647.a
		add_ideas = UKR_EE_cooperation
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			modifier = KR_trade_agreement
			target = FROM
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = UKR_small_pact_awaiting_response
			UKR = {
				add_to_variable = { UKR_small_pact_pp = 20 }
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { UKR_small_pact_pp > 20 }
						NOT = {
							POL = { has_country_flag = UKR_small_pact_awaiting_response }
							WHR = { has_country_flag = UKR_small_pact_awaiting_response }
							LIT = { has_country_flag = UKR_small_pact_awaiting_response }
						}
					}
					country_event = ukrfor.648
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ukrfor.647 option ukrfor.647.b"
		name = ukrfor.647.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = UKR_small_pact_awaiting_response
			UKR = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { UKR_small_pact_pp > 20 }
						NOT = {
							POL = { has_country_flag = UKR_small_pact_awaiting_response }
							WHR = { has_country_flag = UKR_small_pact_awaiting_response }
							LIT = { has_country_flag = UKR_small_pact_awaiting_response }
						}
					}
					country_event = ukrfor.648
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Join the Small Pact?
	id = ukrfor.650
	title = ukrfor.650.t
	desc = ukrfor.650.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_BUL_peasant_strike
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ukrfor.650 option ukrfor.650.a"
		name = ukrfor.650.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						tag = BUL
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = BUL_foreign_policy option = DEFAULT } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = EST
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
					}
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FROM }
					has_capitulated = no
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 75
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FROM } }
			FROM = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_EE_cooperation }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = UKR_EE_cooperation
				add_idea = UKR_EE_cooperation2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ukrfor.650 option ukrfor.650.b"
		name = ukrfor.650.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				OR = {
					AND = {
						tag = BUL
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = BUL_foreign_policy option = DEFAULT } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = EST
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = EST_FORPOL_RUSSIA }
							has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = EST_FORPOL_GERMANY }
							has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = EST_FORPOL_SCANDI }
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FROM }
					has_capitulated = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_faction_with = FROM }
			leave_faction = yes
			MIE_remove_from_intermarium = yes
		}
	}
}

			base = 85

				factor = 0

					AND = {
						tag = POL

							has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
							has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_INTERNATIONALE }
							has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_NEUTRALITY }

					AND = {
						tag = EST

							has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = EST_FORPOL_RUSSIA }
							has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = EST_FORPOL_GERMANY }
							has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = EST_FORPOL_SCANDI }

							has_game_rule = { rule = LAT_forpol option = LAT_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY }
						}
					}
					AND = {

						OR = {

							has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
							has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA_SECRET_PACT }
							has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_INTERNATIONALE }
							has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_NEUTRALITY }
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = ROM
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = ROM_foreign_policy option = ROM_FOREIGN_POLICY_STAY_IN_BELGRADE_PACT }
							has_game_rule = { rule = ROM_foreign_policy option = ROM_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
							has_game_rule = { rule = ROM_foreign_policy option = ROM_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
							has_game_rule = { rule = ROM_foreign_policy option = ROM_FOREIGN_POLICY_ENTENTE }
							has_game_rule = { rule = ROM_foreign_policy option = ROM_FOREIGN_POLICY_NEUTRALITY }
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = BUL
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = BUL_foreign_policy option = BUL_FOREIGN_POLICY_NEUTRALITY }
							has_game_rule = { rule = BUL_foreign_policy option = BUL_FOREIGN_POLICY_SERBIA }
							has_game_rule = { rule = BUL_foreign_policy option = BUL_FOREIGN_POLICY_AUSTRIA }
							has_game_rule = { rule = BUL_foreign_policy option = BUL_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
							has_game_rule = { rule = BUL_foreign_policy option = BUL_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
							has_game_rule = { rule = BUL_foreign_policy option = BUL_FOREIGN_POLICY_INTERNATIONALE }
						}
					}				
					AND = {
						tag = CZE
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = CZE_forpol option = CZE_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY }
							has_game_rule = { rule = CZE_forpol option = CZE_FORPOL_REICHSPAKT }
							has_game_rule = { rule = CZE_forpol option = CZE_FORPOL_RUSSIA }
							has_game_rule = { rule = CZE_forpol option = CZE_FORPOL_ENTENTE }
							has_game_rule = { rule = CZE_forpol option = CZE_FORPOL_FACTION_LEADER }
							has_game_rule = { rule = CZE_forpol option = CZE_FORPOL_INTERNATIONALE }
						}
					}

						tag = ARM
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = ARM_forpol option = ARM_FORPOL_GER }
							has_game_rule = { rule = ARM_forpol option = ARM_FORPOL_PER }

							has_game_rule = { rule = ARM_forpol option = ARM_FORPOL_INT }
							has_game_rule = { rule = ARM_forpol option = ARM_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = CAN_joined_iedc }
			CAN_remove_from_iedc = yes
		}
		GER_remove_from_mitteleuropa = yes
		MIE_remove_from_intermarium = yes

	}
	option = {
		name = ukrfor.651.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 0

					}	
					AND = {
						tag = FIN
						has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_UKRAINE }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = EST
						has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = EST_FORPOL_UKRAINE }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = LAT
						has_game_rule = { rule = LAT_forpol option = LAT_FORPOL_UKRAINE }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = WHR
						has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_UKRAINE }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = ROM
						has_game_rule = { rule = ROM_foreign_policy option = ROM_FOREIGN_POLICY_UKRAINE }
					}
					AND = {
