### Elections & Stuff	
country_event = { # Elections
	id = ukrel.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrel.1" }
	title = ukrel.1.t
	desc = ukrel.1.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = UKR
		has_elections = yes
		NOT = { has_global_flag = UPR_dyrektoria_uprising_UPR }
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_mapa
	option = {
		name = ukrel.1.a
		add_political_power = 25
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
}
country_event = { # Elections
	id = ukrel.13
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrel.13" }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { 
			KUB = { country_event = kub.1031 }
		}
	}
	title = ukrel.13.t
	desc = ukrel.13.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = UKR
		has_elections = yes
		has_war = no
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_presidential_elections }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_petliura_elections }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_uns_elections }
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_is_hetmanate_or_monarchy = yes }
			OR = {
				has_idea = UKR_Petro_Bolbochan_hog_ade
				UKR_upss_in_power = yes
				UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = yes
				has_country_flag =UKR_open_2nd_term_trees
			}
		}
		else = { UKR_is_hetmanate_or_monarchy = no }			
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_mapa
	
	option = {
		name = ukrel.13.a
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
		add_political_power = 25
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = var:ROOT.current_party_ideology_group
			elections_allowed = yes
			election_frequency = 60
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = UKR_Petro_Bolbochan_hog_ade }
			set_country_flag = UKR_upss_second_term
			set_country_leader_ideology = generic_national_democracy_subtype
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # Elections
	id = ukrel.14
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrel.14" }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { 
			KUB = { country_event = kub.1031 }
			set_country_flag = UKR_open_2nd_term_trees
		}
	}
	title = ukrel.12.t
	desc = ukrel.12.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = UKR
		has_elections = yes
		has_war = no
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_presidential_elections }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_petliura_elections }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_uns_elections }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_open_2nd_term_trees }
		UKR_is_hetmanate_or_monarchy = yes
		UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = no
		UKR_upss_in_power = no
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_mapa
	
	option = {
		name = ukrel.14.a
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}	
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = UKR_Dmytro_Doroshenko_hog_sli
		add_ideas = {
			UKR_Kazymyr_Huzhkovskyi_for_ade
			UKR_Mykhailo_Savur_Tsypriianovych_eco_ade
			UKR_Petro_Stebnytskyi_sec_sli
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = UKR_uskhd_splits_ump 
					has_country_flag = ukr_switched_uskhd_upss
				}
			}
			add_soccon_to_coalition = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_we_unlock_2nd_term_tree
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes	
		set_country_flag = UKR_elections_held
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrel.14.b
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = ukr_switched_uskhd_upss }
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = social_conservative
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 60
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}	
		}
		else = {
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 60
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}	
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_idea = UKR_Serhiy_Shemet_hog_ade 
					has_idea = UKR_Volodymyr_Zalozetskyi_Sas_hog_sco
				}
			}
			remove_all_ministers_but_hog = yes
		}
		else = {
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = UKR_Serhiy_Shemet_hog_ade
		}
		add_ideas = {
			UKR_Kazymyr_Huzhkovskyi_for_ade
			UKR_Mykhailo_Tymofiiv_eco_ade
			UKR_Andriy_Sheptytskyi_sec_ade
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_we_unlock_2nd_term_tree
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes	
		set_country_flag = UKR_elections_held
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrel.14.c
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = UKR_Mykola_Mikhnovsky_hog_pau
					has_idea = UKR_Pavlo_Skoropadsky_hog_pau
					has_idea = UKR_Ivan_Poltvets_Ostrianytsia_hog_pau
				}
			}
			remove_all_ministers_but_hog = yes
		}
		else = {
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = UKR_Vasyl_Kochubei_hog_pau
		}
		add_ideas = {
			UKR_Liudvih_Sidletskyi_for_pau
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = UKR_protofis_influencing }
			add_ideas = {
				UKR_Vsevolod_Demchenko_eco_pau
				UKR_Borys_Homzyn_sec_pau
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = {
				UKR_Mykola_Sakhno_Ustymovych_eco_pau
				UKR_Borys_Homzyn_sec_pau
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_we_unlock_2nd_term_tree
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes	
		set_country_flag = UKR_elections_held
	}	
}

country_event = { # Elections
	id = ukrel.5
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrel.5" }
	title = ukrel.5.t
	desc = ukrel.5.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = UKR
		has_war = yes
		has_elections = yes
		UKR_is_hetmanate_or_monarchy = no
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_presidential_elections }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_petliura_elections }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_uns_elections }
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_mapa
	
	option = {
		name = ukrel.5.a
		add_war_support = 0.04
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = var:ROOT.current_party_ideology_group
			elections_allowed = yes
			election_frequency = 24
		}	
	}
}
	
country_event = { # Elections
	id = ukrel.10
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrel.10" }
	title = ukrel.10.t
	desc = ukrel.10.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = UKR
		has_country_flag = UKR_presidential_elections
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_petliura_elections }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_uns_elections }
		UKR_vasyl_in_power = no
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_mapa
	
	option = {
		name = ukrel.10.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_oppositional_dyrektoria }
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Ukrainian_Socialism }
			has_global_flag = UPR_dyrektoria_joined_peacefully
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = 0.1
			}
		}
		end_coalition = yes
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}		
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_isaak_mazepa_in_power = no }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Isaak Mazepa"
				desc = "POLITICS_ISAAK_MAZEPA_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Isaak_Mazepa.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = socdem_democratic_socialism_subtype				
			}
		}
		set_variable = { UKR_USDRP_Status = 2 }
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			UKR_Isaak_Mazepa_hog_sde
			UKR_Andrey_Livytskyi_for_sde
			UKR_Dmytro_Antonovych_eco_sde
			UKR_Panas_Fedenko_sec_sde
		}	
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_country_flag = UKR_congress_ended
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrel.10.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = UKR_upss_ukrainian_conservatism }
				has_country_flag = UKR_shapoval_is_uskhd
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_government = authoritarian_democrat }
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = 0.1
			}
		}
		end_coalition = yes
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_soccon_to_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_The_First_Independentist_Party }
			}
			complete_national_focus = UKR_The_First_Independentist_Party
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = UKR_Adopt_Conservative_Platform }
			}
			complete_national_focus = UKR_Adopt_Conservative_Platform
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR_oleksander_shapoval_in_power = no }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Oleksandr Shapoval"
				desc = "POLITICS_OLEKSANDER_SHAPOVAL_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Oleksandr_Shapoval.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = ukrainian_conservatism_subtype
			}
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			UKR_Oleksander_Shapoval_hog_ade
			UKR_Serhiy_Shemet_for_ade
			UKR_Yevhen_Arkhypenko_eco_ade
			UKR_Volodymyr_Oskilko_sec_ade
		}			
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrel.10.c
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_government = authoritarian_democrat }
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				popularity = 0.1
			}
		}
		end_coalition = yes				
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		UKR_setup_upss_president = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}	
}

			unlock_national_focus = UKR_Rychytskyi_Report
			unlock_national_focus = UKR_Skrypnyks_Bolshevism
			unlock_national_focus = UKR_Shakhrai_Address

			if = {
				limit = { is_guaranteed_by = AUS }

			}
			else = {
				GER = { country_event = ukrfor.50 }
			}
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_country_flag = UKR_congress_ended
	}
	option = {

					election_frequency = 60

				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}

			complete_national_focus = UKR_Agrarian_Reform_UPSF
			unlock_national_focus = UKR_Reapproach_Doroshenkos_Faction
			unlock_national_focus = UKR_Coalition_With_National_Democrats
			set_country_flag = UKR_uns_in_power
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol.201
				days = 5
			}
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}	
}


country_event = { # Ukraine Wants to Join the International
	id = ukraine.37
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukraine.37" }
	title = ukraine.37.t
	desc = ukraine.37.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukraine.37.a
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			SOV_puppet_FROM_effect = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_to_faction = var:202.owner
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			var:202.owner = {
				country_event = {
					days = 1
					id = ukraine.38
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukraine.37.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		var:202.owner = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_hates_govt
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Ukraine Join the International
	id = ukraine.38
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukraine.38" }
	title = ukraine.38.t
	desc = ukraine.38.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukraine.38.a
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = GER
					tag = ENT
					is_in_faction_with = GER
					is_in_faction_with = ENT
				}
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_outraged
			}
			embargo_ROOT = yes
		}
		UKR_update_military = yes
	}
}

country_event = { # An offer from Ukraine
	id = ukraine.71
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukraine.71" }
	title = ukraine.71.t
	desc = ukraine.71.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukraine.71.a
		trigger = { NOT = { tag = AUS } }
		ai_chance = { factor = 85 }
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_faction = no }
			create_faction = "Russian Alliance"
		}
		UKR = { leave_faction = yes }
		add_to_faction = UKR
		hidden_effect = {
			UKR = {
				country_event = {
					days = 2
					id = ukraine.72
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukraine.71.a
		trigger = { tag = AUS }
		ai_chance = { factor = 85 }
		GER = { remove_from_faction = UKR }
		add_to_faction = UKR
		hidden_effect = {
			UKR = {
				country_event = {
					days = 2
					id = ukraine.75
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukraine.71.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
		GER = { remove_from_faction = UKR }
		hidden_effect = {
			GER = {
				country_event = {
					days = 2
					id = ukraine.74
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Ukraine in Russian alliance
	id = ukraine.72
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukraine.72" }
	title = ukraine.72.t
	desc = ukraine.72.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukraine.72.a
		set_country_flag = UKR_NORTHERN_WIND
		add_ideas = UKR_Ties_Russia
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = CRM
				CRM = {
					NOT = {
						is_in_faction_with = RUS
						is_subject_of = RUS
					}
				}
			}
			create_wargoal = {
				type = annex_everything
				target = CRM
			}
		}
		UKR_update_military = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			GER = {
				country_event = {
					days = 4
					id = ukraine.73
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Ukraine has left us
	id = ukraine.73
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukraine.73" }
	title = ukraine.73.t
	desc = ukraine.73.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ukraine.73.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}

		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FRA
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.06
	}

	option = {
		name = ukraine.73.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
					UKR = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
				}
			}			
		}

		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FRA
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		declare_war_on = {
			target = UKR
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = ukraine.73.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}

		trigger = {
			has_war_with = FRA
		}

		add_stability = -0.06
	}

	option = {
		name = ukraine.73.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}

		trigger = {
			has_war_with = FRA
		}

		add_stability = 0.02
		declare_war_on = {
			target = UKR
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
}

			factor = 75
		}

				has_war_with = FRA
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.06
	}

	option = {
		name = ukraine.74.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }
					UKR = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AUS = { is_in_faction_with = UKR }
				NOT = { has_war_with = AUS }
			}
		}

		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FRA
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		declare_war_on = {
			target = UKR
			type = annex_everything
		}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}

		trigger = {
			has_war_with = FRA
		}

		add_stability = -0.06
	}

	option = {
		name = ukraine.74.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { dont_start_major_faction_wars = yes }
					ROOT_is_threatened_cautious = yes
					FROM = { default_attack_AI_trigger_FROM = yes }

			}
		}

		trigger = {
			has_war_with = FRA
		}

		add_stability = 0.02
		declare_war_on = {
			target = UKR
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}

country_event = { # 
	id = mizhmoria.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.1" }
	title = mizhmoria.1.t
	desc = mizhmoria.1.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.1.a
		UKR_global_recalculate_mizhmoria_federal_parties = yes
	}	
}

country_event = { # 
	id = mizhmoria.4
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.4" }
	title = {
		text = mizhmoria.4.t.yes
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
	}
	title = {
		text = mizhmoria.4.t.no
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
	}
	desc = {
		text = mizhmoria.4.d.yes
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
	}
	desc = {
		text = mizhmoria.4.d.no
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.4.a
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
		add_political_power = 25
		UKR_add_to_mizhmoria_economic = yes
		set_country_flag = KR_joined_iea
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = mizhmoria_member }
			}
			country_event = mizhmoria.47
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = mizhmoria_member }
				set_country_flag = { flag = disable_ai_joining days = 1 value = 35 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.mizhmoria_tags_array
				country_event = { id = mizhmoria.47 days = KR_vote_delay }
				add_to_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
			}
			set_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 200 }
			add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 200 }
		}			
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.4.b
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
		add_political_power = -25
		add_stability = -0.1
	}	
}

country_event = { # 
	id = mizhmoria.6
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.6" }
	title = {
		text = mizhmoria.6.t.yes
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
	}

		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
	}
	desc = {
		text = mizhmoria.6.d.yes
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
	}
	desc = {
		text = mizhmoria.6.d.no
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.4.a
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = { has_dlc = "La Resistance" }
			if = {
				limit = { has_intelligence_agency = no }
				create_intelligence_agency = {
					name = "Intermarium Defence & Security"
					icon = GFX_intelligence_agency_logo_kr_miz
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_idea_with_trait = head_of_intelligence }
				}
				add_ideas = generic_head_of_intelligence
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = mizhmoria_member }
			}
			country_event = mizhmoria.46
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = mizhmoria_member }
				set_country_flag = { flag = disable_ai_joining days = 1 value = 35 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.mizhmoria_tags_array
				country_event = { id = mizhmoria.46 days = KR_vote_delay }
				add_to_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
			}
		}	
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.4.b
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
		add_political_power = -25
		add_stability = -0.1
	}	
} 

country_event = { # 
	id = mizhmoria.7
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.7" }
	title = {
		text = mizhmoria.7.t.yes
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
	}
	title = {
		text = mizhmoria.7.t.no
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
	}
	desc = {
		text = mizhmoria.7.d.yes
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
	}
	desc = {
		text = mizhmoria.7.d.no
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.4.a
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_economy_transitional_period_amendment }
			hidden_effect = { add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1 }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_transitional
				days = 365
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			custom_effect_tooltip = after_idea_expires
			effect_tooltip = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1
					add_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_2
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1
				add_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_2
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = { add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_iea_2 }
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = mizhmoria_member }
			}
			country_event = mizhmoria.55
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.mizhmoria_tags_array
				country_event = { id = mizhmoria.55 days = KR_vote_delay }
				add_to_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
			}
		}					
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.4.b
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
		add_political_power = -25
		add_stability = -0.1
	}	
} 

country_event = { # 
	id = mizhmoria.8
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.8" }
	title = {
		text = mizhmoria.8.t.yes
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
	}
	title = {
		text = mizhmoria.8.t.no
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
	}
	desc = {
		text = mizhmoria.8.d.yes
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
	}
	desc = {
		text = mizhmoria.8.d.no
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.4.a
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_conservative_agriculture }
			if = {
				limit = { original_tag = UKR }
				custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
				UKR_breadbasket_add_consumer_goods = yes
				UKR_breadbasket_add_trade_opinion = yes
				UKR_breadbasket_add_monthly_population = yes
				UKR_breadbasket_remove_resource_penalty = yes
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_conservative_agriculture
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_socialist_agriculture }
			if = {
				limit = { original_tag = UKR }
				custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
				UKR_breadbasket_add_pp = yes
				UKR_breadbasket_add_trade_opinion = yes
				
				
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_socialist_agriculture
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = { original_tag = UKR }
				custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
				UKR_breadbasket_add_trade_opinion = yes
				UKR_breadbasket_add_monthly_population = yes
				
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_agriculture
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = mizhmoria_member }
			}
			country_event = mizhmoria.40
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.mizhmoria_tags_array
				country_event = { id = mizhmoria.40 days = KR_vote_delay }
				add_to_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
			}
		}					
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.4.b
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
		add_political_power = -25
		add_stability = -0.1
		if = {
			limit = { original_tag = UKR }
			custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
			UKR_breadbasket_add_pp = yes
			UKR_breadbasket_remove_trade_opinion = yes
		}
	}	
}

	id = mizhmoria.10
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.10" }
	title = {
		text = mizhmoria.10.t.yes
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
	}
	title = {
		text = mizhmoria.10.t.no
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
	}
	desc = {
		text = mizhmoria.10.d.yes
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
	}
	desc = {
		text = mizhmoria.10.d.no
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.4.a
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
		add_political_power = 25
		add_stability = 0.07
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = mizhmoria_member }
			}
			country_event = mizhmoria.58
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.mizhmoria_tags_array
				country_event = { id = mizhmoria.59 days = KR_vote_delay }
				add_to_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
			}
		}					
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.4.b
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
		add_political_power = -25
		add_stability = -0.1
	}	
} 
country_event = { # 
	id = mizhmoria.11
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.11" }
	title = {
		text = mizhmoria.11.t.yes
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
	}
	title = {
		text = mizhmoria.11.t.no
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
	}
	desc = {
		text = mizhmoria.11.d.yes
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
	}
	desc = {
		text = mizhmoria.11.d.no
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.4.a
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_healthcare_liberal }
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_socialist_government = yes
						has_government = social_democrat
					}
				}
				add_political_power = -25
				add_stability = -0.07
			}
			else = {
				add_political_power = 25
				add_stability = 0.07
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				popularity = 0.07
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				popularity = 0.03
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				popularity = 0.02
			}
			add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_liberal_healthcare
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_socialist_government = yes
						has_government = social_democrat
					}
				}
				add_political_power = 25
				add_stability = 0.07
			}
			else = {
				add_political_power = -25
				add_stability = -0.07
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = 0.07
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = 0.04
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = 0.02
			}
			add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_socialist_healthcare
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = mizhmoria_member }
			}
			country_event = mizhmoria.39
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = global.mizhmoria_tags_array
				country_event = { id = mizhmoria.39 days = KR_vote_delay }
				add_to_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
			}
		}					
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.4.b
		trigger = { KR_mizhmoria_vote_passes = no }
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_healthcare_liberal }
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_socialist_government = yes
						has_government = social_democrat
					}
				}
				add_political_power = 25
				add_stability = 0.07
			}
			else = {
				add_political_power = -25
				add_stability = -0.07
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				popularity = -0.07
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				popularity = -0.03
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				popularity = -0.02
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_socialist_government = yes
						has_government = social_democrat
					}
				}
				add_political_power = -25
				add_stability = -0.07
			}
			else = {
				add_political_power = 25
				add_stability = 0.07
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = -0.07
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = -0.04
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = -0.02
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { # 
	id = mizhmoria.40
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.40" }
	title = mizhmoria.40.t
	desc = mizhmoria.40.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	trigger = { has_country_flag = mizhmoria_member }
	
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.40.a		
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_conservative_agriculture
						has_socialist_government = yes
					}
					AND = {
						has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_socialist_agriculture
						OR = {
							has_government = social_conservative
							has_authoritarian_government = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_conservative_agriculture
						has_government = social_democrat
					}
					AND = {
						has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_socialist_agriculture
						has_government = market_liberal
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_conservative_agriculture }
			if = {
				limit = { original_tag = UKR }
				custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
				UKR_breadbasket_add_consumer_goods = yes
				UKR_breadbasket_add_trade_opinion = yes
				UKR_breadbasket_add_monthly_population = yes
				UKR_breadbasket_remove_resource_penalty = yes
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_conservative_agriculture
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_socialist_agriculture }
			if = {
				limit = { original_tag = UKR }
				custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
				UKR_breadbasket_add_pp = yes
				UKR_breadbasket_add_trade_opinion = yes
				
				
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_socialist_agriculture
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = { original_tag = UKR }
				custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_breadbasket_of_europe_will_change
				UKR_breadbasket_add_trade_opinion = yes
				UKR_breadbasket_add_monthly_population = yes
				
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_agriculture
			}
		}
		MIZ = { country_event = mizhmoria.41 }		
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.47.b		
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		MIZ = { country_event = mizhmoria.42 }	
	}	
}

country_event = { # 
	id = mizhmoria.43
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.43" }
	title = mizhmoria.43.t
	desc = mizhmoria.43.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	trigger = { has_country_flag = mizhmoria_member }
	
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.43.a		
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_intelligence_agency = yes
				OR = {
					agency_upgrade_number > 4
					is_cryptology_department_active = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.7
				has_intelligence_agency = yes
				num_of_operatives > 1
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.7
				OR = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_dlc = "La Resistance" }
			if = {
				limit = { has_intelligence_agency = no }
				create_intelligence_agency = {
					name = "Intermarium Defence & Security"
					icon = GFX_intelligence_agency_logo_kr_miz
				}
			}
			add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_intelligence_lar
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_intelligence
		}
		MIZ = { country_event = mizhmoria.44 }		
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.47.b		
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
	}	
}

	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.47" }
	title = mizhmoria.47.t
	desc = mizhmoria.47.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	trigger = { has_country_flag = mizhmoria_member }
	
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.47.a		
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				num_of_factories < 5
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					var = ROOT.num_of_factories
					value = MIZ.num_of_factories
					compare = greater_than
				}
			}
		}
		UKR_add_to_mizhmoria_economic = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.47.b		
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
	}	
}

			factor = 50
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_mizhmoria_add_political_points_25
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 25 }
			add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 25 }
			set_variable = { iea_civ_factories = 0 }
			set_variable = { iea_mil_factories = 0 }
			set_variable = { iea_nav_factories = 0 }
			country_event = { id = mizhmoria.52 days = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.51.b #join +50PP
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_political_power < 0
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				has_political_power < -50
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_political_power > 99
				has_political_power < 200
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_of_factories < 5
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_mizhmoria_add_political_points_50
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 50 }
			add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 50 }
			set_variable = { iea_civ_factories = 0 }
			set_variable = { iea_mil_factories = 0 }
			set_variable = { iea_nav_factories = 0 }
			country_event = { id = mizhmoria.52 days = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.51.c #join +100PP
		trigger = { has_political_power > 99 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_political_power > 199
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_of_factories < 10
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_mizhmoria_add_political_points_100
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 100 }
			add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 100 }
			set_variable = { iea_civ_factories = 0 }
			set_variable = { iea_mil_factories = 0 }
			set_variable = { iea_nav_factories = 0 }
			country_event = { id = mizhmoria.52 days = 1 }
		}
	}	
}
# Advisors picked
country_event = {
	id = mizhmoria.52
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.52" }
	title = mizhmoria.52.t
	desc = mizhmoria.52.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_factory

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.52.a #Economic
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool < 50 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = KR_iea_econ1
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool < 100 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = KR_iea_econ2
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = KR_iea_econ3
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.52.b #Arms
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				num_of_military_factories < 5
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool < 50 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = KR_iea_mil1
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool < 100 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = KR_iea_mil2
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = KR_iea_mil3
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.52.c #Construction
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool < 50 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = KR_iea_const1
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool < 100 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = KR_iea_const2
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = KR_iea_const3
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
}

# Investment in IEA nation
country_event = {
	id = mizhmoria.53
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.53" }
	title = mizhmoria.53.t
	desc = mizhmoria.53.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy2
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.53.a #Civilian
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_war = no
				date < 1939.1.1
			}
		}
		add_offsite_building = { type = industrial_complex level = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = KR_iea_investment
			set_country_flag = KR_iea_investment
			add_to_variable = { iea_civ_factories = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.53.b #Military
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		add_offsite_building = { type = arms_factory level = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = KR_iea_investment
			set_country_flag = KR_iea_investment
			add_to_variable = { iea_mil_factories = 1 }
		}
	}
}

# Annual investment in IEA
country_event = {
	id = mizhmoria.54
	title = mizhmoria.54.t
	desc = mizhmoria.54.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4

	trigger = {
		is_in_array = { global.mizhmoria_economic_tags_array = ROOT }
		has_country_flag = { flag = KR_joined_iea days > 354 }		
		NOT = {
			has_idea = KR_iea_econ1
			has_idea = KR_iea_econ2
			has_idea = KR_iea_econ3
			has_idea = KR_iea_mil1
			has_idea = KR_iea_mil2
			has_idea = KR_iea_mil3
			has_idea = KR_iea_const1
			has_idea = KR_iea_const2
			has_idea = KR_iea_const3
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 10
	}

	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.54"
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = KR_joined_iea
			set_country_flag = KR_joined_iea
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.54.f #invest 250PP
		trigger = {
			has_political_power > 249
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_political_power > 299
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_of_factories < 30
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				surrender_progress > 0
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -200
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_mizhmoria_add_political_points_200
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 200 }
			add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 200 }
			country_event = { id = mizhmoria.52 days = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.54.a #invest 100PP
		trigger = { has_political_power > 99 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_political_power > 199
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_of_factories < 20
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				surrender_progress > 0
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_mizhmoria_add_political_points_100
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 100 }
			add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 100 }
			country_event = { id = mizhmoria.52 days = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.54.b #invest 50PP
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_political_power < 50
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_political_power < 0
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_political_power > 99
				has_political_power < 200
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_of_factories < 10
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				surrender_progress > 0
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_mizhmoria_add_political_points_50
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 50 }
			add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 50 }
			country_event = { id = mizhmoria.52 days = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.54.c #invest 25PP
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				surrender_progress > 0
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		custom_effect_tooltip = UKR_mizhmoria_add_political_points_25
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 25 }
			add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 25 }
			country_event = { id = mizhmoria.52 days = 1 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.54.e #invest nothing
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				has_political_power > 50
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.5
				has_political_power < 0
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_political_power < -100
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_war = yes
				surrender_progress > 0
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { ROOT.mizhmoria_pp_pool = 0 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # 
	id = mizhmoria.55
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.55" }
	title = mizhmoria.55.t
	desc = mizhmoria.55.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { has_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_2 }
		has_country_flag = mizhmoria_member
	}
	
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.55.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					tag = POL
					tag = TUR
					check_variable = {
						var = ROOT.num_of_factories
						value = MIZ.num_of_factories
						compare = greater_than
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				OR = {
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
					has_government = social_conservative
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					var = ROOT.num_of_factories
					value = MIZ.num_of_factories
					compare = greater_than
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_economy_transitional_period_amendment }
			hidden_effect = { add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1 }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_transitional
				days = 365
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			custom_effect_tooltip = after_idea_expires
			effect_tooltip = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = KR_mizhmoria_central_bank }
					swap_ideas = {
						remove_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1
						add_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_3
					}
				}
				else = {
					swap_ideas = {
						remove_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1
						add_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = KR_mizhmoria_central_bank }
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1
					add_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_3
				}
			}
			else = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1
					add_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_2
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = KR_mizhmoria_central_bank }
					add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_iea_3 
				}
				else = {
					add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_iea_2
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = MIZ_currency_zone
		MIZ = { country_event = mizhmoria.56 }
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.55.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = KR_mizhmoria_central_bank }
				add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1a 
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1
			}
		}
		MIZ = { country_event = mizhmoria.57 }
	}
}

		trigger = { has_country_flag = MIZ_currency_zone }
	}

		text = mizhmoria.58.d
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_country_flag = MIZ_currency_zone }

			}

			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1
				add_idea = KR_mizhmoria_iea_1a
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { # 
	id = mizhmoria.60
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.60" }
	title = mizhmoria.60.t
	desc = mizhmoria.60.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy2
	
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.60.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 85
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_government = totalist
					has_government = national_populist
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.7
				OR = {
					has_government = syndicalist
					has_government = radical_socialist
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						tag = POL
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = POL_foreign_policy option = POL_FOREIGN_POLICY_AUSTRIA }
							has_game_rule = { rule = POL_foreign_policy option = POL_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
							has_game_rule = { rule = POL_foreign_policy option = POL_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
							has_game_rule = { rule = POL_foreign_policy option = POL_FOREIGN_POLICY_ENTENTE }
							has_game_rule = { rule = POL_foreign_policy option = POL_FOREIGN_POLICY_INTERNATIONALE }
						}	
					}
					AND = {
						tag = FIN
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_NORDIC }
							has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_ENTENTE }
							has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
							has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_INTERNATIONALE }
						}						
					}
					AND = {
						tag = EST
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = EST_FORPOL_RUSSIA }
							has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = EST_FORPOL_GERMANY }
							has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = EST_FORPOL_SCANDI }
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = LAT
						has_game_rule = { rule = LAT_forpol option = LAT_FORPOL_ALLIANCE }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = WHR
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_STAY_WITH_GERMAN }
							has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
							has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA_SECRET_PACT }
							has_game_rule = { rule = WHR_foreign_policy option = WHR_FOREIGN_POLICY_INTERNATIONALE }
						}
					}
					AND = {
						tag = ROM
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = ROM_foreign_policy option = ROM_FOREIGN_POLICY_STAY_IN_BELGRADE_PACT }
							has_game_rule = { rule = ROM_foreign_policy option = ROM_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
							has_game_rule = { rule = ROM_foreign_policy option = ROM_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
							has_game_rule = { rule = ROM_foreign_policy option = ROM_FOREIGN_POLICY_ENTENTE }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = CAN_joined_iedc }
			CAN_remove_from_iedc = yes
		}
		GER_remove_from_mitteleuropa = yes
		MIE_remove_from_intermarium = yes
		UKR_add_to_mizhmoria = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = mizhmoria.60.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15			
		}
		FROM = { country_event = mizhmoria.61 }	
	}	
}

country_event = { #Economic cooperation - voting
	id = mizhmoria.63
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.63 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = mizhmoria.63.t
	desc = mizhmoria.63.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Not voting
		name = mizhmoria.63.a
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		}		
	}
	option = { #Yes
		name = mizhmoria.63.b
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = {
					var = ROOT.num_of_factories
					value = MIZ.num_of_factories
					compare = greater_than
				}
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_yes_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}

	option = {	#No
		name = mizhmoria.63.c
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_authoritarian_government = no
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_no_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}

	option = {	#Abstain
		name = mizhmoria.63.e
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
					has_government = market_liberal
				}
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_abstain_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}
}

	show_major = {

			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.02
		}

		}
		add_popularity = {

			popularity = 0.02
		}

	}

	}

	option = { #

		trigger = { 
			tag = MIZ
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_yes_votes = global.mizhmoria_sdpm_pop }
		subtract_from_variable = { global.mizhmoria_no_votes = global.mizhmoria_sdpm_pop }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = mizhmoria_member }
			country_event = mizhmoria.67
		}
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}
	option = { #
		name = mizhmoria.67.a
		trigger = { 
			NOT = {
				tag = MIZ
				has_government = social_conservative
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}

			NOT = { tag = MIZ }
			OR = {
				has_government = social_conservative
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}	
}

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Not voting
		name = mizhmoria.63.a
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		}		
	}
	option = { #Yes
		name = mizhmoria.63.b
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 85
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				num_researched_technologies > 200
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.7
				num_researched_technologies > 150
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				num_researched_technologies > 100
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_yes_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}

	option = {	#No
		name = mizhmoria.63.c
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_no_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}

	option = {	#Abstain
		name = mizhmoria.63.e
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_abstain_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}

			modifier = {

				has_intelligence_agency = yes
				OR = {
					agency_upgrade_number > 4
					is_cryptology_department_active = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.7
				has_intelligence_agency = yes
				num_of_operatives > 1
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.7
				OR = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_yes_votes = ROOT.member_seats }

			base = 10

		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
		}
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}
	option = { #
		name = mizhmoria.64.a
		trigger = { 
			NOT = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
		}
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}	
}

country_event = { #Bank cooperation - voting
	id = mizhmoria.81
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.81 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = mizhmoria.81.t
	desc = mizhmoria.81.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Not voting
		name = mizhmoria.81.a
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		}		
	}
	option = { #Yes
		name = mizhmoria.81.b
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_yes_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}

	option = {	#No
		name = mizhmoria.81.c
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_no_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}

	option = {	#Abstain
		name = mizhmoria.81.e
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_abstain_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Health cooperation - voting
	id = mizhmoria.85
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.85 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = mizhmoria.85.t
	desc = mizhmoria.85.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #
		name = mizhmoria.85.a
		set_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_healthcare_socialist
		effect_tooltip = {
			country_event = mizhmoria.88
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { KR_is_mizhmoria_member = yes }
				country_event = mizhmoria.88
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
				set_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
				for_each_scope_loop = {
					array = global.mizhmoria_tags_array
					country_event = { id = mizhmoria.88 days = KR_vote_delay }
					add_to_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = mizhmoria.88
				every_other_country = {
					limit = { KR_is_mizhmoria_member = yes }
					country_event = mizhmoria.88
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_parties_formed }
					KR_mizhmoria_calculate_parties_support = yes
					country_event = {
						id = mizhmoria.89
						days = 5
						random_days = 10
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_member_delegations_formed }
					KR_mizhmoria_calculate_member_delegations_support = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = mizhmoria.85.b
		set_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_healthcare_liberal
		effect_tooltip = {
			country_event = mizhmoria.86
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { KR_is_mizhmoria_member = yes }
				country_event = mizhmoria.86
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
				set_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
				for_each_scope_loop = {
					array = global.mizhmoria_tags_array
					country_event = { id = mizhmoria.86 days = KR_vote_delay }
					add_to_temp_variable = { KR_vote_delay = 1 }
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = mizhmoria.86
				every_other_country = {
					limit = { KR_is_mizhmoria_member = yes }
					country_event = mizhmoria.86
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_parties_formed }
					KR_mizhmoria_calculate_parties_support = yes
					country_event = {
						id = mizhmoria.87
						days = 5
						random_days = 10
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_member_delegations_formed }
					KR_mizhmoria_calculate_member_delegations_support = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}			
}
country_event = { #Health cooperation - voting
	id = mizhmoria.86
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.86 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = mizhmoria.86.t
	desc = mizhmoria.86.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Not voting
		name = mizhmoria.86.a
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		}		
	}
	option = { #Yes
		name = mizhmoria.86.b
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
					has_government = social_democrat
				}
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_yes_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}

	option = {	#No
		name = mizhmoria.86.c
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
				NOT = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
					has_government = social_democrat
				}
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_no_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}

	option = {	#Abstain
		name = mizhmoria.86.e
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_abstain_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}

country_event = { #Health cooperation - voting
	id = mizhmoria.90
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event mizhmoria.90 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = mizhmoria.90.t
	desc = mizhmoria.90.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Not voting
		name = mizhmoria.90.a
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		}		
	}
	option = { #Yes
		name = mizhmoria.90.b
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
					has_government = social_conservative
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.3
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_yes_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}

	option = {	#No
		name = mizhmoria.90.c
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
				OR = {
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
					has_government = social_conservative
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_no_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}

	option = {	#Abstain
		name = mizhmoria.90.e
		trigger = { has_global_flag = UKR_mizhmoria_federal_national_curias_formed }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { global.mizhmoria_abstain_votes = ROOT.member_seats }
		KR_mizhmoria_dirty = yes
	}
}

news_event = { # Agricultural Crisis
	id = ukrnews.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrnews.1" }
	title = ukrnews.1.t
	desc = ukrnews.1.d
	
	picture = GFX_news_event_UKR_famine
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { regional_europe_news = yes }
	major = yes
	fire_for_sender = no
	show_major = {
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			is_neighbor_of = UKR
		}
		NOT = { original_tag = UKR }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukrnews.1.a
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
			OR = {
				tag = GER
				GER_is_in_mitteleuropa = yes
				tag = AUS
				is_ally_with = AUS
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrnews.1.b
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrnews.1.c
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
			NOT = {
				tag = GER
				GER_is_in_mitteleuropa = yes
				tag = AUS
				is_ally_with = AUS
			}
		}
	}	
}

		NOT = { original_tag = UKR }

		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			is_neighbor_of = UKR
		}
		NOT = { original_tag = UKR }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = ukrnews.5.a
		trigger = { 
			NOT = {
				tag = GER
				tag = AUS
				is_ally_with = GER
				is_ally_with = AUS
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrnews.5.b
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				tag = GER
				tag = AUS
				is_ally_with = GER
				is_ally_with = AUS
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = ukrpol_explosion.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol_explosion.1" }
	title = ukrpol_explosion.1.t
	desc = ukrpol_explosion.1.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_vasyl
	
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.1.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_AUSTRIA }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ukrpol_explosion_1_a
		set_global_flag = UKR_explosion_AUS_bad
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = UKR
			modifier = UKR_explosion_AUS_bad
		}
		UKR = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol_explosion.2
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.1.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_FACTION_LEADER }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_INTERNATIONALE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_NEUTRALITY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ukrpol_explosion_1_b
		add_political_power = -25
		UKR = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol_explosion.3
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
}

			NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = AUS }
			NOT = { is_ally_with = AUS }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea
					has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS
				}
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = AUS decision = UKR_terminate_the_brotfrieden }
		}
		UKR_teardown_investigation_decisions = yes
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol_explosion.11
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.10.b
		add_political_power = -15
	}

		text = ukrpol_explosion.15.d
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			UKR_andriy_melnyk_in_power = no
			has_left_democratic_government = no
			UKR_ukp_in_power = no
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.15.d2
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			UKR_andriy_melnyk_in_power = no
			UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = no
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.15.d3
		trigger = { 
			has_left_democratic_government = no
			UKR_ukp_in_power = no
			UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = no
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.15.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0 
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_SHUMSKYI }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_FAILED_STATE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UKP_S }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UPSR_R }
				}
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_borotbysts = 2 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_upss = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_dyrektoria = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_uvo = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_derzhvarta = -1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.15.b
		trigger = {
			has_left_democratic_government = no
			UKR_ukp_in_power = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_dyrektoria = 2 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_borotbysts = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_uvo = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_upss = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_derzhvarta = -1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.15.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_upss = 2 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_borotbysts = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_dyrektoria = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_derzhvarta = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_uvo = -1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.15.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0 
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_PETLIURA_MELNYK }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UVO_DONTSOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UVO_KON }
					has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_future option = UKR_FUTURE_UVO_MELNYK }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			UKR_andriy_melnyk_in_power = no
		}
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_uvo = 2 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_borotbysts = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_dyrektoria = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_derzhvarta = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_upss = -1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.15.f
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				UKR_pavlo_skoropadsky_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_derzhvarta = 2 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_borotbysts = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_dyrektoria = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_uvo = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { UKR_inv_upss = -1 }
	}	
}

country_event = { #
	id = ukrpol_explosion.16
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol_explosion.16" }
	title = ukrpol_explosion.16.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.16.d1
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_uvo }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.16.d2
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_borotbysts }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.16.d3
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_derzhvarta }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.16.d4
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_dyrektoria }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.16.d5
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_upss }
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.16.a
		UKR_assasin_debuffs = yes
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_war_with = AUS }
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
			}
			AUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrpol_explosion.18
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}	
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.16.b
		UKR_assasin_debuffs = yes
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_war_with = AUS }
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
			}
			AUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = ukrpol_explosion.18
					days = 2
					random = 48
				}
			}	
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = ukrpol_explosion_16_b
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ukrpol_explosion.17
				months = 48
			}
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { #
	id = ukrpol_explosion.17
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol_explosion.17" }
	title = ukrpol_explosion.17.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.17.d1
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_uvo }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.17.d2
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_borotbysts }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.17.d3
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_derzhvarta }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.17.d4
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_dyrektoria }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.17.d5
		trigger = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_upss }
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.17.a
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
		add_political_power = -50
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.17.b
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_war_support = -0.1
		add_political_power = 100
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.17.c
		add_political_power = -100
	}	
}

country_event = { #
	id = ukrpol_explosion.18
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol_explosion.18" }
	title = ukrpol_explosion.18.t
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.18.d1
		trigger = { UKR = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_uvo } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.18.d2
		trigger = { UKR = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_borotbysts } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.18.d3
		trigger = { UKR = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_derzhvarta } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.18.d4
		trigger = { UKR = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_dyrektoria } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = ukrpol_explosion.18.d5
		trigger = { UKR = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_upss } }
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_Hofburg
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.18.a
		clr_global_flag = UKR_explosion_AUS_bad
		remove_opinion_modifier = {
			target = UKR
			modifier = UKR_explosion_AUS_bad
		}
		FROM = { country_event = ukrpol_explosion.19 }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.18.b2
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_AUSTRIA }
			}
		}
		trigger = { UKR = { has_country_flag = UKR_assassin_derzhvarta } }
		FROM = { country_event = ukrpol_explosion.20 }
	}
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.18.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_foreign_policy option = UKR_FOREIGN_POLICY_AUSTRIA }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_explosion_AUS_bad }
			}
			set_global_flag = UKR_explosion_AUS_bad
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = UKR
				modifier = UKR_explosion_AUS_bad
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = ukrpol_explosion.21 }
	}	
}

country_event = { #
	id = ukrpol_explosion.19
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol_explosion.19" }
	title = ukrpol_explosion.19.t
	desc = ukrpol_explosion.19.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_Hofburg
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.19.a
		add_political_power = 35
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { #
	id = ukrpol_explosion.20
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol_explosion.20" }
	title = ukrpol_explosion.20.t
	desc = ukrpol_explosion.20.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_Hofburg
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.20.a
		if = {
			limit = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
			FROM = {
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea
						has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS
					}
				}
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = AUS decision = UKR_terminate_the_brotfrieden }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -35
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { #
	id = ukrpol_explosion.21
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event ukrpol_explosion.21" }
	title = ukrpol_explosion.21.t
	desc = ukrpol_explosion.21.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_Hofburg
		
	option = {
		name = ukrpol_explosion.20.a
		if = {
			limit = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
			FROM = {
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea
						has_idea = UKR_brotfrieden_idea_AUS
					}
				}
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = AUS decision = UKR_terminate_the_brotfrieden }
			}
		}		
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_outraged
		}
	}	
}
